title: Great location for everything!
review: We rented a condo at Runaway Beach Club via an owners website and were delighted with the accommodation. Very spacious condo overlooking the lake, two pools, spa and gym met our needs perfectly after dealing with the crowds all day at the parks! The location is absolutely perfect, 20 mins to Disney, 25 mins to Universal, 15 mins to Gatorland, 5 mins to Old Town Kissimmee, 2 mins to Walmart, could not have been better situated for our needs. The fact that we stayed in a ground floor condo did mean we had a bit of noise from the upstairs but not enough to worry about. My only real criticism was that the resort did not recycle, all waste went into a communal compactor which in the times is not acceptable and I feel this is something that should be addressed.

title: No wonder it's called RUNAWAY! 2 star hotel at a 4 star price
review: Problems from the start! I received confirmation emails w/ details for 9 other people's reservations. Our confirmation voucher was for a 2 bedroom condo when we booked a 3 bedroom. They didn't have any available so 1 person had to sleep in the living room. Gate code was wrong so we had to wait for someone else to enter. I will admit, the area was great. The buildings are very cute & outdoor maintenance was excellent. The old saying "Don't judge a book by its cover" applies here! Those are the only good things I can say about this place. Had it been a 2 star hotel at about $100 a night- it would have been exactly what we expected. But this place was over $200 a night w/ an additional $150 resort & cleaning fees for a 3 day stay so we expected much better. I took 52 pictures of all the stained walls, carpets, shower curtains & furniture, broken drawers, dirty tubs & oven, bugs adhered to range hood, missing knobs & towel bars, dented & stained fridge, broken dishes & more! There were 3 TVs w/ 1 remote and the TV's didn't even work. We went to plug 1 in and found an outlet hanging out of the wall with no cover. The mattresses were very old & lumpy and wreaked havoc on our backs. Lots of rust in the tub. There is no office at this hotel so there is no one you can report to. I called the hotel number several times. It rings over 20 times then says leave a message. I left 4 messages & no one ever came by or called back. We left after only 1 day there. Our vacation was ruined!…

title: Overall good stay, but needs improvement
review: This was an apartment/condo attached to others, with its own entrance. Pros: - good location, took about 20 min to get to Disney entrance (in May), Walmart nearby - mostly quiet, heard baby crying faintly next door - quiet & safe location (gated community) - two bedrooms, two bathrooms - nice kitchen and big family room - pool & whrilpool - big kitchen table --overall very clean and nicely decorated. - Well stocked tableware, dishware, knives - Fridge was large and cold  Cons: - one long (indoor) flight of stairs to get to the place (they have a gate if you have little ones) - clothes dryer took forever to dry - the towels in the dryer were not dried so they were smelly by the time we found them - need better cookware in kitchen (nonstick coating was coming off) - couldn't figure how to turn on the external TV speaker - Florida water tastes funny (we bought water at Walmart, but it's very busy at night and with not enough staff) -  The beds were on the soft side  -  ice maker didn't work…

title: Spring Break
review: This grouping of mostly time share condo/apartments is conveniently located near Disney and not far from Universal.  Grounds are nicely maintained and there is a Walmart located a short drive/walk away.  We stayed in a 2 bedroom two bath unit that was good for our family.  The pool is nice but the indoor basketball court was shut down due to mold.  All around not great but certainly not bad.

title: Bad Experience- Runaway away from this place
review: We booked a 15 day 2 bedroom villa from expedia which was $1800 which we were ok with and two days before going I read lots of bad reviews so I checked with Runaway to see if we had a villa and at first they couldn't find out name and then when I have them the reservation number they said they found it. We get their no office a maintenance guy told us to call the number On the paper we had, so I call they told me there was a maintenance problem with the villa I chose and there were no other rooms available and told us we couldn't get out money back, to find another place to stay at. I then called expedia and they called Runaway and for three hours and a half they would call say they got a place to stay and would get back with an address, never calling us back. We would call them, they would say that place is gone they would give us a name of another place we would call them back same thing gone and then they would laugh at the end. These are timeshares that people own and have a timeshare company rent out so unless you rent from the owner don't get this villa. Called my credit card said it probably take 15 days to get my money back but luckily it was back in 2  days. My sister rented a villa but could only get two nights because it was totally booked. We got 2 hotel rooms for the 4 of us for the rest of our vacation but now had to buy lunch and suppers every day which we would have had in the villa. Would never recommend Runaway unless renting from the owner himself and use a credit card so you get the money back…

title: Very pleased and surprised
review: Let me preface this review by saying we did not originally book this resort.   We had a reservation through Airbnb for another resort and they cancelled very last minute (on the drive down from NJ).   We were panicked and finally found something that met our needs and would accommodate our last minute reservation.  The rental office was very nice and helpful.  They even gave us a free iron to use for our length of our stay.   The unit was a 2 bedroom/2 bath unit.  There were 2 sofa beds in the living area.  Enough towels for 6 people which we laundered daily. There was an option for a midweek cleaning but we didn’t purchase that as we weren’t in the condo a ton.   The drive to WDW wasn’t awful, maybe 15 minutes with minimal traffic going and a bit heavier coming back.  We didn’t…

title: Medical Trip
review: What a wonderful place for a wonderful price. The only thing I wish these places have is someone to help out with suitcases upon arrival or departure. Maybe any maintanace personnel could?. It felt like home for our 2 week stay.

title: Unbelievable
review: I cant believe that after reading so many bad reviews i still ended up booking this place, guess last moment choices. So whatever you have read everything is true about the place. So be ready for  1) no welcome  2) no response from the property  3) start contacting the property 2 days prior which will still not guarantee smooth check in 4) paying extra which will be mentioned in a contract sent after payment of the hotel so cant cancel 5) no supplies provided like detergents etc  What really pissed me off  1) i had to wait at the entrance for the codes because im yet to be charged for the cleaning fee (100 odd dollars) as the guy who has to charge is not in the office. So it doesn’t matter if ive paid 1000 dollars. And noone is replying to your email, after many calls , someone…

title: Holiday
review: Have stayed in the same condo everytime i go to the states. Always book directly with the owner and have never had a problem Apartment is always clean and tidy and if there is any problems i always contact owner and it is sorted straight away Have never had to deal with the managment company as owner always sends the updated codes for gate I know that when we were there last year there didnt seem to be any sign of a managment team so we noticed a lot of people arriving for stays and no one there to great and meet so they couldnt even get into the property Thesw condos dont have a bar area but the hotel accross the road does which we have used Walmart is around the corner and if u wish to walk it's about 10 mins Lake Buena putlets is only a few minutes drive  Very close to disney…

title: Awful experience
review: SAVE YOURSELF A LOT OF FRUSTRATION AND DO NOT STAY HERE!!! Our disappointing experience started before we ever left home. We were auto-debited for the full amount of our stay three days before we left on our trip. The resort sent us information about our stay, including a gate code to enter the property. Upon arrival, we attempted to enter the property, but found the gate code we were given was not valid. We went to the lobby, (to speak with a person), only to find the lobby locked. We called the contact number we were given in our packet and discovered there is not a representative on site. The lady who answered advised us the maintenance department would call us back. The maintenance department NEVER called back in the three days we stayed on property. After we found a way…

title: False advertising
review: This location came up after I googled Pet Friendly vacation rentals. Made and paid for the reservation however, after the reservation was paid for including insurance, I received an email from ACO Vacation Homes with a document with rules and regulations, informing me that this place do not accept pets and if i bring a pet, they would charge $500 to my credit card. This is extortion! Less that 15 hours later, I called the reservation department, spoke to Delia, explained my situation  to let them know the I made the reservation on the condition that they were listed as pet friendly.  This lady told me no refunds of any money allowed. When I ask why do they show listed as pet friendly, she  first told me that they accept pets but only service dogs. I asked her as to why was this…

title: Birthday Weekend Trip
review: Overall our family enjoyed our stay in Orlando, BECAUSE of this unit's close proximity to local area attractions and the property's amenities. Unfortunately, our unit was so close to the highway that we could hardly get any sleep at night :-( The unit also "NEEDED" to be properly wiped down/disinfected! I contacted customer service with pictures to prove my concerns, and I was told that not enough photos were submitted to get anything fixed/cleaned or be refunded for the "so-called" cleaning fee!!! No apologies, no refund, no let's try to make things better!!! THERE'S NO ONE EVER at the Check-in counter--only a sign telling people to contact the agency were  they booked their reservation! The countertops and dining table in our unit were sticky and filmy, and when "I" wiped them…

title: Horrible stay
review: When we first arrived the gate had been open so we went right to our apartment once inside we found the carpets were dirty there were litttle bugs on the kitchen counter and stove but the worst were the little bugs in the master bathroom.  I called twice spoke to someone once and was told she was going to put in the work order. No one showed up.  I called again and got an answering machine no one phoned me back and no one showed up.   The first night there we went out for supper and when we returned the gate was closed and the code we were given was incorrect, we had to wait for someone to come and let us in and all I got in response was sorry they changed the code.   Would not recommend this location to family or friends. The safe in our room was broke could not store anything…

title: DO NOT BOOK HERE!!!
review: Avoid booking at this place! Once you book they hit you with a million  fees that are unjust. They charge a cleaning fee but then ask you to clean the entire place yourself so what does it really go toward. Then they leave a bunch of stained linens in the house for you which is disgusting. Tvs didnt work. For a place that sleeps 7/8 people you have 2 rolls of Paper towels and toilet paper. No wifi in the place. Door handle came clean off and we couldnt get out. The beat part came 2 WEEKS after departure where rhey tried to charge for supposed dirty towels that were left behind. Theyre a bunch of criminals. Save yourselves the grief and money book an airbnb.

title: hmmmmm
review: well, its a vacation resort. these are always tough to judge and you don't know what you're getting into before you get there. some are great and some are rough.. this one was a goodie. no complaints on this end.

title: Look at other options....
review: We booked thru Expedia - who is a 3rd party agent when it comes to booking Runaway Beach Club. You will almost immediately after booking get an email from ACOVacation Homes. There are additional fees AFTER YOU HAVE PAID EXPEDIA - for our stay (4 nights) the additional fees were $131.  Additionally - you must scan and email a copy of your drivers license and the front AND back of the credit card that you used to pay the additional fees. The agreement that they send you to initial and sign was SEVERAL pages long. They pretty much say you follow all of our rules to the letter - or we can fine you.   IF you choose to book this property - BE AWARE OF 3rd PARTY AGENTS.  Not sure in what country the customer service for ACOVacation Homes resides - but we could never communicate with…

title: Lovin It !
review: We just arrived for the month of January.  We found our 2-bedroom, 2nd floor condo to be very neat and clean, spacious and well suited for the 3 of us. We especially appreciate having a washer and dryer in the condo.  The Runaway Beach Club is very well-located, close to Disney and related attractions as well as close to shopping and lots of restaurants.  The only drawback we have found so far is that the area is very busy with traffic and traffic signals take foreverrrr!  We found our owner/host very accommodating, responsive, friendly and helpful.  We also believe this condo to be very modestly priced considering the amenities and the busy area in which the Club is located.

title: Great location and value
review: We rented a VRBO condo and it was a real bargain.  There was a lot of space in the condo and there was easy access to the Disney and Universal attractions. Restaurants and supermarkets were nearby.  If you are looking to avoid paying a premium to stay at a Disney property, this is the place to stay.

title: Worst, Dirtiest Business Practices
review: September 9th our power was out and home damaged from Hurricane Irma.  We went to Orlando to be more comfortable with my husband, daughter and 3 dogs.  When we called we were told that pets were excepted because of the hurricane.  We booked for 3 nights and paid full price on a travel site.  We called the day before to check the room size and we were told our dogs would not be excepted and that we  could not get our money back.  We paid for 3 nights and never slept there.  Expedia was on with them 3 times, we were as well.  He said the hurricane made it so even if we were not staying he would not be able to fill the room.  Long story short, we were hurting from the storm, both emotionally and money wise and this place took advantage and we were that much more broke at the end of…

title: Fantastic, can't wait to come back
review: We were a bit anxious after reading some reviews - but wow!  We had a 3 bed villa which included a large living room area, dining table and full kitchen. The master bedroom had a very big (and comfy) bed, TV, bedside cabinets and chest of drawers. Its own bathroom and a walk in wardrobe (with plenty of hangers).  Our 2 boys had their own rooms, both of which had a single bed, a double bed, a TV, chest of drawers, bedside cabinets and large wardrobes. They also had a bathroom. Both bathrooms had bath and shower and hairdryers.  There was a cupboard with a washing machine and tumble dryer.  The kitchen had a large fridge freezer, microwave, oven, dish washer, toaster, kettle, coffee maker, saucepan and utensils, cutlery and crockery. The only thing missing was a baking tray for…

title: Fantastic place
review: The place we hired for two nights was fantastic , spotlessly clean and very spacious , pools were fantastic , clubhouse was shut due to hurricane Irma but everywhere was also closed . only thing to note is the cleaning fee in the small print is easy to miss when booking

title: Stop! Runaway from this!
review: Unit #3101This place is dated, old and not kept up to standard.  Come on.... the pictures were taken 20 years ago when it was newly built?? This is a con job. I would be very careful with any other units in this Runaway Beach Club.  - washroom smells moldy, bathtub floods/clogs - cooking utensils rusted and old - carpet broken - forget about using the sofa bed, it doesn't support any weight - bed is uncomfortable and squeaky - furniture stained and scratched - everything is old - blinds are old and dirty - not sure about the water, it smells, to be safe I used bottled water to cook - rusted shower head  Didn't dare to use the washer and dryer, god knows if it'll clean or make my clothing more dirty.  Don't let this place spoil your vacation. There are better ones nearby. What a…

title: Runaway and never returning
review: We stayed one night and forfeited the rest of the experience and ran away (for good). The 'suite' had a very musty/moldy smell, the bed was extremely uncomfortable as was the sofa - felt like we were sleeping and sitting in a sinking hole. We were not there to create gourmet meals but the kitchen set up was so unpractical for a holiday visitor that it was actually quite comical (one of the few appliances was an electric cake mixer yet there was no baking tray or anything else to bake with for that matter).  I saw 3 signs stating that fines would be imposed if garbage was not taken to the compactor yet there was only 1 single garbage bag. Coffee machine was provided but no coffee filters...I could go on.  As for cleanliness, we were greeted with pubic hair littered in the…

title: Not what I expected
review: This place was ok.  We stayed there for 4 days and 3 nights. The longer we stayed the more we discovered not so good things.   1. The company requires that you send a copy of your credit card through to them in an email. I have been a victim for credit card info theft and this made me skeptical. They said in an email that they understand and will account for all charges. To when they say that, I expect them to email me a receipt or something and I got nothing. There are just way to many fees that they charge for my liking. 2. About the place: There were no pot holders to use to take stuff out of the oven so we had to use a hand towel which they charged me for. The dryer does not turn off by itself. so this thing ran all night. Thank god it didn't catch fire! The Beds were very…

title: Great place and excellent price.
review: We stayed here with my husbands family and had a ton of room. The unit was clean but a little worn. I'am pretty picky with my lodging so For me to rate a 4 it was defiantly desent and in a great location. I was happy to have very clean bathrooms and kitchen. The bedding is old and the beds were not very comfy. The pool and hot tub were great. We also had a loft with a fusball table my kids loved it.

title: Great Stay!
review: Made the reservation via Airbnb. Cleanliness, cozyness, price and the location were things that drew my attention when I made the reservation. We had a unit just in front of the lake. Unit was very spacious, very clean and indeed cozy. Had free wi fi but didn't work well on iphones. Kitchen had everything you needed in order to cook you meals during your stay. We even got complimentary gifts from the host (wine, sodas, etc.). House also had washer and dryer, 2 flat screen tv (one in the living room and one in the main room, coffee machine, oven, all in all, it was like being at home but in Orlando. We were very close to walmart, Disney and Universal, Lake Buena Vista Outlets and even Orlando Premium Outlets. It was a very well located place. Would definitely visit again!

title: Just okay
review: We stayed here for 10 days. Very convenient location. Stayed in a 2 bdrm villa. Rooms were spacious but villa needs a major upgrade. The furniture was ripped and falling apart. The walls were dirty and chipping paint. The refrigerator had some kind of defrosting issue. The 2nd bathroom shower was clogged and had a foot of water in it. The 2nd pool and sun deck were being resurfaced so we couldn't use them at all in our 10 day stay.  We didn't spend too much time in so none of these were a huge deal but considering there our tons of other villas around we probally won't be back unless they renovate.

title: Cancelled and overcharged
review: No circles at all. Rate 0 (Zero) It was unfortunate how a vacation place with the vision that it'd be a perfect family getaway was transformed into a nightmare. Bad costumer device, strict and unreal rules about change/cancellation fees, and the lack of organization and administrative personnel, made Runaway beach club a forever DON'T DARE MAKE A RESERVATION THERE.  I was with my baby girl when doing the reservation and something happened that the dates were wrongly selected. Maybe my mistake, maybe the app, maybe the screen! As soon as I entered 'confirm payment' I realized I had the wrong dates and called to cancel.  Cancellation fee: HALF OF THE AMOUNT OF THE STAY. So I had to pay almost three hundred dollars.  Unfortunately the lady who answered said she couldn't do anything…

title: vacation
review: stayed here in 2014, pool is nice , not crowded at all  staff  very friendly ,  close to all theme parks , gated entry at  night which makes  you feel  safe ,room entry card  makes gate work, can't fill out  travel part because  stayed here in 2014

title: Should not be called a club
review: I recently stayed at one of the condos with a friend of mine for a few days.  It was a bit disappointing as they have no amenities that you would expect from a club.  Every afternoon we would try and get into the common room but it was locked, not sure what the hours were, however we were there at all different time.  We had issues getting into the condo the night we arrived as the owner never sent us the code to access the condo...bit disappointing.  Also the safe did not work for us

title: Clean, Spacious and Comfortable
review: Runaway beach was booked through Magical Memories. The bad was we did not know where we were going to stay until we arrived at magical memories. The good we were glad when we saw the the place.   It was a two bedroom condo with a king bed and two twins, two baths, full kitchen with washer and dryer. The condo was clean and nicely decorated. It was a close drive to most parks and walking distance to the official ticket center even Walmart was a walk away if you wanted to. There was a pool and other amenities. I would recommend this stay.

title: Disappointed
review: We really enjoyed our time hear in the past even tho the condos were dated.  This time we took it again as they accepted my support dog. However the owner did not have the condo cleaned adequately for our arrival.  She apologized and said she would send a service,not done.  She said she would send some new items such as new comforter as hers was torn.  Pitcher for water, safety mat for bathtub as there are no bars, shower curtain as hers was rusted all not received.  When asked for a bathmat to replace the little thin entry mat in the bathroom, I was told that rental companies do not recommend rugs.  No phone in condo, was supposed to have wifi.  Service was so weak, we had to go to spectrumand purchase a modem amend service for $60.asked the owner to pay but have not heard…

title: CLEAN, QUIET, EFFICIENT AND IDEALLY LOCATED
review: We stayed in a 2 bedroom condo. They probably vary but ours (#203/5004) was really 5 star. I travel a lot for business and often stay in 5* hotels, so I am not exaggerating. Everything works and high comfort level. Very spacious, ideal for family with 2/3 kids. Value for money was exceptional. We booked through an agency, Sunny Orlando Rentals or something like that.

title: Thanks for the memories...not really.
review: Where do I even begin?!! This place should be ashamed. I dont know what type of management, business, extermination company whoever takes care of this property is doing..but it needs a TOTOAL renovation with the among of money being spent to rent. First of all FALSE ADVERTISING between this company and expedia.com before we arrived we were told that we would have Hotel fees that need to be paid before checking if that was okay the total price that was going on that's pedia.com was $90 once we begin telling family members to go ahead and make their way down for this is so lovely vacation we received a phone call saying that our price for hotel fees was now $135 and they needed documentation of our license and a picture of the credit card. Here's the thing about that you tell her…

title: Lovely complex
review: This is the second year on the trot that we have stayed here.  We stayed in the same one bedroom condo both times. The unit does need an overhaul, door knobs falling off, worn carpet and blinds that do not work properly.  It could do with a clean as behind furniture and bed was dusty. But saying that, the bed was clean and very comfy.   It advertises a Tiki bar by the pool, which was not open this year or last. There is never any staff in the office and it is a but deserted.  The pool area is tidy and lovely to lie around. Sun beds and brolly in good condition.  This year there were gators in the lake on the complex. We saw one basking in the sun on the side of the lake. Lots of lizards and frogs.  We do love this place despite the negatives and wouldn't hesitate to go back.…

title: Will be back!
review: We have stayed here 3 years in a row through Vrbo.  The prices are Amazing,  the rooms were spotless and clean, very close to all amenities and a short drive to all the major parks.   We have stayed 3 times and are already planning our next trip

title: Runaway to a better vacation somewhere else.
review: What a miserable place i have seen more activity in a graveyard. it has no atmosphere the pool area was dead not a soul to been ...no one around no children laughing  the sun loungers were past there best. no tiki bar closed for the whole 14 days we were there, the  so called business centre was locked from Friday evening till Monday am. The place is gated for cars but is wide open to the public ..no security ...no waste management in place. you need a gas mask around the waste compactor an adult must deposit the trash in the compactor ..... what a place i could go on & on... there is far better vacation villas in Kissimme  but not this one.

title: Mixed Bag
review: This is our second stay at a Runaway Beach condo and I'm sad to say not as nice as it was the first time we stayed several years ago.   The good: the condo is very quiet. It's well-built and there's very little outside noise. We had one that was near a busy road and while there was a little road noise, it wasn't loud enough to be annoying. Ours was a 2-bedroom unit, very spacious and for the most part very clean. There were lizards on the front porch, which for me is a plus, because I'm a nature nut. Some might feel differently, but this is Florida and you have to expect wildlife. I'm actually disappointed if I don't see frogs and lizards outside my door when I stay. Washer and dryer worked well for the one load I did right before we left. Also good: the location. It's…

title: Repairs Definitely Recommended
review: I booked this property through Hotels.com, and received a fair price.  Having, in a former life, once been a resident of Orlando, I knew that this property used to be mixed used residential - and I was eagerly looking forward to being "off the beaten path" as it were for my 15 day stay.    I had a giant 1 bedroom apartment with a loft, and looking back on it, I probably wouldn't have gotten the loft since I was traveling alone, but I can see where it's a big help for larger groups.  It was also nice to see the foosball table up there.  To be honest, I used the space to let my laundry dry - the stuff that couldn't dry in the dryer that is.  The apartment is well appointed in a beach theme but from a conditional standpoint, they have some MAJOR work to do.  There were stains on…

title: Comfortable, Spacious Getaway but Needs Repairs
review: This was our third stay at Runaway Beach Club. We booked it because of great experiences in the past. The management must have changed hands since we last stayed there (five years ago?) because somethings have changed for the better, and others hadn't. Let's start with what was great: The condo was super clean, fresh smelling and comfortable. We were given a condo right next to the pool, and we could barely hear any noise from the outside. Great! The beds were comfy and the showers worked great. We had plenty of bath towels. We had no problem using the washer and dryer. The televisions worked great once we figured out the remote control system. The pool area and pool is exceptional. Clean, bright, and with a separate kiddie pool, neither pool was very crowded. Also, our dealings…

title: Convenient location, average accomodation.
review: We've booked through AirBNB. We got a ground floor appartment. Everything was clean and ok. It was pretty dark inside as the window shades where not really nice to open up unless you don't want any privacy. The pool was just ok. Not really special. The big pro's are the distance to Disney and Universal (15 - 20 minutes drive), big 24h Walmart around the corner. We were able to go to the apartment in between during our stay at Disney so our toddler could sleep. That took around 45 minutes (15 minutes drive, 30 minutes with the monorail in Disney etc.).

title: Do not recommend
review: My experience was not good at all. My air conditioner did not work. I reported and a Tech came out more than one time and said it was fixed. It was not. All weekend 85 degrees in the unit. Then I hope the fan would at least do me some justice and that had a clanking noise. I was miserable. Sheets had  yellow stains and I took a picture and send it to management. I get a call from them saying there is nothing they can do. I visit Orlando frequently as I have three small children. Next time I'll stick with Resorts I know and have been satisfied with. Don't try to save money staying here.

title: so, so gross
review: We booked this room for my graduation weekend and were extremely disappointed.  We made sure to get a three bedroom place and when we arrived, it was two bedrooms and a loft.  Not acceptable.  The management promptly left and was no help, then called back to argue about the loft being a bedroom.  The layout online clearly shows a room, with a door, so this is just the classic bait and switch.  The front door looked like it had been broken into multiple times and we did not feel safe.  The beds were covered in plastic that was ripped and shredded.  The mirror looked like it belonged in a truck stop. TV's were 25 years old, lights were dingy and the place was just generally dirty. The freezer looked like somewhere you could store a body for a few days without an issue. I've…

title: DO NOT STAY HERE- Worst Customer Service on the Planet!
review: Long story short. Room was disgusting, things were broken and none of the staff offered a solution. Every single person was rude. I was called a liar. I never received any form of compensation because they did not feel like I had enough “proof”. You be the judge.  I have stayed at this resort for over 7 years. I have seen management companies come and go but I have never in my life experienced the poor customer service like I did with ACO Vacation Homes.  They wait until AFTER your card is charged for the full amount to tell you that you can’t check in until 4pm and if you want to check in any earlier, you have to pay the amount of a full night stay. I was sent paperwork with my unit number and was promised a specific unit but it was changed 4 times.   When I arrived to the…

title: Home from Home
review: We have used Magical Memories before, some 8 years ago and we very pleased with the Condo they supplied so we had no hesitation in booking a one bedroom condo again. This time it was at Runaway Beach Club resort. No hassle booking in. A lovely clean Condo with 2 TVs, Internet, fully equipped kitchen, washer and drier. Lovely Décor, efficient A/C and fans and roomy enough for more than my wife and I. I believe the sofa may have converted to a bed too. The site at Runaway resort is stylish and kept clean by residents/visitors. It is gated too. We did not make any use of the Club itself as we were out most of the time. Two Pools, one more for children's use with fountains and such like. We relied on the Condo as a base for excursions and it was a nice place to come home to every…

title: DO NOT STAY HERE DISGUSTING  HAS BUGS TOO
review: Place is disgusting...stains everywhere, front door has been broken into so many times door won't close.    THERE ARE NOT 3 BEDROOMS HERE, THERE ARE 2 AND A LOFT that does not have 4 walls.   The appliances are stained and dirty, there are holes in the carpeting and the place hasn't been painted since 1985.    We left before the front door could close behind us and when we went back to the front desk THEY WERE GONE.   POOL WAS BEING PAINTED SO COULD NOT BE USED.   IF THEY HAD A -`10 I WOULD GIVE IT TO THEM.

title: "Nice" sums it up
review: Our villa at this resort was pretty basic and dated but it was very clean and good value. It's a great place for a family with small children, loads of parking and very near Disney and Walmart, it also has a real community feel as everyone's kids seemed to play together and everyone seemed to know each other.

title: Nice location and ammenities
review: I ultimately rented this from a person who owned an individual condo rather than from thr management of the property.  It is all condominiums.  I had an excellent experience with this person but cannot address how management deals with things.  It is within 20 minutes of most of the parks and there is a super Walmart 0.5 mile away, which we visited almost every day for 2 weeks! Even though it is within a block of a major roadway you would never know it.  The area is very quiet and family friendly.  It is a good place to go if you want to stay away from hotels.

title: Vary nice place but needs maintence and upgrades
review: We loved staying here.Villa (16-201) needed some work, new furniture and a good cleaning. The door going in was so far out of square that the deadbolt would not work. The master bedroom bed was broken. The head board and foot board was falling off, all beds were vary loud when anyone would move. Door handles were loose and ready to fall off. The kitchen sink had fallen down from the granite counter top. The place looked clean at first but after looking good their was dirty base boards, the light switches were all a mess and ceiling fans looked like they had never been cleaned. After doing a little cleaning to make our self feel comfortable the place was great. Its was vary big (around 1200-1300 square feet). It had a washer and dryer in villa. You could not hear neighbors in…

title: We love the place!
review: A very quiet area near Disney, it is beautiful.  The staff (Staci, Joel, Wayne, Rosa...) are fantastic, always ready to help out with what ever we need.  Can't wait to go back!  The only down side:  The condos could use some TLC (new couches, beds)

title: The Jackalope Man had unhappy company
review: I had some friends visit from up North. They had stayed here before so they had an expectation of what they would experience. The unit I rented this time was a little run down. It's a shame that a few more maintenance dollars were not invested in this unit because my guests were disappointed. I can only rate this property as very average.

title: Love this place
review: Made a reservation through the website. When I arrived I got checked right in. The worker was very nice. Got to the villa and it was big and spacious,it was only two of us it could of slept 8 people. The rooms are clean very quiet and the place is cheap. Its my second time here and its better.

title: Small clean condo!
review: My family stayed in a unit rented through Sunny Orlando Property Management for a recent trip to Disney.  The price was great and the property was perfect for our needs.  Our family of 3 stayed in a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo.  The condo was very clean and was stocked with everything we needed.  The only downside is that the condo was upstairs, which I didn't know when booking.  It was all on one floor once you went up the long staircase after entering the condo, but there were a lot of stairs to drag luggage and groceries up.  You could also very clearly hear the neighbors.  Neither of those factors would deter me from staying here again.  It was a quick drive to the parks and everything else you could possibly need is close in Kissimmee.

title: Comfortable Option for the Price
review: My husband and I have been to the Orlando area several times and stayed in a few different condo-style accommodations. The Runaway Beach Club, as booked through Magical Memories on Expedia, afforded us a comfortable option at a decent price and would most likely stay there again.   Pros - Spacious 1 bedroom with a fairly large kitchen complete with all the amenities. Location was great for us and walking distance to the Walmart and shopping.  It was quiet, clean and we were able to take walks around the property that was well maintained.  Gated community but don't be fooled by "security" as anyone could still walk onto the property at any time.  Price was decent enough that we could afford to do activities around the area like theme parks and mini-golf.    Cons - The furniture…

title: Christmas Annual Family Vacation
review: This is the second year that our "Blended" family stays at the Runaway Beach Club for our annual Christmas family vacation. We stay for 5 days and we rent two units. There are 14 of us. Each time we have stayed it has been a pleasure. It has become a tradition one that we all would like to continue for years to come. I recommend this property to all my friends. The staff at the front desk have always been pleasant and helpful. Our units have always been clean and ready for us. I love that I am actually able to cook breakfast for all of us each day before we head out to the parks. Once we leave the parks it is nice that it only takes us 10 minutes to get back to the units.

title: Big rooms, helpful staff, shuttle services
review: Huge bedrooms with well laid out kitchenette connected to large living room.  Washing machine and dryer gratefully working and easy access to Walmart and shuttle service Disney made this a comfortable stay.  Concierge were great at helping to arrange taxis, shuttles and general local knowledge and the place is very secure with gated pool and parking.  Hot tub was nice and pool heated.  We had enough utensils to make meals and enough coffee and cleaning materials were at hand to get you started.  All amusement parks are a 25 minute drive away but having got dreadfully lost doing a 9 to 9 stint at universal we got lost for an hour self driving so saved on Park parking prices and sanity taking the shuttle for Disney.   In the rooms some furnishings were worn such as enamel worn on…

title: magical Memories (bookin Agebt) was awfull
review: the place was fine but the booking agent (Magical Memories) was awful. No Cable TV service. they did nothing to repair (refresh cable service) until the last day because they were tired of me calling. the Maid was knocking down my door upon checkout at 10Am sharp! left at 11Am and was charged for late checkout.

title: Excellent Option
review: Located just minutes from Disney, this is a great choice for families when staying in the area. Each unit offers a full kitchen and washers and dryers. This was our 2nd stay and we will be back. The condos are very clean and comfortable. Each bedroom has a television and a large closet. A decent workout facility as well as a great pool are both onsite.

title: Old and rundown
review: I have stayed at Runaway Beach Club, 3 other times. It is very close to Disney amusement parks, shopping and restaurants. Now this was a few years ago. But then it was nice and clean. This time, I booked a one bedroom. It is roomy and could sleep 7, but holey smokes. It was  rundown and dirty, The dresser in the bedroom was missing drawer pulls, The doors on the end tables were falling off. There was holes in the wall. The carpet was stained, the head board for the bed was the wrong size and it was just leaned against the wall.  This was nothing like how it used to be. So disappointing, I will never go back.

title: Second trip
review: Second trip for us here. I booked a first floor queen, as we had stayed here previously in a great ground floor king. We had very noisy neighbours above then, so opted for a first floor unit instead this trip, hoping for quiet. The quality of the unit was not as good as what we had previously. We spent four nights though, then headed off to other parts of Florida. We spoke to the very helpful Stacey at reception and said that the accommodation was not as good as what we had expected, but that we would return to a ground floor unit - if she had a nice one available. I have to say that she did us proud- super unit- and we really enjoyed it. I think that as the units are separately owned there are some in better condition than others, so it's going to be the case. The pool area is…

title: Runaway Fast from Runaway Beach Club
review: Are you ready for a horror story? I got a good one.  In fall 2015, a few friends and I planned a quick trip to Orlando for a five day, four night trip. After looking at several value resort hotels that were in the area we landed on Runaway Beach Club, a resort my family had stayed at a few times many years ago. Our memories here were that of a decent place for a fairly cheap rate, so we booked and thought we were ready for a great trip. However, once we got to the "resort", all of our worst fears came true. Here's an unfortunately long list of reasons why we left:  1. CLOSED SERVICE DESK-Once we arrived, the front desk, or "clubhouse" as they referred to it, was completely closed- so much for their supposed "24 hour service desk" they boast on their website. (We knew our flight…

title: An Awesome Stay!
review: We stayed in a nice condo for 8 people for 14 days in November 2015. It was a great vacation! The Club is located very close to all the amenities, Walmart, gas station, places to eat, and within a short driving distance to all the great parks in the area.   It is a gated community, very safe and peaceful, with 2 pools and a hot tub, a beautiful lake with a fountain, very well-maintained, with a gym and a beautiful garden.  The Management is very helpful and very efficient, the staff was great and friendly. The Club offers free wi-fi, all amenities, washing machine, dryer, hair-dryers, all utensils, bed sheets, fridge, everything you need for a carefree family vacation.  This was our first time to Orlando and it was really special. We loved absolutely everything. We shall be…

title: A Beautiful Birthday for my Eli😄😄😄
review: Everything was perfect!!!   I BOOKED DIRECTLY through the Runaway Beach Resort!  Everything was in distance from Disney to the Walmart to papa Johns!!! Everything went according to plan!! E got everything I asked for a room by the pool easy access to my car and back perfect for our trip and plenty of space for my little 5 year old to run around!! Also a fully stocked kitchen I was able to cook for my family and even check out late!!  Definitely a spot we will be  back at for our next trip to Disney!!!

title: Worst stay experience of our lives, Stay away from this circus.
review: After about two hours after check-in, we noticed that the AC wasn't cooling and I went down to the front desk to report it around 3:00, we also told the front desk that we only had two towels for a room for four.  The clerk told me that he would put a ticket in for the AC, he also said that all we got was two towels, that we were supposed to bring out own and that the paper we signed when we checked-in said all of that.  I asked him to show me where it said that and he pulled the check-in papers, but of course, that wasn't there.  He said that he would give me two towels if he had the key for the housekeeping closet, but he didn't have it. As I was going back to my room, I saw a lady pushing a housekeeping cart and i went back in to see the clerk to ask him if she could give us…

title: Excellent Value
review: My husband and I stayed here with our two adult sons late October / November .   Our initial impressions were very good .The condos are arranged around a lake and are all painted dreamy pastel colours do it looked very pretty . You entered the estate via a barrier which you needed a security code for . Sometimes it was hard remembering all the numbers as instead of a key you also entered your condo with a numbered key pad ( this was actually a blessing as there was no keys to lose of to keep passing between the four of us ) .  We'd booked via Magical Memories and they'd supplied us with a welcome cleaning pack - it would have been nice to have had a welcome grocery pack too though as we arrived very late and had no milk , bread etc for basic snacks .   The condo was plenty big…

title: Great place for larger groups or budget-minded travelers
review: Whether this resort meets you expectations or not will depend solely on where those expectations are set. If you are expecting 5-star accommodations at this price you will be disappointed. The units are a little dated and a bit dirty. You have to fend for yourself with cleaning supplies and toiletries. The free wifi was spotty at best, and I did find a big bug in the unit one morning. If however you are looking for an inexpensive and spacious rental that is 15 minutes from all of the Disney parks and has a great pool, you will be very satisfied with this resort.  The units are relatively private with an upper and lower unit only per building and they are very conveniently located near the parks and shopping. And the price is fantastic. As a large group we needed space for 13…

title: Kissimmee Resort
review: This place is horrible. You get what you pay for! Room a/c was broken and no maintenance available till next day! They tried accommodating us but the next room was worse! The smell of old dirty rug in the only other room available was unbearable! We had to deal with the heat! Pay a Disney Hotel! Would Never return!

title: Loved it!
review: Awesome price...beautiful room, friendly staff, so close to disney parks! Will be coming back in december! The room was recently renovated and is so clean, kitchen is great...very easy with my baby plenty of room for her things

title: Very good for the price.
review: I'll start with the negatives.    1.  The a/c vents in both bedrooms made a very loud noise.  Luckily we spent two nights and were too tired to care.   2.  The curtain rod in the master bath was not secured to the walls so it was dangling.  I mentioned it to the maintenance person but he never showed up. 3.  The closet door in the main entrance was literally was leaning against the opening. 4.  There were some areas on the carpet that were worn to the bottom.  The positives: 1.  Great location.  Very close to Disney and 535. 2.  The receptionist was very helpful. 3.  The room looked and smelled very clean. 4.  Plenty of storage. 5.  The bedrooms were very big. 6.  The bathrooms were also very big. 7.  The a/c worked great (besides the noise). 8.  GREAT price!  Overall it was a…

title: Beautiful, depends on unit!
review: There are alot of negative reviews about the cleanliness of the units but it just depends on the owner and cleaning big service. Most owners use the management service as their eyes, but if they actually went there to see the units rather than just rent them that would see that they need attention. Our u it was great! Needed done tlc but doesn't every place that there's slot of traffic? We also stayed at the Hilton the two days prior to here and it wasn't kept any better. Beautiful well kept grounds, beautiful units depending on the owner and cleaning service though. Very safe and great for families.

title: Very nice holiday stay
review: We booked our through VRBO and the owner.  I was a bit nervous as it was being managed through Magical Memories and I know they have a bad rep for customer service and cleaning.  We checked in with no problem and went to our condo.  The condo had things that were broken (toilet handles, faucets, etc).  The carpets had food on it and clearly not vacuumed .  The sheets not changed.  The master tub was being held open by dental floss and was clogged.  We called the condo owner who was VERY nice and helpful.  She relies on Magical Memories to manage that property and as soon as we told her the problems the owner called and got it all fixed and taken care of.  Within minutes we had the manager from Magical there inspecting and the next morning they came in and did all repairs and…

title: DONT GO
review: Our recommendation is NEVER stay in this place, UNLESS, the owners are another ones. It was the worst experience I could ever had. I want to mention also that I´m not a new user of this website, I´m a genius user and I´ve never have any problem like the ones I had here.  The only purpose of my message is to help other people and avoid them to go thru the same problems I had to deal. After flying more than 10 hours and driving more than 3 hours we arrived to the address that was mentioned in our reservation: 3001 Bonfire Beach Way. When we got there, a lady at the front door gave us a piece of paper with an address and told us to go there to get the key. It was 10:30 pm and we couldn´t understand why we had to go to the car again and look for another address. I asked her to call…

title: Our Summer Vacation Spot
review: Our family has stayed at this resort for our summer vacation for three years now. The resort is pretty with its pastel colored buildings and lake, and is family-friendly. The condos that we have rented have been clean and roomy,giving us plenty of space to spread out and relax. The kids had their own room to go to when they (or we) needed alone time. The location cannot be beat, unless you are willing to pay the high rates to stay on Disney property itself.    We really like this resort and keep coming back. So we don’t understand how the experiences of reviewers can be so different. Maybe it depends on who you rent from. We have had only good experiences with renting a condo at this resort, except for the occasional minor maintenance need that is probably normal for resort…

title: What a Wonderful Time!
review: We absolutely LOVED our condo and the resort! We found this condo on an owner rental website and rented directly from the owner.  The condo is extremely spacious and fit all of our needs.  The amount of space in the home for the price we paid is incredible!  Full kitchen, laundry, two bathrooms, 3 bedrooms. Perfect for larger families. We have rented condos in the past, and this by far was the cleanest and nicest one.  The only thing we needed was food and drinks. The children were so excited about the pool and the water sprinklers and the pond with the ducks. I could truly go on about how great everyone thought the property was.  We had the tropical feel of a resort with all of the pools and the colorful town homes. The gated community made us feel perfectly safe. Best of all,…

title: Great for large family's but only last resort
review: My Family and I booked this place cause my daughter was coming into town and we needed a big place. So we rented the one bedroom villa with a king bed and two pull out couches. As we have two small boys a teen age Gil and me and my wife came to 90 a night for all 3 night really great deal and with kitchen and living room it's great and roomy  However we checked in and went inside to find they upgraded us to a two bedroom two bath room we were be side our set and soooo happy. Till we went to take a bath and the kids bathroom the bathtub did not drain they said someone would come and fix it and never happened  and the air did not work  So I called and told them to switch us and they did the new place fixed our problems however there were a few more  Other than the houses being run…

title: It was okay
review: The outside of the resort is very nice.  But the rooms are not well kept.  We had to move from one condo to another because of torn furniture.  The condos are not well kept.  They were dirty, needs to be painted.  But the kids loved the basketball court, weight room, and the pools.  The staff was very accommodating and the location was great.  I guess it depends on what you are looking for.

title: Excellent stay.  Great locatión.
review: Rented an upstairs condo directly from an owner. Great overall experience, very quiet private little resort. Really close to everything, we were able to go regularly to ESPN, old town and the parks. Wallmart across the street from the resort (open 24/7 great for buying midnight snacks)

title: Runaway Stay
review: Runaway is a property that seems to be a little worn, however is a very reasonably priced property.  It is a great central location for all the Orlando attractions.  We stayed in a one bedroom with a kitchen and living room with 2 queen sleeper sofas.  The coffee table in the living room was broken, and one of the sleepers was broken - luckily we only needed one.  The working one had a big stain on the mattress and twin bedding.  Since there is no front desk staff after 11:00 PM, and the emergency number was disconnected, we dealt with it for one night.  We spoke to the front desk the next morning and they sent someone over to fix the table, and housekeeping brought the correct bedding and with a mattress switch we were ok.  Property has a nice pool and nice views of the lake. …

title: GOOD VALUE FOR THE MONEY
review: My family stayed at this resort last May.  We reserved through an owner and picked up our door code from the property manager a mile away, which was a little inconvenient but very easy to find. The condo was upstairs, with 3 bedrooms and a loft.  The condo was really large and we had plenty of room to spread out in.  It had a full kitchen, 2 bathrooms, and a washer and dryer.  Since this was an upstairs condo, we had to climb stairs to reach it (a slight negative); but we never heard our neighbors since no one was above us.  The location was what we were looking for since it was close to Disney world, and close to many good restaurants.  The pools looked nice, but we didn't use them since we were visiting parks during the day.  The lake with the fountain was pretty.  More…

title: Wonderful!
review: We are just back from two wonderful weeks in Kissimmee, staying at the Runaway Beach Club.  So perfect for our needs.  Just a short drive away from the major attractions but so quiet and relaxing for our days off.  The pool area was lovely and quiet.  We booked our accommodation direct with the owner (VRBO), which was a blessing, the condo was in superb condition and has obviously been well looked after.  I did ask for some help from the reception staff at the resort but, sadly, the girl was more interested in her text conversation than trying to help me, we had just arrived and did not have a clue of the location of the Kissimmee Old Town and neither did she, apparently!  This did not detract from a wonderful stay at the resort and would highly recommend to family and friends.

title: Clean but not as well kept as it used to be.
review: We stay at Runaway every year in July and its always been an ok place, clean, pool is nice for the kids and its close to Disney. This year the unit we stayed at was not up to standards, furniture was broken, a wall near the door was cracked, paint chipped off in several places and the squealing from the dryer was horrible. The unit was obviously  not been maintained.

title: Paradise close to Disney!
review: We were so pleased with our stay at Runaway Beach Club!  It was perfect for what we were looking for.  We wanted a family friendly resort located close to Disney, but at a reasonable cost.  We found exactly that at this resort.  The grounds and pools were wonderful and the condo was so roomy - plenty of space for a family of 5.  We loved having a washer and dryer. The beds were comfy and we had 4 TVs!  Our condo even had a loft, which the kids loved!  I heard from other guests that there are different floor plans so be sure to ask. We made our reservation through the owner on one of those rental websites. So I felt confident about what we were getting and the customer service was great.  I would definitely recommend this resort!

title: Clean, Spacious & Convenient
review: We recently stayed at the Runaway Beach Club for a family vacation.  It was our first time booking directly with a unit owner through an online booking service.  The price beat the "big box" hotel and resort prices by a mile, the reservation and check-in process was fast and simple, the unit was even roomier and nicer than described, the complex was spacious with great amenities and the location could not have been better.  The next time our travels take us to the Orlando area we will definitely use "Home Away" and stay at the Runaway Beach Club.

title: RELAXING STAY AT A GREAT LOCATION FOR A GOOD PRICE.
review: We rented a very nice spacious condo directly from an owner on a rental website.  Overall very good experience.   Fast and easy booking,  the condo itself was better than expected, very spacious and it was great to have a washer and dryer and be able to prepare a nice family breakfast before heading out to the parks.    The location is excellent and there are alot of places nearby.   We did meet other families at the pool, who booked direct and were not as pleased.

title: Great family resort!
review: My family stayed at this resort for a week in May.  We were visiting DisneyWorld and wanted a nice, spacious, clean condo, so we could relax after a day at the parks.  We found exactly what we wanted and needed at Runaway Beach Club!  The buildings are so cute, and the grounds are very pretty.  My children loved the kiddie pool and didn't want to leave it when we need to eat or sleep.  The condo was really very large, much larger than other condos we have used in years past.  It was clean and nicely furnished - everything we needed was there, except for the food and household items that picked up from the nearby Walmart.  This is not a hotel, so you do need to purchase your own provisions.  And there is no room service.  But that was fine with us.  We used the washer and dryer…

title: Lots of room for the price!
review: I traveled to the Orlando area with friends. There were 8 of us and we were all able to stay in one unit at the Runaway Beach Club.  The unit we stayed in was a 3 bed/2bath unit and we all slept comfortably with room for more if needed.  The cost was just over $200/night witch is great for two families to split. There was a full kitchen so we could either prepare all of our own meals or we could go out, our choice.

title: Unacceptable weekend stay!
review: We have stayed in Runaway Beach Resort Kissimmee/Orlando many times over the years in different units, and I must say when we first started staying there, the resort was lovely, accommodation very nice. The last few times we have stayed we've noticed it deteriorating a little more each time.  This weekend we checked into a ground/first floor three bedroomed condo and were horrified at the deterioration! What made it worse was that we had a guest with us from overseas - we were terribly embarrassed to say the least! As we walked in we were greeted with a very funky smell which stayed with us the entire weekend. The floors were sticky and dirty, the carpeting threadbare and with dirty stains, there was a huge area of wall under the living room tv which had broken in, wall coming…

title: 2015 Family Vacation
review: We just returned from vacation and this property was excellent! It was in close to proximity to many of the major attractions and added bonus Walgreen's, Wawa gas station and Walmart were only a few minutes away. The unit was spacious and comfortable and that was with two families (four adults and four children). We will definitely stay here again!

title: Memorial Weekend Trip!
review: My husband and I had just returned from Kissimmee FL. We had booked and stayed at this resort for 5 days. Before going, we were almost going to change our reservations due to the reviews on here. I am SO glad we did not! Everything went smooth and according to plan. We reserved an one bedroom king size, we were given a 2 bedroom and was able to check in at 1pm! We were given the 2nd floor and was able to park right outside our door. The stairs to the 2nd floor is steeper but it does guarantee more privacy with your windows open. If you are older, this might not be an option for you.  The AC was cool and everything was cleaned. We brought and bought our own laundry detergent and dish soap (even thought one packet was supplied). We did our own laundry, no maid service but that's…

title: Great place to stay
review: We were very pleased with our stay.  Stacey at the  front desk was super as well as Kathy and Elizabeth.  If we had a problem, it was taken care of in a timely fashion.  We will definitely stay there again, booking with the resort itself.

title: Great Potential
review: We stayed in 9205 and had friends who stayed in building 22 and we had a completely different experience.  The site is nice and seemed like a great value for the cost, however our unit was in desperate need of maintenance and a good cleaning.  When we first entered the unit, there were a pair of dirty socks in the middle of the living room floor next to the dining table.  The kitchen was surface cleaned, however the tea kettle on the stove had not been cleaned and had stale water in it.  The bathroom was surface cleaned, however mold was growning at the base next to the tile. The shower curtain was ripped in several places.  The bed was comfortable, but the fan above the bed made an awful noise. The air conditioner would not come on the first night, so it got quite hot. The next…

title: Fantastic Stay!
review: We stayed in Building 5 room 204 which was booked through VRBO.  The place was really nice with 2 bedrooms and a loft.  There was plenty of space for the kids to run around and play.  There is a great pool area with a splash zone for kids.Since it was more of a vacation rental than a hotel, they didn't have enough toilet paper and trash bags for our stay.  A quick trip to Wal-Mart which was right around the corner fixed up those snafus and we were back in business.  I would recommend this place and stay here again in the future. Great stay for families!

title: Not well managed would not recommend staying here.
review: The pros:  Spacious Condo Very Nice Pool Area  The Cons: Staff was rude and unhelpful. Unit I stayed in was very outdated.  Issues I had with the room I stayed in:  Both Bathrooms had empty roles of toliet paper in them.  Called the front desk at 4:00 PM said they would be right over.  Called again at 6:00 PM same thing someone was coming over right away. At 9:45 PM someone knocked on my door to give me one, partially used roll.  Luckily I went and bought my own.  In the second bedroom my son complained his bed was too hard.  I sat on his bed and it was very hard, looking under the sheets I saw that it had two box springs on top of one another there was no mattress.  Called to complain they insisted it was just a "firm" mattress. My son slept on the sofa for the rest of the…

title: LOVED THIS PLACE!
review: While we were visiting Orlando, FL we stayed here and it was so amazing! It was PLENTY of room for the two of us and like three other couples. It was a peaceful get away from all the hustle and bustle of the all the parks.  The full kitchen has enough room to cook all your meals, and all the appliances worked great! :) I even did a load of laundry just because I could.  They were in the middle of renovations when we were visiting, and we are looking forward to seeing what improvements were made next time we visit.

title: Great place and  location
review: The condo was in an. Excellent location and the pool area was perfect. The condo we had could do with a wee upgrade in the livingroom but overall it was spotlessly clean and comfortable. Right on Disney's doorstep. We would rent here again

title: Horrible experience. Don't waste your money!
review: The room was a total dump. Shuttle took over an hour to Disney and only ran a couple times a day. Got out of the shower to find maintenance trying to unlock my room door with a jimmy from the inside. Hands down the worst experience I've ever had away from home.

title: Great location
review: Was not excellent but a good, reasonable place to stay close to the resorts. Pool was nice, could have more amenities in the rooms. Very hard to request extra items from the front desk. Walmart is a block away. Carpet is in need of an upgrade. If you just need a place just to rest this is for you. We stayed here in July 2014.

title: I will never stay here again
review: We stayed at this Resort and it was sorry.  At first they changed our reservation and didn't tell us until we got there.  That room looked like someone was hurt in there.  There was spots on the bed. GROSS.  Then when we finally got the room that they gave us, there was no extra toilet paper I had to go buy some and yes I kept it, nothing to wash dishes with, there was no can opener of any kind, couldn't find the garbage bags until the day we left.  The master tub was cracked, I had to fix the shower head because it was lose.  The sinks in both bathroom was nasty. And the hot tub was broken most of the time we was there.  Don't waste your time or money it is not worth it.

title: disappointed second stay.
review: We stayed here in 2008 when it was under Mike Ditka Runaway Beach Club. It was beautiful just like the pictures on the web site. We just recently stayed on Aug9th -Aug 16th 2014. All the amenities in the room were changed, no more bed spreads, décor was bare bones, pots and pans usable at best, it was very run down and not very clean. Should I mention the cockroaches that were killed. We asked to be moved and they did to a much cleaner villa but still amenities were run down. No more towels at poolside had to bring your own and not all of the pool chairs had cushions and no tiki bar. Very disappointed in stay we thought we had a place to come to for years, I guess its true when they say things do not last forever.

title: We enjoyed the RBC.
review: The only two things I did not like about the RBC is that the tiki bar was closed and the kids pool was under construction. We went back in 2012. I reviewed this hotel on a couple of sites. The rooms were clean and spacious. The pool was fun. The location was ok. Parking was good. I really liked the fact it had dishes and pots and pans. Lots of closet space too. The pool furniture like chairs were outdated and old, some even broken. Staff was friendly and the place had a gate.

title: Very Nice, Close to everything
review: I needed a place to stay on short notice and came across this place.  We had a large group and I called to book a 3 bedroom villa, I spoke with a woman at the front desk and she was AWESOME.  She was very pleasant and attentive to our needs.  Their check-in is at 4PM but we arrived much earlier and while our room wasn't ready she did put a rush on  the room and we were able to use the pool area and other amenities while we waited.  When we went to the condo it was very nice and big, for the price we paid I really couldn't complain.  I needed extra linens and pillows and I called the front pretty late because we were out all day, the gentleman at the front was extremely nice and explained that it was a busy weekend but was able to allocate two extra sheets and two extra pillows…

title: Great price for the location
review: We booked this condo to stay in with our family of 6.  It wasn't the best place we have every been in, but not bad at all.   Lots of space for all of us, we spent most of our days at the parks or shopping. So we weren't there to hang out in the condo anyway. The staff was very nice, the kids enjoyed the pool.  Beds were comfy and clean. I would recommend leaving the air on all night in order to keep it cooler during the day. It would get a bit warm do to all the windows. I say the down fall was no cleaning supplies in the condo, like a mop or vacuum to clean up with. We simply went to the super center and bought our own paper towels and etc to make it easier on us.

title: Don't bother to stay here.
review: We stayed in May 2014. The place needs to be cleaned. Our room had dirty couches, rugs and the white coffee table in the living room was filthy along with the table and chairs in the dining area. The whole place smelled like mold that had been covered up by some sort of spray. Toilets had brown water in them in the morning. Sink in the kitchen was leaking and then it broke off. Pool was ice cold. For less money you can stay at a nice place that serves a breakfast. We have stayed there two other times a year ago and it was fine. It is  also under construction. They were taking out windows  in some of the other buildings and you could see mold on the walls. It said no pets but there was dog poop under our table at the pool. I feel like I just threw out hard earned money.

title: location, fair price, nice, clean!!!!!
review: we rented this place through Groupon, We had a 2 bedrooms ground floor unit. the resort is not extravagant or pretentious but, in my opinion, perfect for the price. It is not a full service resort with restaurants on site or room service, If you want real luxury full resort don't stay here...The villa was HUGE,  2 Bedrooms, 2 full baths, Master bedroom was nice and master bath was clean!...Second bedroom had 2 queens beds, full kitchen, full size washer and dryer......They do have a small tiki bar by the pool. The pool is nice and relaxing, and they had a separate area for the little kids.... One of the bonuses about this property is locations, there is a Walmart and Grocery store with in walking distance to the resort.....There were a few issues with the room, our tv's did not…

title: No.
review: Worst resort I've ever been to.The customer service is horrible, the rooms are not worth the amount you have to spend to stay there, the ac was broken, honestly I will not be staying there ever again.The "manager" personally went to settle a noise complaint, and the way she handled it was unprofessional she started by yelling at the guest (resolving a noise complaint?) And when she was told she was unprofessional and lacked customer service skills she reacted by getting in the guest's face, with her hand held back like she was going to hit him,yelling at the top of her lungs saying things a manager shouldn't say, and to top it off her anger set of a maintenance guy who was her "bf" and he got in the guest face.

title: Good value for money
review: I read the previous reviews with interest, both good and bad. I have to say that we were pleased with our visit. We had a 1 bed ground floor unit. Good points- great accommodation, well presented. Pool was clean, loungers have nice cushions, the place has a good vibe. Great location. Great rates all in. We found the staff, including Staci on reception to be really helpful.  Bad points- guests arriving on the first floor turned up at 1am and sounded like a herd of elephants. The building codes in the US are poor with regards to party floors and separating structures, but that's universal. Timber frame is lightweight and hard to soundproof.  Shower wasn't very powerful, but no major drama. Look, the place is not a palace. It's about 12 years old and there is a need for a bit of…

title: Unimpressed, resort has changed since last year.
review: I had taken a trip from Miami to Kissimmee last year and stayed at the Runaway Beach Club, while it was still owned by Mike Ditka. The resort last year was pretty great, and customer service was accommodating. This year, I can't say the same. We had a major issue with the reservations. Our total fee was held on our credit card for two months after we made the reservation, and when we came to check in, they said they had no such record of any credit card, so we had to be charged again. It made absolutely no sense. The front desk girl (Ashley) was very understanding and nice about it, but there should have been some record that we already paid. Anyway, when we FINALLY got to our room, the air conditioning was not working in one of the bedrooms. Maintenance guy came, fixed it…

title: Our Family Vaca
review: We were there this past weekend and i have to start by saying for the past 12 years we have been staying inside disney at their resort but since this year we were doing Disney one day and driving to Itchtuknee Springs for the other day we decided to change and stay here. WE WERE TOTALLY BLOWN AWAY We Loved your resort and the employees were all so helpful and nice , the place was super clean which is a bigger then big deal for me. The 2 cleaning ladies were so accommadating  i wish i had their names. over all we will defenitely be back we totally loved it. it was spacious and had all the amenities imaginable.    LOVED RUN AWAY BEACH CLUD   ... THE GODOY,S

title: Horrible resort
review: This was by far one of the worst stays I have had. I have been coming to this hotel For at least nine years. I didn't have any pans, there were bed bugs and the front desk didn't care. The night shift was very rude, I didn't have enough towels and that was an issue. Two years ago I had a small problem there, a guy by the name of art was working there, he handled it so great I actually sent him a card. He was so professional and made sure we were ok until the end of our stay. Because of him, i believe i came back over twenty more times. My daughter and i looked forward to seeing him and knowing we would be taken care of, just like long time guest should. Because I have come so frequently, I would think they would care about long time guest. I was promised a room and when I got…

title: Runaway from the Runaway Beach Club
review: I would like to start off by apologizing for your less than perfect stay. It is never our intent to have our guests have an unpleasant experience in any way while staying with us at Runaway Beach Club. I agree that their is absolutely no excuse for poor customer service so please rest assured that this issue has since been addressed and handled. In reference to Tracy, she is definitely a great asset to our team and I will pass on your kind words about her. We have also put a team in place to focus on all your concerns from cleanliness to comfort and to assure that this does not happen again. In addition I have met with all my department heads and I can assure you that we are moving forward with these areas to improve in quality and value. I again sincerely apologize and hope to get a second chance to earn your business.

title: Decent for the price
review: We went with a group of 5 for 4 days and 3 nights. I found this on groupon and decided to give it a shot. It was very easy to redeem and check-in. The facility seems to be going through some major appearance changes/repairs. Mostly all of the buildings have some sort of repair going on to them, and there was a huge dumpster in front of our unit for building material. The unit itself was nice and pretty much clean. It comes with a full kitchen, a living room with tv and 2 pull out sofas, and ours was a 2 bedroom with 2 bathrooms. The beds are terribly uncomfortable. The mattresses are like sleeping on bricks. My husband and I chose to sleep on the pull out sofa over the bed, and even that was not comfortable. The shower would not drain completely so you were constantly standing…

title: Great place to stay with kids!
review: I would like to start off by apologizing for your less than perfect stay. It is never our intent to have our guests have an unpleasant experience in any way while staying with us at Runaway Beach Club. Although your reservation process and check in experience were pleasant ones I apologize that you don't feel the same way about the rest of your stay. That said we have put a team in place to focus on all your concerns to assure that this does not happen again. I have also met with all my department heads and I can assure you that we are moving forward with cleanliness, quality and value. I again sincerely apologize and hope to get a second chance to earn your business

title: There for 7 days and still only 4 washcloths for party of 6
review: After seeing this place on Groupon, I wasnt sure if I wanted to cancel my Marriott reservation but after seeing the great response by the general manager, I gave it a shot. Not only was it $150 less than my first hotel reservation but the customer service was great as well as the condo. It was two bedrooms, a full kitchen, washer/dryer, close to pool, etc. The kids wanted to leave Sea World to return to the condo. The pool area was great and the complex was close to everything. Im a picky person when it comes to hotels and where I sleep and my children play and this place was great. Our unit was nice and clean and very spacious. If you have any doubts, contact their manager, Joel. He kept his word and made our stay excellent.

title: Stay away!!!!!
review: Thank you so much for staying with us. We are glad to hear that you and your kids enjoyed your stay with us here at Runaway Beach Club and we cant wait to welcome you back. We are always finding new ways to better our resort and appreciate positive feedback from our guests. Please feel free to contact me if I can ever be of any further assistance and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

title: Perhaps the hair dryers would be helpful?
review: We stayed for 7 days and repeatedly requested towels and washcloths.  We finally received some additional towels and began washing the towels ourselves.  We never got the added washcloths, despite repeated requests.  The staff is friendly and nice, but they seem overwhelmed.  Things are not followed-through at all.  The place is in disrepair, and is frankly dirty.  We will never stay at Runaway Beach Club again.

title: Ok........Could be so much better
review: This place has all the potential to be a 5 star, but petty things hold it back at make it a 3 star.  Very clean and nice grounds to walk around and explore.  The pool are with a kids pool, adult pool, and hot tub was awesome.  It had a little bit for everybody.  It also had a tiki bar that was open some day and not open on others.  It also had a shuttle to Epcot which meant you needed to take some Disney type options to get to the other parks.  Here is where it goes downhill.  They are very stingy on their towels.  Asking for an extra towel or two is like saying bomb on an airplane.  It was forbidden.  My dad once asked for more towels and they gave him cleaning detergent to insists that he clean his own towels.  They only come into your place once a week and do not clean just…
