title: Great Quality for what we paid!
review: I recently stayed at Runaway for a week with my girlfriend.  We were down there to visit one of our friends at Disney.  When we checked in it was busy, but the staff at the front desk greeted us as if we were the only ones there.  Our condo was very spacious and comfortable, although there was some construction going on around us that was disturbing at times. There were a few issues with the room, our microwave did not work and we didn't have pans to cook with, but both of these issues were fixed in a quick and timely manner.  We did not spend a lot of time at the resort but from what we saw it was a beautiful property.  The one thing that stood out the most was the friendliness of the staff and their willingness to do whatever they could to make our stay great!

title: Poor customer service
review: I stayed in a 1 bedroom villa here with 2 other people. They gave us 2 towels, 2 hand towels, & 1 washcloth. When we asked for more they said we needed to wash what we had in the washer in the villa. There was supposed to be a coffee pot in the villa, but there was not. When we called the office they said they would bring it. That was at 5 pm. By 1030 pm we still didn't have a coffee pot, so we went & got it from the office just before it closed. The pool & spa were very clean & nice. It was relatively quiet there. The tub/shower was dirty when we got there.

title: Great value and location for the price
review: I spent 3 nights there for a business trip. Check in was seamless. Not a regular hotel so you are on your own for your bags, but the cost was half of local hotels. 2 large rooms for 2 bedrooms which included a large kitchen. Carpet was a little threadbare and TV's were old, but still not bad.  Greatest problem I had was getting the TV's to work. Each remote was different and I never got them to work write.

title: Fair price, clean unit, a worthwhile place to stay.
review: We wanted something reasonably priced in an area we felt safe in, close to parks / shopping, etc.  This fit the bill.  We had a 2nd floor 1 BR with a loft.  There weren't any pictures that I could see of this type of unit on the resort website, but I did find a unit on VRBO, and our unit turned out to be essentially the same thing.  The unit was reasonably modern in design - certainly not cutting edge, but as good as most hotels I've stayed in.  Overall it was clean, there was some dust on ceiling fans, but nothing extreme.   The furniture itself has seen it's best days, but it wasn't grubby or unusable.    Bedroom bedding was in good shape, along with the bedroom furniture.  Our 10 year old son used a pull out couch for sleep and had no issues, but I would not have wanted to…

title: Inexpensive, clean and all around perfect
review: We rented this site through Magical Memories Villas as part of a deal through Southwest Vacations.  The Villa was $52 a night so as you can imagine we were a bit leary.  The villa was HUGE and it was CLEAN.  2 Bedrooms, 2 full baths.  Kitchen area, full size washer and dryer, which my daughter has contact dermatitis, so I went to Wal Mart which is accross the street and bought the detergent we use and washed the sheets for her. We stayed for the week and went to Disney.  We used the pool almost every day.  The area was very clean as well.  The property was very very quiet.  They were renovating some of the units near us, but the construction did not interfere at all. I would recommend this to anyone and plan on returning.  There is no maid service, which is fine by me, but there…

title: Proceed with caution
review: I booked directly through the hotel but it might have been better to deal with an owner - not really sure.  Our unit was in the back - very quite except for noise from unit above and a long walk to the pool.  Unit (11-104) was not ready when we arrived - had to wait till around 5:00.  A lot of construction going on and 2 storage PODS where located in front of the unit making parking a little problematic.  Also they were right in front of the patio.  There was only 1 outside chair and a small table on the patio - both broken.  Curtain on patio door broken, the ice maker didn't work and there were no plugs in the bathroom sink or tub - all these were fixed right away after reported.  The new ice maker leaked and had to be fixed the next day.  The furniture was worn and upholstery…

title: BUYER BEWARE! SCAM ALERT!
review: I would like to start off by apologizing for your less than perfect stay. It is never our intent to have our guests have an unpleasant experience in any way while staying with us at Runaway Beach Club. It is true that we do have some construction currently going on to help maintain, improve, and brighten up Runaway Beach Club. We have also put a team in place to focus on all your concerns from cleanliness to comfort and to assure that this does not happen again. In addition I have met with all my department heads and I can assure you that we are moving forward with these areas to improve in quality and value. I again sincerely apologize and hope to get a second chance to earn your business.

title: Great condo, location and facilities
review: I booked directly through the hotel website and got a decent rate. When I got the total for the room, my $79 rate had a total of $106! No resort fee shown, it shows the entire increase as tax! That is a 35% tax rate! I checked the hotel tax for the county and it is 13%. Not sure how they are pulling this off, seems completely illegal to me although I am no attorney. I emailed the hotel for some explanation as to why they were ripping people off and what authority they had to claim that tax is 35%. Never received a response from them. Go ahead and check their website. It looks like they are doing it across the board. You will see it at the end of the reservation on the total. I will try to post a picture of it. Also, there is a $100 fee if you don't empty the trash from your room…

title: Great location to major theme parks.
review: I would like to start off by apologizing for the misunderstanding in resort fees, room rates and taxes. It is never our intent to have our guests have an unpleasant experience when booking with us as well as staying with us. When booking with Runaway Beach Club everyone receives an email stating the following: “Rates and a daily resort fee of $15.00 per day are quoted in U.S. funds and subject to applicable state and local taxes (please note that your resort fee and taxes are included in the tax amount.)” In this case the room rate was $79.00 + 13% ($10.27) = $89.27. The resort fee is $15.00 + 13% ($1.95) = $16.95. Therefore $89.27 + $16.95 = $106.22. In reference to emailing the hotel I sincerely apologize that no one ever responded.  I’m not sure what email address was used however you are more than welcome to email me anytime at jibanez@charlestownehotels.com. With the $100.00 fee for taking your garbage to the dumpster this is to simply help maintain the cleanliness of the resort.  Due to the weather in Florida we are subject to a lot of “critters” that most places would normally not be subject to. We implement certain policies, procedures and systems to make Runaway Beach Club a destination that people want to come to year after year and make memories to last a lifetime.

title: Close to Disney, but needs clean up
review: We selected this place based on location and wanted something big to sleep our group of 5 with a kitchen.  First impression was it was dirty!  Couches looked grimy, floors stained, baseboards filthy.  Also A/C didn't work first 3 of 5 days.  No phone in unit.  No working hairdryers.  Management took off some fees at checkout, but would not return.  I have since heard that units are privately owned and may have different degrees of upkeep.  Would not rent through the main office without knowing exactly which unit you are getting.

title: Stay away from this place unless you want nothing but problems your entire stay.
review: I would like to start off by apologizing for your less than perfect stay. It is never our intent to have our guests have an unpleasant experience in any way while staying with us at Runaway Beach Club. That said we have put a team in place to focus on all your concerns to assure that this does not happen again. I have also met with all my department heads and I can assure you that we are moving forward with cleanliness, quality and value. I again sincerely apologize and hope to get a second chance to earn your business.

title: Average stay....super clean unit....Noisy neighbors
review: We decided to take a trip up to Disney for the weekend with friends of ours so we rented 2 rooms. We had nothing but issues from check in. First, when you go in and turn on the lights BEWARE of roaches. They are under construction so we had a huge dumpster filled with garbage in front of our unit and to make matters worse the construction worker decided to take up 4 spaces in the front of the unit we rented with his truck and trailer. Getting four kids out of the car after a late night in Disney was so much fun with no parking and trying to carry them around a dumpster, truck, and trailer.  Then be prepared to be suddenly woken up at 7:30 am on a Saturday morning from that same construction guy that parked his truck in 4 spaces banging on your bedroom wall. I was scared to death…

title: average
review: We rented privately for our stay in February, 2013 from an owner (VRBO). We were greeted by a friendly front desk person during check in at the Club house and all went smoothly. We were given a gate access card and directions to the unit. Upon arrival we found the unit absolutely spotless! We couldn't have cleaned it better ourselves. We were in a second floor unit with a kitchen view of the pond. Very pretty. We had more than adequate towels and extra linens in the closet. There were some supplies left for us ( paper towels, toilet paper, bar soap) which was thoughtful, but we had anticipated a trip to the store. We did have a few issues, however during our stay: (1) Our kids (teenagers) each had a pull out sofa for the week long stay. We never expected that the sofa beds would…

title: We loved this place!!!!
review: We rented a deluxe King Bedroom for our disney vacation in Orlando from the runaway Beach club. The price was high(we paid about $99 /night). The location of the hotel is far from the disney world. With regard to the room, the bed needs to be updated. They do have a pool for the children. Overall, I think it was an OK stay.

title: Nice and Close to Everything
review: Ended up at Runaway Beach Club on accident after another resort in the area we booked was horrible. Runaway Beach Club is 1st of all in an ideal location if doing the parks in Orlando. We were all of 5 mins to downtown Disney. There is also a Walmart and Grocery store with in walking distance to the resort The room itself was nice we were in a 2 bedroom condo, good size living room, kitchen, and dinning area. Master bedroom was nice and master bath was huge! Second bedroom had 2 queens beds which worked out great for my brother and sister in law traveling with us. Room had a full size washer and dryer which worked out perfect since we were there for 2 weeks. Pool was very nice and they had a separate splash pad area for the little ones! Will defiantly stay here again!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Great for large groups/families
review: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the resort, its amenities and it proximity to all that Orlando has to offer. We are always finding new ways to better our resort and appreciate positive feedback from our guests. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

title: Nice place about 5 Miles from the parks that's about 1/3 the price of a Disney resort.
review: I've taken several groups to Orlando, and have always stayed here. The rooms are very comfortable with a full kitchen, dishes, refrigerator, pretty much a home away from home. The pool is ok, not that we ever had time to do much swimming anyway. It's not too far at all from Disney world or Universal. It's actually closer to Disney. Good rates.

title: Not the best...not the worst!
review: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad to hear that you and your group enjoyed your stay with us here at Runaway Beach Club and we cant wait to welcome you back. We are always finding new ways to better our resort and appreciate positive feedback from our guests. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

title: Run away beach club
review: I chose this for a family trip because they are essentially little apartments that have kitchens etc...and I didn't feel like breaking the bank.  It is not a full service resort with restaurants or room service but I knew this coming in. They do have a small tiki bar by the pool.  The pool is nice and relaxing.  If you don't mind being a few miles away from Disney and want a bigger villa style place with an affordable price this would work well for you.  If you want a traditional hotel with more amenities you wont be pleased.

title: Such a shame...so much potential.
review: This place is SO CUTE on the outside. Nice lobby, great looking buildings, and at first glance the rooms seem fantastic. Great for a week at the theme parks, with full kitchens, living rooms, tons of closet space, etc.   The first room we were given had wasps and moths everywhere. The maintenance person (Josh - SUPER nice) advised the front desk to move us, as the nest was up too high for him to be able to take care of it during our stay. I didn't mind, as the room was not clean at all. The carpets were very dirty (not sure they had even been vacuumed before we checked in), the utensils and plates were dirty, the bathtub was gross, and there was something resembling nail polish all over the wall as you entered the unit via the stairs. The TVs did not work well.  Our next room…

title: Resort looks good in pictures ......but believe the reviews
review: I would like to start off by apologizing for your less than perfect stay. It is never our intent to have our guests have an unpleasant experience in any way while staying with us at Runaway Beach Club. That said we have put a team in place to focus on all your concerns to assure that this does not happen again.  We have also had any wasp nests that were found close to where you stayed removed and had the area treated. I have also met with all my department heads and I can assure you that we are moving forward with cleanliness, quality and value. I again sincerely apologize and hope to get a second chance to earn your business.

title: Checked in... And checked right out .
review: We chose this resort because the usual resort we stay at was full.  We have 3 kids so we like the space of a condo.  We chose this place because of the kids water play area and pool.  The kids did enjoy the pool area. I had read other reviews prior to selecting this resort. Our room could have used some updating but we are ok with outdated items but cleanliness and customer service are very important. Many of the negative things I read in other reviews were true.  These things are what we experienced : creepy hair in tub drain, bottom of bath tub dingy, not enough drinking glasses or silverware, food on silverware and plates from previous guests, half smoked cigarette under nightstand, no one at front desk at check out. We were also surprised by a resort fee that was not…

title: Should be called the rundown beach club!
review: I would like to start off by apologizing for your less than perfect stay.  It is never our intent to have our guests have an unpleasant experience in any way while staying with us at Runaway Beach Club. That said I have also met with all my department heads and I can assure you that we are moving forward with cleanliness, quality and value. I again sincerely apologize and hope to get a second chance to earn your business.

title: Great place to stay!
review: My friend and I checked in for a fun weekend getaway.  We were both disgusted by the quality of the two bedroom villa. When we entered the room, we were hit with a musty smell of some sort. We thought it would go away once we turned the air on. It did not. I felt as though I was having an allergy attack of some sort. The linens in the bedrooms were very outdated and not comfy. The light in one bedroom did not work. There was no dish soap in the kitchen. The bottom of both bathtubs were extremely dirty. Walls desperately in need of painting. We left after a few hours to check into a nicer hotel. We did get a full refund with no hassle.

title: A perfect getaway from Disney
review: We rented a two bedroom unit for 3 adults and 2 kids ($100/night) and it worked out wonderful.  At the end of a Disney day (Typhoon lagoon), we appreciated the 'hometown' atmosphere, great facilities (washer and dryer) and spacious rooms.  Given the facilities this place was a steal.  Kissimmee, like most of Orlando has one of everything to eat, shop and otherwise spend money.  Runaway is three miles from downtown Disney so it's easy to give Walt more of your loot.

title: Lots of space little WOW
review: The place was spacious and for the price and you do get alot of room but dont expect any thing fancy. We had 4 kids and 2 adults so the 2 bedroom we considered to be enough room bc of the fold out couch bed.. BUT the couch bed was broke....I wanted a place with washer and dryer and when we got there the dryer never would work. I called the front office but they never fixed it. Then the sink leaked under the cabinet and I called to let them know but no one ever came. I would say if your looking for alot of space for a cheap price its a good deal but be prepared for little maintance. OH and you can hear EVERYTHING if anyone is above or next to you. Walls are paper thin!

title: Great location and great prices!
review: We recently returned home from a two week visit to Florida. 12 of those nights were spent at the Runaway Beach Club. We booked online but I ended up calling down to make sure that we had truly booked with the Runaway Beach Club proper and not an offsite company that rents out villas in Runaway Beach Club. Assured I had made the proper reservations I relaxed until the trip. We arrived on the Monday and checked in quickly. Getting to the villa we were initially impressed with the space and layout of the villa. This initial impression would stay with us throughout our entire stay although there were a couple minor, negligible things that would be nice to see changed and improved for future visits. The ONLY problem we had with our particular villa was with the dryer. There was a…

title: Clean, pretty and spacious
review: I booked a one night stay at the Runaway Beach Club in a 2 bedroom condo through groupon. The price I got through groupon was amazing. A total of $100 with tax and fee for 4 adults. The condo was very spacious and clean. The only downside was that we were close to the road and could hear traffic through part of the night in one of the rooms.

title: Great prices!
review: We stayed in a 1 BR, 1 BA (1 king in bedroom). Ceiling fans and central a/c. Sofas in LR also open up to Beds. Full size kitchen. Wal-Mart and Publix close by for supplies and if you don't feel like cooking there are a number of good eating places close by. Old town is also close by. Beautiful pool area (and hot tub) and separate kiddie pool area, indoor half basketball court, & exercise room with TV. The service was excellent!  Some reviews I read weren't good; I was impressed and will be back soon. Especially with the front desk who noticed that we were smokers and asked if we would like a villa that had a porch on it and let us check it out before we checked in. We had a combined business and family trip.

title: Great suites! Great prices!
review: My family and I love the Runaway Beach Club. The prices are great. You get a roomy suite with 3 bedrooms, living room, 2 bathrooms, and a full size, beautiful kitchen. We had a cute porch, too. The suites are completely updated, beautiful decor, granite counter tops, etc. Outside, the townhouses are brightly colored and cute. Three families can stay in one place, save money by cooking food, and stay at a great resort! The pool area is spacious, quiet, and beautiful. There is a pretty lake next to it, too. The resort is never overcrowded, which is very nice! We didn't see much of service people, though, which could be improved.

title: Great Pool Area...poor customer service
review: We loved the idea of having a 1 BR villa, and the location of this property is fantastic (very close to Wal-Mart as well).  The room was fine...dated...but fine.  It seemed relatively clean as far as hotels go.  Very dusty ceiling fans, vents, and fixtures.  None of the remotes worked.  The pool area was great for us (have a 20 mo. old), but you could see that the property is starting to age very quickly.    They outsource a lot of their cleaning services, and this includes the towel service for the pool.  They didn't have towels at the front desk for us for the 2 days we went down to the pool area.  They gave us a hand towel after the third time we checked, and it had a huge stain on it.  The towel service wouldn't be that big of a deal, but you would think when you pay a…

title: A lot of bang for the buck
review: We normally stay on Disneyworld property when we go to Orlando, but needing a three bedroom accomodation we decided our dollars would be better spent nearby. We were right.  If you are looking for fancy furniture or a lot of personal attention, Runaway Beach Club is not for you, but if you want a lot of room in a clean, comfortable, convenient location, you can look for your best price here.  For maybe twenty dollars more than we would have paid for a standard room at one of the value resorts at WDW, we got a large 3 bedroom condo maybe ten minutes away. The master had a king bed with plenty of room to move around, a flat screen tv with cable, and a private bathroom with a ginormous walk in closet. The other two bedrooms were also decent sized, one pleasant surprise is one of…

title: Great Location, Home away from Home
review: This was the 15th time I have stayed at this hotel.  I have always had a great experience.  Rooms are big and clean.  So close to everything.  Staff is very nice.  This time we had the 2 bedroom loft, had three beds that pulled out and made beds, not that we needed it, but nice to have just in case.

title: Great family place to stay!
review: Art & Tracy were the best staff ever!! We stayed this weekend 5/10/13 in a two bedroom for a Girl Scout trip. The place was clean, spacious and like a nice condo. Runaway is great for families or multipule families, because it had a full kitchen, eating space, livingroom, wash & dryer, two bathrooms plus two pull out couches. Art helped us with our reservation and was so personable and helpful. I worked in hotel mgt & he is a gem! We loved Runaway so much we decided to stay next weekend with Two other families. I wanted to see the 3 bedroom to make sure we had enough room and Tracy showed us around, going above and beyond to show us a few different units. She was truly the friendliest person in housekeeping that I have ever met. If she isn't head of housekeeping & a manager she…

title: Great deal, especially for 3 couples, one night!
review: We only were going to WDW for one day with four friends and found this gem @ $60 / couple.  Just a few moments from Disney. The kitchen was fully equipped, if needed.  The rooms were very clean.  We requested and were provided with early check- in.  We did not use the pools nor any of the other amenities, as we spent the entire day out at Disney and at a restaurant at night, Texas Brazilian Steakhouse (see another review).

title: Good
review: Thank you for taking the time to put such a great review on Trip Advisor ! I remember you well on Sunday, and I am so pleased I was able to accomadate your early check in request.  I hope I get the chance to welcome you back to Runaway Beach Club real soon. I will have to read your other review with regards to the steak house too. We have many guest requesting information on difterent eaterys in the area, and appreciate you taking the time to note that as well. Again, thank you for such an amazing review !

title: Clean, Family-Friendly Resort
review: The place was very clean, close to so much. Pool was nice. Would go again. Got a good rate from Groupon. My only downside was no food on the premises. Also the kid pool was closed. But like I said would go again.

title: Runaway from Runaway Beach Club
review: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. Firstly, I would like to apoligize for the constuction of our kiddie pool and like you as well, we will be pleased when all is finished with the retaining wall. We are please to say that our Tiki bar will be up and running this weekend with a light menu of tastey pool side treats.We have received other comments from guest about the kiddie pool and tiki bar, and I apolize to everyone about this inconvience. I invite you back again, to truley experience everything we have to offer here at Runaway Beach Club.

title: John Cusack
review: We just finished an 8-day stay at the Runaway Beach Club and enjoyed it very much.    The 1-bedroom unit was huge and included a sunroom type of space where the kids slept with a big loft bed.  All of the rooms were large, nicely-lit, and very clean.  We were quickly able to get extra towels and bed linens.  The kitchen was very complete and had complimentary coffee & dishwasher detergent until we had a chance to stock up on food and supplies at the nearby Walmart and Publix.  And yes, we did have to buy dishtowels as well as toilet paper and paper towels.    The 2 pools were perfect for my 6 & 8 year olds and usually had other kids their age to play with.  I never saw anyone in the tiki bar, which was find by me.  I would consider this a family location rather than a young…

title: Vacation with 3 families, 2 infants
review: Runaway Beach Club -a mix of residences and rental units-has colorful gingerbread houses around a pond & walkways perfect for pushing a baby carriage. The pool steps run the LENGTH of the pool, so younger kids play on the steps without being in the way &the 5' DEEP end is opposite, so adults can face the kids on the steps. A hot tub is 30’ away. The KIDDIE pool is FANTASTIC!  It has zero entry & is perfect for toddlers with handicap access for Grandma & siblings. Adults can interact with the children IN the pool up to 5’ depth. Overlooking the pond is a deck with rows of lounge chairs - for napping in the sun. A Tiki Bar is nearby. There is an indoor basketball half-court, & a snack bar near the business office. They offer 2-bedrm & 3-bedrm units - WIFI accessible. We book at…

title: 2 families, 2 units, 7 great days
review: Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review on Trip Advisor!  I am so pleased we were able to make your stay with us such an enjoyable experience.  I could not have explained it any better than you did with all the resort has to offer. Thank you again to take the time to write such a wonderful review !

title: Great Place, Great Location
review: Everything went very well during our stay.  We had 2 units a 2 bedroom and a 1 bedroom.  Kids loved the pools and basketball court.  Very nice property, well maintained.  Extreamly close to the attractions with plenty of restaurants and shopping centers minutes away.  Units were clean, spacious and comfortable.  Could have fit both families in the 2 bedroom unit, but it was nice to have our own.  No issues at all.  Great value, highly recommended, will return.

title: Beware if you must!
review: 1 resort,  1 happy front desk manager, 1 GREAT review !  As the front desk manager, it makes my day to read such a great review!  Thank you for taking the time to write about Runaway beach club. I hope other guest take the time to notice all the points of interest you have taken the time to write about with our location.  It was our pleasure to have had you as guest, and we so look forward to welcoming you back to our resort !

title: What happened to service?
review: I almost want to keep this little gem to myself, but here you go... Great place, family friendly, very helpful front desk folks, they let me use their office PC to print out some things, let me use the pool before check -in, and had my suite ready about 2pm. I was in Building 13, and it was quiet and well maintained. I was on the back side of the building and enjoyed great privacy. Gated, which I liked, great pool, and hot tub.   A couple Cons, first the bed was horribly sagging in our one bedroom unit, if you rolled toward the side it would literally bend the springs and roll you out...not cool. I don't get it, great bathroom, and kitchen but crappy bed? The kitchen had utensils, pots/pans dishware etc... all clean and well taken care of. Another Con was they were doing…

title: Home away from home
review: The villas were great, the rooms were nice and roomy, we loved the location we woyld most definitely return. The beds were like sleeping on clouds. This place is nice for a family. Our stay was 8days and 7 nights. Loved it.

title: Spacious and Comfortable
review: I am pleased that we were able to make your stay with us seem like home away from home! Thank you for taking the time to write the positvie things you had to say about our resort. It has been our pleasure having you as guest, and eagerly await your next stay with us. Thank you

title: Runaway -   Yes ! RUN AWAY !!!!
review: My Girlfriend and I stayed here for two nights and had a wonderful stay. Very spacious and comfortable apartment style like rooms. The king bed was very comfortable and Staci, the lady at the front desk, was very pleasant. We took their complimentary shuttle to Disney. Will stay again the next time im in the Orlando area.

title: Very spacious, just fine for the price.
review: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay with us. I am so pleased we were abe to make such an impact with your vacation to the Orlando area. It was very nice of you to point out our front desk agent Staci as well. I am pleased to say that Staci was nominated as employee of the month, and reviews like yours just help reinforce our commitment to strive for great customer service. Thanks again for taking the time to share your positive review with Trip Advisor !

title: Roomy, but lacking the basics
review: Stayed there for one night (Mar 13 2013).  The new management setup has ruined the place!  First we were given a card key to a room that had already been occupied !!  Next, the key cards we were given for the CORRECT room would not open the door.  Once inside, we noticed the light bulb on the kitchen exhaust fan was burnt out.  The bedroom ceiling light bulb was also burnt out.    The "highlight" of our night was around 11:30pm when we attempted to use the washing machine.  A loose belt caused the drum to scrape against the side of the housing causing LOUD SCREECHING noises.  (Apologies to you below us and next to us if you are reading this).  We attempted to call the front desk only to find the kitchen phone with no dial tone.  The next option was to obviously use the bedroom…

title: Going to Disney with Kids?  Stay here!
review: I recently visited visited this resort wih a family group. We had a 3 bedroom unit. This was by far the best value for the money I have had and this was my 14th trip to Disney. It took us 10 minutes to get to the main gate of the Magic Kingdom by car. There is a shuttle but the car was faster.  Lots of restaurants and a Public's nearby - but you need a car to get to them.  The gentleman at the front desk - Art- was so nice and couldn't have done enough to make us feel welcome. He really knows how to treat the guests!  It is quiet here an very lovely grounds. There is a separate kiddie pool. The kitchen was really nice and there are plenty of beds. We slept 7 people comfortably and could have had at least 3 more if we used the foldout sofa beds.  Would come back here in a minute.

title: Front desk excellence!
review: WOW!  Thank you for taking the time to write such an amazing review. I could not have told our future guest enough about our location to the Disney Parks and other points of interest as well as you did. The free shuttles to the major theme parks, the unlimited dining areas, and convient shopping all within 1 mile of our resort is truley a perk when you book with us. I thank you for mentioning me is your review, and look forward to welcoming you back to Runaway Beach Club ! Thank you again !

title: Buy Cheap, buy twice: Bed Bugs in Condo 20-101
review: From the minute we stepped foot into the lobby of Runaway Beach Club our party was treated like old friends!  The funny thing is, it was our first visit to Runaway Beach Club!   Our "friend" at the front desk, "Art" did everything and beyond to make us comfortable, give helpful suggestions and ensure we were happy!  We are well seasoned travelers and agreed we had never been treated so well!   We would come back here for that reason alone!

title: Good experience
review: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your experience with our hotel. I can honestly say you have made my day with your review. I traveled for many years myself as flight crew  in my past, and knew how I too liked to have been treated as a guest in a hotel , and try to bring that to our guest here at Runaway Beach Club Resort. I am very pleased I was able to add something to your trip, and I look forward to giving you the same experience if not better the next time your in the Kissimmee/ Orlando area... Thanks again

title: very old condo
review: I stayed at the Runaway Beach Club from March 4th-8th, 2013. We arrived around 6 pm and were looking forward to getting settled and rested for our first day at Disney the next morning. However, when we arrived in our condo, the first thing I did was check out the rooms and the beds. I saw the earlier posting about bed bugs and I always do a check whenever I stay away from home. I was extremely disgusted when I saw blatantly obvious bed bugs in the seam on the master bed mattress. I told my family to pack it up and we were getting out! I picked up a few of the bugs on a kleenex and placed them in a ziploc bag. I brought them to the front desk and the gentleman working seemed suprised as well. We were given another room and I thoroughly checked that place as well. There didn't…

title: Dec 2012 Florida Vacation
review: Our first trip to Florida was enjoyable except for the 7 days we spent at Runnaway Beach Club. When we arrived, we were given a 2 bedroom however the fridge was not working properly. We ask them to change the fridge but they have a policy that no furniture must be moved. We went to a birthday party on Dec 26 and returned at 11:30pm in the night with 4 kids, the youngest 9mths old and was told we had to move to another villa at that time of the night. We were disappointed but moved anyway. When we got to the next villa, we awoke the next morning to find roaches in the kitchen. We informed front desk and they claim it was water bugs (like only they know what roaches look like). We had like 2 more days when they asked us to move to another villa. My husband went to talk to the…

title: very nice for the price
review: We stayed here 2 nights, and the 2 bedroom villa was great for the price - nice, clean, comfortable, and close to Disney World, about 10 minutes; also many, many restaurants very close.  I have read bad reviews, and we have stayed here twice now, and no complaints.  ( 2 of the remotes for the TV did not work, but we didn't come just to watch TV, so it was okay)  We were on the second floor, which I would advise as I guess it can be noisy if you are on the 1st floor, and there is a family above you.  When we arrived they were fixing the disposal, so they do maintainenance.  They do have limited transportation to the parks which can save you the $14 parking fee, we used this the first time. I have already told several of my friends about this place, and we will come back if we go…

title: Great short stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Overall, I am pleased you enjoyed you stay with us, but I do apoligize for some of the issues with the remotes and garbage disposal you encountered.  Thank you also for sharing some tips with future guest with our resort and pointing our things like ground floors and locations. This could add information, and perhaps make someones stay with us more enjoyable ! Again, thank you for your review.

title: Best stay yet
review: I stayed at the runaway beach club for two nights  from feb 26 2013 and left on feb 28 the resort room was clean and convenient to local attractions , check in was fast and everyone from the front desk to the ground keepers were very helpful. overall had a great stay , would recommend they update the televisions and some of the room decor . Would stay again , thinking of going back in 3 weeks

title: Positive Experience & Would Stay Again
review: I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us, and I am very happy you would consider us again on a future trip to Kissimmee. Thank you for taking the time to mention the things you mentioned. Unlike a standard hotel, our rooms are owned individually by owners, and while its true some of the owners have updated some things (like tvs)  it sometimes takes a guest to note these things here so they too can see what guest are saying to make improvements. We appreciate all your feed back, and look forward to welcoming you back again !

title: BED BUGS!!!
review: Covered in bed bug bites!! after complaining to the front desk I was told some type of compensation could be given. I then got a call from management saying nothing would be refunded!!!!! This cut our trip short not to mention I was terribly uncomfortable!!! STAY AWAY!!!

title: Much needed vacation
review: I would like to take the time now and state our side of your complaint. The very next day, when you came down to inform the front desk about your issue with us, we moved you within that hour and upgraded you to a much larger unit. We proceeded to credit you for the night of your stay, but you demanded a total credit for you entire 4 day stay with us. We sent and exterminator to your original room and they informed us nothing was found in the room. We also have invoices to show that the beds that were in your original room were new and never before used, you in fact were the first guest to ever occupy that unit and sleep on the new beds. You also stated you ended you vacation early, which is not the case with our hotel, you did stay your entire time with us, and continued to inform the front desk manager you would indeed send a response to Trip Advisor about this issue if we did not credit you back your entire stay. I feel that my front desk went over and beyond to compensate you, and tried everything to please you, but unfortunately, you were not going to be unless we gave all money back for something that was never true.

title: Definitely met my Family's needs!!
review: We had a wonderful time.  If it would not havebeen for MaryAnn and her wonderful customer service, along with willingness to help, we would not of been able to share our time with our friends.  The accomendations met our needs and expectations.  A lot of times you read the you will receive a condo and end up with a hotel room.  I wish we had more time to spend there however we do plan to return in the near future.  Thank you again for the warm welcome we received.

title: Problem with booking agent
review: I have read all of the terrible reviews, and I have concluded that the visitors just had some really unfortunate circumstances. This condo was perfect for my family of 4 for our 7 nights stay in Disney. I loved the 2 bedrooms / with separate beds in one room, so that my kids didn't have to sleep together. The condo was very clean and well cared for. Housekeeping added personal touches to make our room warm and inviting. We didn't use the pool or the fitness center but walked around them and the facilities looked superb. My kids loved the cookies in the lobby. I didn't feel threatened at all going to and from my car in this gated community. We walked to the nearby al-Mart and restaurants. I also loved having the microwave and fridge. The freezer worked well. The condo complex was…

title: Very dirty...
review: WOW ! what a great review ! I cannot thank you enough for taking the time to share this review with everyone here on Trip Advisor !  I am so pleased we were able to meet your expectations. I have shared this with our housekeeping department as well, and they too were quite pleased you took the time to notice their hard work too.  I am happy you took the time to read other guest reviews and decided to give us a chance with some of the less favorable things guest write here. Again,  Thank you for taking the time to allow us to be a part of your vacation to Kissimmee, and hope we will be top on your list for future plans to Florida.

title: This would be my first choice coming back to Orlando
review: We stayed at one of the three bedroom units at Mike Ditka. We came with two teens and two young `uns so there was six of us. It was a great layout for us, spacious and clean with two bathrooms and a full kitchen although we didn't really use the kitchen.   The grounds are very nice and the entrance is secured with an automated gate. We were able to park right in front of our unit to unload and then move to close by general parking, which there seemed to be plenty.  We had french doors opening to a small patio out front. The wifi was a bit touch and go at our unit, it was better out in the parking lot then inside our place. I'm not sure where they put the access points.   The supplies were a bit thin, it was good that we brought our own soap. The resort can be tricky to find at…

title: A few things would make this an excellent value
review: Thank you for taking the time to share such a positive review with you trip to Kissimmee. I hope with your future trip to Runaway Beach club you will allow us with Charlestowne Runaway Beach club to have a chance to welcome you as guest. again, thanks again for sharing this review.

title: John Cusack
review: My family of four (parents + two adult children) stayed here the week between Christmas and New Year's. We had a two-bedroom, two-bath condo and found it was spacious, contemporary, and clean. There is ample parking close to your front door, and the resort is quiet and well-kept.  A few things were issues for us (hence the four out of five stars). The first is the free wireless. While it is free, we could get a signal in only one room of the condo, and it was such a weak signal that it was useless. When I asked about it at the front desk, their advice was to use wireless while in the lobby (not at all what we had in mind). We travel with an array of smart phones and tablets, and could not use wireless with any of them.  The second is that the web site advertises shuttle service…

title: The rooms were dirty and needed a lot of repairs.
review: Stayed at Runaway Beach Club for a long Holiday  weekend and was very impressed. I do a lot of travelling for both business and realaxation and have to say this is one of the better place I have found in the Orlando area. Check in was  quick  ( right on property) and a gentleman by the name of Art   was one of the most cordial and efficient front desk agents I have run across in a long time. We had a 1 bedroom unt and it was  a great size for 4. Great location would recommend it highly

title: Excellent service and location!! Exceptionally Clean!!
review: I am pleased to note that our services and facilities were to your satisfaction. Your positive feedback about our hotel is deeply appreciated and has been communicated to all the members of my team. I once again thank you for your valuable comments and look forward to the pleasure of your continued visits and assure you of the best in service and hospitality at Runaway Beach Club. Art was more than pleased you mentioning him in your response. As he put it, With John Cusack commenting on him and our resort, what more could you ask for ?

title: great hidden gem
review: this hotel realy is the best place to stay if you are taking your family to the nearby fun. it is realy close to the disney parks, it is walking distance to a walmart, super clean and the staff is very helpful, Denice and Marianne were very helpful and took care of us with a warm smile on their face. i will defebetly be returning to this hotel not to mention that the price is perfect the 6 people in our family slept happy and all in their own bed ( 2 bedroom villa)

title: Other Management Co. at this site is cheaper
review: Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review. I am very pround when I hear such amazing things about the front desk agents, and I am pleased you took the time to include them in your review. I look forward to your return to Runaway Beach Club, and again, Thank you

title: It really IS a "home away from home"
review: We stayed for 2 nights recently, and though we had stayed here in the past, this was the most run down unit we've stayed at.  Old carpetting, ceiling fans wobbling, sofa not in great condition, no dish soap, etc.  Also, we found out that the other management company on this site has cheaper rooms.  If we stay here again, we will go through the other company.  Also, you have to check in off-site which is quite inconvenient.

title: We always come back!
review: it seems to me that you booked with the previous management company and I apoligize that your trip to Runaway Beach Club was less than favorable. I invite you back real soon, and please, allow the new management company to impress you and perhaps become your number one hotel in the kissimmee/ Orlando area. Thank you for taking the time to write this review.

title: Runaway Beach Club ... Do what the name says runaway
review: I recently went on a trip to Florida for four weeks where, after doing extensive research online, I figured I'd take my chances with the Runaway Beach Club.   I'll admit I was a bit nervous, since I decided to make this place my home for almost an entire month, but online they claimed it was "a home away from home," and it looked really nice and cute with the colorful houses surrounding the little lake. A few reviews seemed to be negative, but to be honestly the tone in those remined me of a pissy old aunt I have who makes it a hobby to go to great lengths to find faults with everyone and everything, also the clear majority of reviews were highly positive, and a lot of them were regular guests so THAT tells me plenty.   But the regular guests weren't lying. It really was a home…

title: Couldn't be better
review: We stayed 1 month in the Club. The place is very nice, with a perfect pool and a lake view. The gardens are very well maintained, and they also have a service to the parks (Disney and Universal). Our house was extremely clean with all the facilities that we need to cook and relax. All the houses are almost the same. We rent directly to the owner but we know that is possible to rent with very good prices directly to the Runaway Club. The location is perfect and they have all the facilities around (Wal Mart, Publix Supermarket, restaurants, etc ...)  If you need some help Deniece and all staff will could help you !! Couldn't be better !!

title: We are definitely coming back!!
review: I am pleased to note that our services and facilities were to your satisfaction. Your positive feedback about our hotel is deeply appreciated and has been communicated to all the members of my team. I once again thank you for your valuable comments and look forward to the pleasure of your continued visits and assure you of the best in service and hospitality at Runaway Beach Club. I have shared your review with Deniece, and she was thrilled you took the time to mention her in your review.  Thank you again!

title: Great layout - loved the A-Frame livingroom/kitchen area.
review: My boss and I came up to Orlando for business and to check out the Makeup Show and we stayed at a mainstream hotel the first night we got to orlando and hated the fact that we paid over $150 and there was not even a microwave or refrigerator in our room. We heard about Runaway Beach Club and decided to relocate during our stay to one of their rooms and were surprised to find that not only did it have the basic amenities we needed, it was a fully furnished house with a full kitchen, dining and silver ware, washer/dryer, multiple sofa beds, and get this, walk-in closets, all for around $75 less than what we paid at the substandard hotel the night before! The hotel "house" room was clean, the property is well kept, there is two pools, and an outdoor jacuzzi. It has a very relaxed,…

title: Great place to stay for the price
review: I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with us at Runaway Beach Club, and indeed for taking the time to write your wonderful review. It was an absolute pleasure and honor to read all of the fantastic positive feedback about your recent stay with us. Thank you very much. We strive on a daily basis in every area of the hotel to exceed our guest’s expectations, and I am thrilled that we exceeded yours. It really means a great deal to me and all of the team and it gives a great boost of morale for all. Thank you again. It would be my personal pleasure to welcome you back to Runaway Beach Club, hopefully in the very near future.  I have shown Manny, Nick and Art all the positive things you had to say about them. You remembering and taking the time to mention them by name shows me they truley left a lasting impression. Art sends his best to you both, and is looking forward to welcoming you back soon !

title: I would go back any day
review: Could not be happier w/ or top floor unit.  A-frame, for the kitchen and living room areas, make the place feel so spacious.   Great light in the unit as well, as there were plenty of windows.   Kitchen had marble countertops and was well stocked w/ plates, utensils, pots & pans.   Microwave and toaster were cheap and dated, but that was no issue for us.  Carpets and couch are older as well, but again this wasn't an issue.  Floors might be a bit thin though, as whenever our kids were running around the unit, the neighbors below would rap their broom stick on the celling.   So if you have young rambunctious kids, this place might not be the best fit.  Other than that, I highly recommend this place - and will definitely be coming back.

title: Mike Ditka Runaway Beach Club STAY AWAY!
review: MAKE SURE YOU STAY WITH CHARLESTOWNE NOT MIKE DITKA. MIKE DITKA RUNAWAY BEACH CLUB STAFF ARE HORRIBLE.MIKE DITKA ARE PRIVATLEY OWNED APARTMENTS AND THE OFFICE IS OFFSITE.   When we made the booking on booking.com we were unaware that these apartments are privately owned and staff are not onsite to help you. Charlestowne staff are unable to help you with anything due to legally not owning these apartments. They can't even give us towels or toilet paper, although they are apologetic that they can not help us more.  The free shuttle service that Mike Ditka advertised on booking.com was not running and had not been running for 6 months. The pool facilities onsite were old and rundown and the tiki bar was closed the entire time.  We had a major situation with our in-room safe that…

title: Excellent Rooms
review: I thank you for sparing time for providing your valuable feedback on Trip Advisor. My front desk supervisor had told me about your unfortunate situation, and I appreciate you taking the time and letting me know about my staff lending and ear and showing sympathy for everything you were going through. We appreciate this feed back and you understanding the differences of the other mangement companies on property. We look forward perhaps in the future as to have you as a guest with Charlestowne Runaway Beach Club.  Hope you had a safe flight back down under.

title: do NOT stay here, stay in COUNTRY INN instead! AVOID
review: We stayed for 2 nights and from the pictures on the website I thought what I was getting was just a room and that the other stuff was an upgrade so when we walked into a house we were shocked! And for the price we paid we did not expect that. We enjoyed the stay and we look forward to staying there next time. The only negative things I have to say is as I have seen in another review the shower curtain was moldy I think they should replace those...the tv situation was quite annoying (even for my 12yr old) flipping through every single channel..the towel situation was bad, only providing 2 at a time then we had to call for more and they were half the size and kind of rough, the pool towel situation was even worse..went back 3 times for pool towels after they kept saying they were…

title: Runaway Beach Club NOT Runaway Beach etc
review: I am pleased to note that the service along with the facilities provided by our team were able to create a pleasant memory for you. Your appreciation of the Runaway Beach Club Team is encouraging and motivating. Hope to see you back soon at Runaway Beach Club. I apoligize on the behalf of my houskekeeping team as we are making every effort possible to improve this area

title: FAMILY RESORT NEAR DISNEY(3 miles) With Great Amenities
review: first of this room the room was supposed to fit up to 6 people, however it only fits 4.   my real concern and issue comes with the service I received. it is good to point out this complex is situated in the calypso cay complex which has other hotels in such as country inn which is 2 seconds opposite. now when this holiday was booked off of Expedia is was done so under the premises of booking runaway beach club plus plane tickets. I therefore believe I booked runaway beach club. I now refer to the comment below made about different management, that is up to the hotel to sort if a customer has booked to stay at runaway they should not be blamed for internal management issues and mistakes during our stay.   during our stay we received free buses to Disney world the first 2 days…

title: Best Deal in Town
review: Love the Runaway Beach Club, such a relaxing atmosphere.  We had a 3 day scrapbook retreat here last weekend and it was just great.  A special thanks to Maria Carney for making it so smooth and easy and like "home away from home"

title: scrapbook weekend
review: I am pleased to read you found our hotel outstanding and our staff friendly. Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us, as it best evaluates our product and services offerings. Ultimately, you serve as the best quality auditor.

title: Not as bad as the reviews suggest.....Very good
review: I spent the weekend here a scrapbook retreat. It was set up by Maria Teresa Carney. Had a wonderful time! We were set up in the basketball court and had lots of room. The lighting was great for scrapbooking and the 8 foot tables provided lots of working space. The staff was very accomadating to our late hours. I stayed in a 3 bedroom unit with several other scrappers and we had plenty of room. The rooms were clean and it was nice to have a kitchen. Thanks Maria for helping us have  such a fun weekend. Look foward to our next retreat there!

title: Nice comfortable fun
review: We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for the feedback! It is wonderful to hear from our valued repeat customers and appreciate your continued patronage. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: Very reasonable price for a two-bedroom, two-bath space
review: We stayed there for a family Disney vacation in the last week of August.  A comfy king bed (One of the most comfy beds to sleep on....Did not want to wake up the next day, seriously, after a tiring day at Disney).....Great amenities.  A big coat-shoe closet.  Pretty cozy couches.  Both living room & bed room have ceiling fans.  Spacious kitchen(we cooked on all days that we stayed there.  (DO NOT forget to take dishwasher detergent & laundry detergent.  We did not.  We brought Tide Action pacs & Finish dishwash tabs, very convenient than powders or liquids).  Clean bathroom with sample toiletries (although not sufficient, come on, let's be reasonable), hair-dryer and a spacious closet.  Compact bedroom with big storage chest and a TV and a ROOMY walk-in closet.  Lots of storage…

title: Ok...but needs a little work
review: My family and I recently spent two nights at Runaway Beach Club. While the layout of the rooms were great, some of the furniture is in need of replacement. There were a few stains on the couch in the living area; as well as, on the carpet. Overall, the stay was ok; however, the resort rooms are in need of a few updates (including modern television sets) new carpet, and new furniture. With a bit of TLC and a few updates, Runaway Beach Club would be a great place to stay!

title: Highly recommended!! Will come back!!
review: Firstly we would like to thank you for putting up a review for our hotel and I hope you have enjoyed your overall stay in Kissimmee/Orlando. Our sincerest apologies for the negative experience on your first visit to Runaway Beach Club and we hope you will afford us the opportunity to make it up to you in the future. Constructive criticism is always appreciated and it is only through this that we can ensure we keep improving in order to up the quality of our services.

title: Horrible Customer Service - Someone Stole My Pillow!
review: Stayed 4 nights from 8/26/12-8/29/12, had 2nd floor villa with 1 bedroom, very spacious, vaulted ceiling and spacious bathroom! Fridge got ice maker. must provide own laundry detergent and dish detergent.Complete kitchen appliances(coffemaker and toaster, pans) and flatware; TV with dvd player too! Towels provided and expect to wash own towels although pool towels are provided. Pool was awesome! very clean surroundings and spa pool awesome too! Friendly staff. Coffeemaker was defective and got a new one right away! Cant complain for a reasonably priced villa near Disneyworld, international drive and Universal studios! Found this place from Groupon but can also book with them directly via phone and will be charged once checked- in.Very flexible with nights stay- money refundable…

title: Discusting, Bed-ridden, Low-Class and MOLDY
review: I am pleased to note that our services and facilities were to your satisfaction. Your positive feedback about our hotel is deeply appreciated and has been communicated to all the members of my team. I once again thank you for your valuable comments and look forward to the pleasure of your continued visits and assure you of the best in service and hospitality at Runaway Beach Club

title: Great for being my family's first resort stay. But...
review: This was a groupon deal. I have had nothing but good luck with groupon deals up to this point, so I ignored the bad reviews on here. The unit was very big, however that's where the good of this establishment ended. There were hairs on the duvet and in the tub when we got there. The kitchen doesn't even have coffee or starter kits of soap like all the other villas I've previously stayed in. There were bugs in the kitchen and both the outside and the inside of the unit were in desparate need of paint and repair. I could have overlooked all these things had the customer service been decent. I left my treasured memory foam pillow in the unit. When I called the next day to inquire about the pillow the front desk clerk said he'd look into it and get back to me. When he didn't, I…

title: We stumbled across this keeper of a vacation home-away-from-home!
review: My family was originally booked and paid up for Vacation Villas but when we got into Orlando (drove up from ft. laud) we pulled into Runaway Beach Club to ask for directions to Vacation Villas. Deneice, the most pleasant front desk staff at Runaway, directed us to Vacation Villas,,,,but when we got their the office was in closed, in darkness and had a sign up that said they would not reopen until Monday morning,,,,and it was Saturday!!!!!  So we were so impressed with what we saw when we stopped for directions at Runaway that we scooted right back there to find out if they had available suites and for how much????  To our surprise....there was a 3-bedrm villa with a loft available for 2 nights and the price was so reasonable.  Deneice hooked us up and when we got to our villa we…

title: Spacious but poor customer service and many problems
review: It's always nice to hear such positive comments coming from someone who just happens to pass through and discover our property. I will be sure to share your comments with our staff to reinforce our commitment to taking care of our guests in every way! Thank you once again for taking the time to write a review for us!

title: Awesome
review: Looks are deceiving-was happily surprised at first by spacious rooms, but cleanliness was questionable. Also had problems with things not working such as fan, hair dryer, clothes dryer. Shampoo, coffee not provided. Although 4 guests were registered there were only two sets of towels and no housekeeping. Properties seem poorly maintained: knob fell off closet door when it was opened. Washing machine was unbelievably noisy. Beds were not comfortable. Pool was open but kid's pool closed, outside bar/snack area never opened. It is confusing because you check-in at another facility half a mile away and then have to check-in at Ditka property to get gate/pool key. Would not recommend.

title: Awesome place to stay for a great family vacation!!
review: On June 22nd 2012 our Trip Advisor reviews instantly grew by four hundred guest comments due to a merging of our positive reviews with those of the previous onsite management company. Unfortunately, Trip Advisor will not permit more than one reviews account for the same location, so they merged all previous reviews, good and bad, into one account.  We have received many calls from future guests that are very concerned about the negative comments that have appeared on Runaway Beach Club’s Trip Advisor listing since the June 22nd merging of reviews.  It may be helpful to explain what has occurred at Runaway Beach Club this year.  Charlestowne Hotels became the new onsite management company on March 16, 2012 after the previous management company was removed from the resort. The previous company relocated to an offsite location and continued renting some units to customers.  Unfortunately, when a company is no longer operating the services of the resort it is not able to fulfill all the promises and services as advertised.  This has created confusion not only for their guests but also for our future guests who read the negative comments about the other company on Trip Advisor.  Perhaps most distressing of all are the guests of the other company who have had bad experiences. We sympathize with those guests and hope that when they return, that they will stay at Runaway Beach Club through Charlestowne. Please feel free to contact me directly should you have any questions.

title: Great experience
review: If you want a great room with all the amenities of a condo at a great price then Runaway beach club is for you. The rooms are a good size and cozy enough to make you feel at home. The staff is friendly and accommodating I apreciate to Maria Teresa Carney, Art and Nickzander that take care of us with our reservation. Carolina Farme

title: Poor quality, not worth the money and hassle
review: Where do I even begin! Check-in for this hotel is off-premises, even though it is supposed to be 24 hours it was closed and I had to make a second visit after about an hour well past midnight. Got to the assigned apartment and the door refused to unlock - it took a good dozen tries to finally open. This problem was never fixed even though it was reported the following morning. Both tablelamps in the bedroom did not work and neither did the in-room safe. Remotes for TV and DVD player missing or not working. Wi-fi connection was iffy - this is a pervasive problem with this resort. Did not make use of resort facilities so can't comment on their quality.  Be prepared to bring your own soap, shampoo, washing detergent etc as what is provided is pitiful, and is being touted as a…

title: We had a Great Time-Would Recommend!
review: On June 22nd 2012 our Trip Advisor reviews instantly grew by four hundred guest comments due to a merging of our positive reviews with those of the previous onsite management company. Unfortunately, Trip Advisor will not permit more than one reviews account for the same location, so they merged all previous reviews, good and bad, into one account.  We have received many calls from future guests that are very concerned about the negative comments that have appeared on Runaway Beach Club’s Trip Advisor listing since the June 22nd merging of reviews.  It may be helpful to explain what has occurred at Runaway Beach Club this year.  Charlestowne Hotels became the new onsite management company on March 16, 2012 after the previous management company was removed from the resort. The previous company relocated to an offsite location and continued renting some units to customers.  Unfortunately, when a company is no longer operating the services of the resort it is not able to fulfill all the promises and services as advertised.  This has created confusion not only for their guests but also for our future guests who read the negative comments about the other company on Trip Advisor.  Perhaps most distressing of all are the guests of the other company who have had bad experiences. We sympathize with those guests and hope that when they return, that they will stay at Runaway Beach Club through Charlestowne. Please feel free to contact me directly should you have any questions.

title: Decent base camp
review: First time staying here under the new management company and would definately come back! The resort's new management company, Charlestowne I think was the name, at the Runaway Beach Club did a great job and was much better then the previous company, Mike Ditka! If you book with Mike Ditka you do not check in at the front desk, you have to go to an off site building and check in and get charged $15 dollars to use the basketball court. The kids pool is currently closed for maintenance, but was told it would be up and running by Labor Day. The pool, the basketball court, and the gym are nice features. The company is in the process of getting a license to set up for  a bar, which will be nice when they get it!! Rooms were nice and so was the staff. This is a resort, not a hotel. You…

title: We Loved Runaway Beach Club !!!!
review: I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with us at Runaway Beach Club, and indeed for taking the time to write your wonderful review. It was an absolute pleasure and honor to read all of the fantastic positive feedback about your recent stay with us. Thank you very much. We strive on a daily basis in every area of the resort to exceed our guest’s expectations, and I am thrilled that we exceeded yours. It really means a great deal to me and all of the team and it gives a great boost of morale for all. Thank you again. It would be my personal pleasure to welcome you back to Runaway Beach Club, hopefully in the very near future.

title: Runaway...run far away!
review: This used to be condos, or still is...hell who knows. The staff was nice enough. Wasnt even 11 and cleaning staff was in my room running me off. The fully equipped kitchen lacked a spatula and oven  mitts and no cleaning products at all are available. So plan on bringing your own or be charged the significant housekeeping fee. Not an issue if you're only there one night. The furniture was stained and the bedspread dated but overall it was very clean. The full kitchen was nice and the 1 bd apt is huge when compared to a standard motel room. I'd come back if I were going to spend more time and be prepared. Also the kid pool was down when I was there but staff secured use of the calypso cay pool next door.  Actually think she had more fun on their waterside.

title: Blood Stains on sheets
review: This hotel was a awful start to our family trip. When we arrived to check in at the resort they sent us to a diffent location to check in, it was hard to find and located in a busy shopping center. When we finally got to our room there were maintenance men in our room, they didn't know  were going to occupy the room. The hotel maintence was not wearing any uniform and were very creepy and rude...We didn't even know they worked at the hotel. The help drove around in there personal vechiles blasting music, we really didn't feel like we were in a resort but felt like we were in a apartment complex. We were there on a busy 4th of july week and they had closed the kids pool for maintence.  Worst of all that night we were so tired and ready to sleep as we pulled down the sheets we…

title: I would come back!
review: On June 22nd 2012 our Trip Advisor reviews grew by 400 guest comments due to a rollover from the previous on-site management.  Unfortunately, when there is more than one management company for a resort, Trip Advisor; must merge all previous reviews, good and bad, into one account.  We have been facing; many calls from future guests that were very concerned by the negative comments that have appeared on Runaway Beach Club’s Trip Advisor listing since the June 22nd when the reviews were all merged into one listing.  It may be helpful to explain what has occurred at Runaway Beach Club since March 16th, 2012.  Charlestowne Hotels became the new onsite management company on March 16th, 2012, when the previous management company was removed from the resort. The previous company relocated to an offsite location and still rents units to some customers. Unfortunately, when a company is no longer operating the services of the resort, is not able to fulfill all the promises and services as advertised. This has caused a lot of confusion not only for their guests but our future guests as well. Perhaps most distressing of all are the guests of the older company who have bad experiences.  We empathize with those guests and hope that when they return, that they will stay at Runaway Beach Club through the new onsite management and be able to enjoy a much better stay.  Since Charlestowne Hotels began in March, we have been constantly working to create an outstanding experience for our guests; and would love to have an opportunity to show you the results that can come from good rental management.  We are close to rolling out an indoor Café Azul, where guests and owners can enjoy their favorite beverage, and order a meal while enjoying a day at the pool. There are attendants at the pool area that offer a complimentary towel service, and a new kids and guest program is beginning, and these are just some of the new amenities that are planned: Movie Night, Arts & Crafts, Hip Hop dance classes, yoga classes, aqua aerobics etc.  These will be based on availability and demand.    Again we are terribly distressed, that anyone’s first impression of Runaway Beach Club may not be a good one; but we would like to extend a personal invitation to you to return and experience the new changes being implemented and to assure you of the best in service and hospitality at the new Runaway Beach Club.  Please feel free to contact me directly; should you have any questions.  Yours Truly,  John Leite General Manager 407-997-3656 x 71108 jleite@charlestownehotels.com

title: Happy about Groupon deal
review: I arrived at last minutes notice after leaving a resort I would not stay at if I had the choice of sleeping on a park bench or there, I'll be on the bench (Club Orlando). I arrived only to find that the site I found the resort did not indicate I'd have to drive 2 miles to check in. I did not have a car since I was at a convention all week and took the weekend for my hubby and kids to come up. I originally booked Mike Divitka resort which is 1/4 owner of the resort and why the confusion is there. I would directly book through Runaway Beach Club trust me!  I was able to cancel through them though and book directly with Runaway. 1 bedroom Suite was large enough for 6 people and was neat and tidy. I would say though that I missed not having a coffee pot ;) and the bed was not comfy…

title: Enjoyed our stay
review: I just wanted to take this time to personally thank you for completing the survey for your recent visit to the Runaway Beach Club, in Kissimmee, FL. Your opinion is very important to us. We are constantly striving to make the best guest experiences. I am very delighted that you were able to enjoy your stay after a difficult start, but very happy it ended on a happy note and you and your family were able to enjoy aswell. I would have love to know that you were missing a coffee pot in the room, since all the rooms come with one; and we would have surely get you one.  Again, thank you for your valuable time and we look forward to having another opportunity to be your choice of hotel on your next visit.   Sincerely,  Diana Garcia Front Office Manager Runaway Beach Club 407-997-3656

title: Runaway Beack Club - Do Not Stay Here
review: I was very apprehensive about staying here after reading reviews that were very mixed but had two nights of groupons and added an extra night @ regular price. Very reasonable to be so near Disney and the other attractions. My daughter and her family were coming down from Baltimore for a visit in Georgia and few days @ Disney. We were very pleasantly surprised to find the accomodations large and clean - plenty of room for 4 adults and 3 very active children. We were there for three nights beginning May 14th. The only thing I would recommend is to make sure you get transportation vouchers when you check in if you think you MIGHT use the shuttle service. I didn't because I knew we would be driving but thought one or two of us might take the shuttle one day and never received the…

title: great property for the price
review: nice clean and great location.  these are condos not hotels so if something needs attention normally we take care of it ourselves so we can get on we the fun.  I had no problems with anything and I will use again.

title: Very disappointing!
review: We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for the feedback! It is wonderful to hear from our valued guests and appreciate your continued patronage. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: Never stay here again
review: Our youth baseball team and their families (11 villas) stayed here last year in June and had a great experience so when we were going to Kissimmee again this year we decided to stay there again.  What a mistake that was and a total disaster!   First of all, it took me 3 weeks to finally get a response from someone when I was trying to call to book the group of rooms.  It is usually not that difficult to give someone your business.  Then, only a few days before our arrival date, I got a phone call from someone at Mike Ditka Resorts asking if we had been informed of some changes, such as check-in was at an off site location.  I had not been informed of this or any of the other changes from last year.  I was told that the Tiki Bar by the pool was now closed, the Kiddie Pool was…

title: Our Two bedroom Condo is Big
review: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us. We were disappointed to hear that you were less than delighted with your stay.  Please accept my sincere apologies.   On June 22nd 2012 our Trip Advisor reviews instantly grew by four hundred guest comments due to a merging of our positive reviews with those of the previous onsite management company. Unfortunately, Trip Advisor will not permit more than one reviews account for the same location, so they merged all previous reviews, good and bad, into one account.  We have received many calls from future guests that are very concerned about the negative comments that have appeared on Runaway Beach Club’s Trip Advisor listing since the June 22nd merging of reviews.  It may be helpful to explain what has occurred at Runaway Beach Club this year.  Charlestowne Hotels became the new onsite management company on March 16, 2012 after the previous management company was removed from the resort. The previous company relocated to an offsite location and continued renting some units to customers.  Unfortunately, when a company is no longer operating the services of the resort it is not able to fulfill all the promises and services as advertised.  This has created confusion not only for their guests but also for our future guests who read the negative comments about the other company on Trip Advisor.  Perhaps most distressing of all are the guests of the other company who have had bad experiences. We sympathize with those guests and hope that when they return, that they will stay at Runaway Beach Club through Charlestowne and enjoy a much better stay.  Since Charlestown Hotels began in March, it has been consistently working to create an outstanding experience for guests, and would love to have an opportunity to show you the results that can come from good rental management.  Charlestowne is close to rolling out Café Azul where guests and owners can enjoy their favorite beverage and order a meal while enjoying a day at the pool. There are now attendants in the pool area who offer complimentary towel service, a new kids program is underway, and these are just some of the new amenities that are planned.  Look for these other offerings to be added in the near future: Movie Night, Arts & Crafts, Hip Hop dance classes, Yoga classes, Aqua Aerobics etc.   Again we are terribly distressed that anyone’s impression of Runaway Beach Club may not be a good one, and we would like to extend an invitation to you to return and experience the changes being implemented and to assure you of the best in service and hospitality at the new Runaway Beach Club under the direction of Charlestowne Hotels.  Please feel free to contact me directly should you have any questions.  Yours Truly,  John Leite General Manager 407-997-3656 x 71108 jleite@charlestownehotels.com

title: Very good experience
review: My family is staying here for the weekend. Upon arrival there were ants, silver fish, and spider in the room! We notified the front desk they told us maintenance was gone for the day and they could send someone the next day! Staff were unconcerned and apathetic. Also amenties are terrible and not worth it. My family was unable to use the basketball court because we were told the vice president friends were using the amenty at that time only two people were in there with swim suits on! I hated this stay and my husband were very disappointed!

title: Offsight manager not reliable
review: Since we had visited your resort 3 years ago and had a very nice time there, we were extremely disappointed and angry this time at being downgraded after we had specifically asked for 3 bedrooms on the 1st floor and we'd paid in advance for that!  Upon our arrival, without any prior notice, we were put in a 2-bedroom/loft unit, which for most people might work.  For us it didn't!  This was unacceptable on your part.
