Three of us had to sleep on uncomfortable sofa beds, plus we had two 80-year olds who found it difficult to negotiate the stairs.  We registered at the offsite office which we were told to do, and were told the change was because of a "big group" who needed "our" unit.  That made us feel like second class customers, especially since you must have known about it long…

title: Nice stay
review: On June 22nd 2012 our Trip Advisor reviews grew by 400 guest comments due to a rollover from the previous on-site management. Unfortunately, when there is more than one management company for a resort, Trip Advisor; must merge all previous reviews, good and bad, into one account. Again we are terribly distressed, that anyone’s first impression of Runaway Beach Club may not be a good one; but we would like to extend a personal invitation to you to return and experience the new changes being implemented and to assure you of the best in service and hospitality at the new Runaway Beach Club. Please feel free to contact me directly; should you have any questions. Yours Truly,

title: Runaway Beach Club - Nice Place (Mike Ditka's = Horrible)
review: We recently were in Kissemmee for the holiday weekend.  The staff was great!  Art was very helpful with checking into the resort and making us feel at home.  We had moved to this resort after having problems in the hotel we were staying at.  The room was very clean and was a great value for the price. No problems and we would return again in the future.

title: Disappointed
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post your review. Those comments surely give that extra boost to the team. I look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Kind Regards, John A. Leite General Manager

title: great time
review: Just finished a memorial weekend stay and once I got involved with the Runaway Beach Club things were good!   Initially, I purchased the weekend stay through Expedia for a great rate.  But once I arrived I had to check in at Mike Ditka's offsite office???  They put us in a small room (which was not what I paid for) that couldn't sleep all of us; I called Mike Ditka's office to get the room changed and the girl told us that was the only available room and sorry about your bad luck?  After sleeping on the floor I woke up and went to the onsite office (Runaway's) and told the staff of my problem.  The hotel desk clerk Art told us not to worry he had a room for us but this was a different management company and I needed to cancel the reservation with Mike Ditka and check in with…

title: Horrible/ Worst Ever/
review: This place is horrible and still worse is the customer service... many hidden fees they won't tell you in advance... when I tried to talk to the front desk person (Jennifer) I asked for a supervisor she said it was her, I tried to explain how dirty the place was, and other complains and she could care less, I criticized her hospitality skills she still could care less, and she said she is not going to loose her Job like if no one else cares either... I truly regret coming to this place, this is all about profit and money... they lied too about a $30.00 dollar coupon to use at the place. Once there they said it was part of a fee...anyways I could go on and on...

title: Disappointed
review: We called ahead, to find out the procedure in the event that we wanted to check in earlier than 4 p.m..  We were told to call between 11 a.m. and 2 p.m., to see if the room had been cleaned.  We did as instructed, to find that the room was cleaned, but that there is a $40. early check in fee, which was not mentioned when we called.  Once in the room, there were dirty plastic cups in the cabinets under the sink, the dryer didn't work, the vents in one of the bedrooms did not work leaving the room very warm and uncomfortable to sleep in, there was no light bulb in the dining room, and the sheets on one of the beds was dirty, with stains and hair.  The gym, with the basketball hoop was occupied by women at desks, who appeared to be working with crafts of some sort, which was…

title: HORRIBLE
review: I brought my family to Orlando for my grandson's first birthday.  We made reservations in advanced for a two bedroom condo.  I'm a  Chicago Bears fan, so I assumed with Mike Ditka's name this place had to be wonderful.  Quite the opposite.  I arrived early afternoon and was told very rudely that I couldn't check in until after 4.  I explained we had been driving all day and had a sleeping little one with us.  After pleding with the girl, another employee came over and said hang on.  They typed in the computer and whispered to one another and said Sorry, nothing we can do.  Frustrated, but understood.  Came back to check in a few hours later.  Our condo was dirty.  Towels were hung dirty with dirt and blood stains.  I had to run to local CVS to buy laundry detergent in order to…

title: Awsome place
review: We have been there for almost a week and Maria Teresa Carnegie and Mr. John Leite are the best they took care of me and my family and our four legged friends Violet and Daisy Mae the best place to stay with your family. The staff there will always be there for there guests we are buying a condo there and that will be our second home away from home and we look forward to always seeing them when we come down to runaway beach club huggggs to the staff there. Mike and Bonnie

title: Great Experience
review: We came on vacation with our kids and stayed 3 nights at the resort.  The rooms are very oversize and spacious.  Everything was there that we needed for our stay.  Pool area nice, kids really enjoyed.  The check in office has moved from the resort, but everyone there was extremely friendly and helpfull. Gave us great tips for the area and theme parks.The resort is a great location to the theme parks. We enjoyed our experience and would definetly come back.

title: Great place
review: we have stayed here for almost a week and Maria Teresa Carney and Mr Leak are the greatest and the resort is the best place to stay and we have had the greatest time here cause of theses people we are going to buy with them and keep our condo with then for as long as they are there we would like to give them the biggest hugggs from us to the staff there we will always come back to yall Mike and Bonnie

title: great place to stay
review: Seven great days for around 300.00 can't go wrong, everything you need is right there. 2 bedroom/2 bathroom, washer//dryer dishwasher full fridge, stove, oven etc.................

title: New Management
review: I recently took my family to this property for a weekend at Disney. On our first night we had an issue with noisy neighbors. I let the front desk know about it and could not have been happier with the resolution and the way they handled the issue. I realized the problem was completely out of their control, but the way they accommodated us was well above and beyond. I was informed that this property was just taken over by a new Management Company and there was going to be a lot of positive change. I experienced it first hand and highly recommend this property. Kids loved the pool, units were quite spacious and well equipped. Staff was professional and extremely hospitable. Will plan on going back. Give the new Management a chance - I think you will be pleasantly surprised.

title: Excellent service and quality accomodations, thanks to the new owners!
review: What a GREAT review! Wow and thank you! We are very happy that you enjoyed Runaway Beach Club. We would love to have you stay in our home again! Please do contact me at that time and I will personally look after your reservation.

title: Not what it used to be
review: On 1-16-12 we made reservations on for a 2 Bedroom Suite at Mike Ditka's Runaway Beach Club to arrive on 3-31-12 for 7 nights.  This was prepaid in full before our stay.  Upon arrival at the resort we were informed to go to another location for check-in and that the resort was under new ownership. At the time we were told they only had one bedroom suites available, take it or leave it.  When you drive 1200 miles from home with 2 children in the car 26 hours (due to a road collapse) that is not what you want to hear.  We returned to Runaway Beach Club and surveyed our 1 bedroom our suite, which was very nice but the accomodations were not we paid for and reserved.  At that point we met Terrill Carter the regional director of operations for the new owner of the resort.  We…

title: Room was Okay
review: We were so-so about this resort.  The pool looked dingy and dirty, but may have been partly due to the overcast weather and color that it's sealed with.   The kiddy pool and hot tub looked better.  Rooms were spacious and having a full kitchen was really great but make sure you bring/buy all your supplies from soap to paper towels to dish scrubbers - they do not provide anything.   Don't take the sheets off the beds - the mattresses were really, really nasty!!   The beds squeaked every time you sat on them or moved around.  No room service at all.  We had a small patio with chairs which was really nice to relax at night.   JJ, the bartender is the BEST!!!   He makes some mean drinks and was very entertaining.  The Tiki hut is small but JJ is worth stopping by.  Lots of parking…

title: Runaway.... the title says it all!!
review: This was our 2nd visit to Mike Ditka's resort.   The 1st was in 2007,  Great stay then.   This location has really gone down hill,  Mike Ditka should take his name off of it since he has apparently sold it.     We arrived early at 11:30 am and were told our room was not ready,  BUT, if we wanted to pay 1/2 a day rate we could check in right away.  We decided to go for lunch,  since we had been traveling since 4am,  what was a few more hours??   After shopping for our food supply needs, we returned to the off-site check in location down the street at 3:15pm to again be told  "Sorry,   come back at 4pm".  BUT, the clerk gave us some wrist bands to use the pool while we waited.  How Nice!  At 4:10,  we Finally got our room,  (the check in location was filled with many angry…

title: Trying out the Mike Ditka resorts for the first time
review: I didn't know what to expect from the Mike Ditka resorts at first. The main bed didn't have a fitted sheet, only a flat sheet and it rolled up when you slept. There were limited towels which never dried in the humidity and the furniture is huge. The chairs and tables are very high, which was fine but a little odd as if we were all 7 foot basketball players. The website had promised they had groceries you could order. This was a total lie. We got there after several emails back and forth to an agent and no groceries and no one had ever heard of the service. We then had to walk about a 1/2 mile to a Walmart over highways (no real walking path) to get groceries as there are no restaurants close enough to walk to and you would need to walk highways to get to them. The main entrance…

title: Highly recommended
review: Our stay at Mike Ditke Resort was truly enjoyable. we highly recommend this resort to everyone with families. The friendly staff and the accomodations are truly exceptional. The kids loved the pool and the rooms. We are definattely coming back. Wish could have stayed longer.

title: amazing staff & amazing atmosphere!
review: my girlfriends & I stayed there last april. the staff was do friendly & accommodating & the rooms were so nice! we came back & will continue to come back. I highly recommend this resort!

title: Clean, and close to many attractions!
review: This is more of a Condo and pool type place.   Not a "Resort" with activities, Tiki Bar, and property that makes you want to stay around the place most days.   It is basic.   But a newer and clean basic so don't shy away esecially if you get a good price.

title: Missing it Already
review: Truthfully, every time we get to Florida we have arrived from a very cold place so i will admit to always being in a super mood at any check in.  We always stay at Runaway Beach Club and this time especially was nothing short of a delight and as always the management and services people were friendly, helpful and of course professional.  From check in to check our stay was yet again is the time that will help us get through until the next time.  Thanks Beach Club for doing such a great job in running such a fine facility.

title: Loved our stay
review: We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for the feedback! It is wonderful to hear from our valued repeat customers and appreciate your continued patronage. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: I miss the old Mike Ditka
review: My wife and I have taken our grand kids to Mike Ditka Resort for the last 4 years and returned again for their spring break this year in March. We have always enjoyed our stay and did so again. The grand kids look forward to come back again next year. The rooms are huge with all the amenities that we need. We typically stay in the three bedrooms condo, so the kids get their own bedroom. They truly enjoy the pool after a busy day at Disney, which is great for us, as we can rest while they swim before dinner. We just like to say thank you for making our vacation a memorable one year after year.

title: Best vacation ever
review: I have stayed at this resort many times in the past 3 years and was completely disappointed when I arrived for my family vacation last month. I did receive the email about the off-site check-in. I didn't let this upset me too much... although if I had known sooner than a week before my check-in, I would have stayed somewhere else!  Our unit was clean and comfortable, as always... but management makes a much bigger difference! When we arrived, I felt super uncomfortanle walking into the back of a building late at night, not knowing what awaited me inside. The young gentleman at the "make-shift" desk only knew to check my ID and hand me a room key. When I asked about our crib/pack & play, I was told that they could not find one from when I called the day before. I asked him why no…

title: Not Good
review: We didn't get the email about the off site check in.  The office was in back of a strip mall by a dumpster.  I called to report the shower curtain was coming down, we need toilet tissue, tissues etc., but one one ever came.  The unit was very dated.  The management is no longer Mike Ditka and there is no one on site who help with anything.  When we went to the office behind the dumpster to check out, the office was empty.  It looked like they had a flood!  After a run around, we were told by a maintence man to drive down the street and look for a white Dodge van, with a housekeeper named Chandra.  We gave her the keys and she said she would send an email receipt.  We never received it.  Our stay was not enjoyable.

title: Dont stay here!
review: I don't know what happened to this place.  I stayed here 2 years ago and it was great, and I have sent several people here, who loved it.  The week I was due to arrive, I received an email that check-in would be off site.  I had a lot of trouble finding it because it was behind a plaza in a dark parking area, that I was actually nervous about being in.  I should mention now that check out, was somewhere in another plaza, which made me feel like I was getting sent on a not very fun scavenger hunt.  I made a reservation for 5 people, but we only had 4 pillows and two blankets.  There was no front desk to get any extra items.  Oh, and did I mention we had 1 roll of toilet paper, one 3 ounce bottle of shampoo/conditioner and two tiny bars of soap for 5 people for 4 nights.  They…

title: Cannot rate this place!
review: I stayed here four years ago & it was beautiful & wonderful!  I have no idea what happened!  I'm glad they did not allow me to bring my dog because I would have been fearful for his life!  It is filthy!  Sticky white patches on the rugs!  Refridgerator looks like it has been to one too many frat parties!  Shower curtain liners new but made of tissue paper. Bedspreads that a black light would have gotten worn out on!  Oh, and let's not forget the wonders of nature to greet you upon your arrival to bark your instructions at you!  I really hate to say this, but I did not hear of Mike Ditka's passing, so the only thing I am left to believe is that he is safely tucked away in a mental hospital somewhere to have allowed this to happen to a once very beautiful resort that bears his…

title: Very disapointed
review: The shower did not work in the unit we rented, called the desk,and she did offer us a different unit to shower in, not to relocate,just shower, I told her no thanks,to much trouble,we would shower at the next place we were scheduled to stay. When i checked out I asked for maybe a small compinsation,and she flatly refused.Not very good customer relations here! Will never go back there!

title: Surprised.
review: We just arrived home from this resort. I used the word Surprised, and we were. I had worried and worried for weeks what we were getting, because of the reviews listed. When we arrived at noon last Saturday,, they had our room ready. We even got our king sized bed as requested, that was a huge plus for us.  I am a stickler for details, paying for what we get.  Upon entering our room it was stuffy, but with the adjustments of ac it was very comfortable. There is excellent storage for the luggage, nice size bathroom, tastefully decorated kitchen, quaint living room, and adequate space for hanging clothes up and putting stuff out of the way. The pool was nice and clean. Needs more lawn furnishings, but it was nice for the time we were there.  Granted there were chipped walls, the…

title: Dirty and old facilities, Cheap Management
review: My husband and I just spent 5 nights at the Beach club and really dont like this place. It failed all our expectations and the advertisement. The real room and club facilities are much worse than the pictures and the property probably havent been remodelled for the last 10 years. The room is small and smelly. Furnitures and facilities in the room and club house are much older and dirtier than we expected. Nothing as even close to "luxury" which they advertise. The air-conditioner was old, loud and didnt work properly. It was stuffy and hot in our room even in March weather. Management was cheap and services was bad. Make sure you bring our own toilet papers because all they provided for you is one roll then you're on your own. Might want to bring your hairdryer as well since…

title: Beautiful grounds
review: We stayed in a 1bedroom, 1 bath condo in January 2012. Unfortunately, time did not allow us to enjoy the resort. We would head out early and come in late.  Our condo was very nice and clean. We had a few issues with the air conditioner, light bulbs, not enough bedding for hide-a-bed, etc. but overall it was a great condo and we enjoyed out stay.  There is NOTHING provided by the resort. You will need your own tp, The unit did have a washer and dryer--which was great.  Our condo faced the lagoon area and it was beautiful.  It is about 15 mins from Disney parks--there is a lot of traffic but you can take a toll road near by that helps.

title: Terrible! Do not go here!
review: I'm going to keep it short and simple:  Unprofessional and snobby attitude staff. Dirty rooms and floors.  Farther from Disney than they claim to be (not worth it). Pay more and stay closer!!!!   In the end yes, they are cheap and this is why you get what you pay for - CRAP!

title: Beware college drunks!
review: Kept awake from 2:30am till 5am on a Monday night from noisy college kids drinking, yelling, running around, jumping in lagoon etc. Lone desk staff on duty refused to help until 3rd call. No security at night! Lighting also poor, checking in at night, hard to find buildng/room numbers.

title: Dirty. Not good for toddlers.
review: “We are sorry to hear about your inconvenience, and appreciate your comments here. We are happy that you have spoken up so that we may better our property. We will be working diligently to make your stays much more enjoyable in the future.”

title: Don't!
review: We were originally very excited to find this hotel...until we arrived.  Upon arrival, the parking lot was virtually empty, always a bad sign.  Upon check in, we were told that the key machine was broken.  Ok, things happen.  We had to be let into our room by an employee.  The room was nice but not equipped like your average Orlando time share.  No dish soap, no frying pan or spatula (how are you supposed to cook eggs), not enough plates and glasses for the advertised sleeping quantity, outdated TV's, hard towels, rough sheets from K-mart (I saw them there), etc.  But, Ok.  We went out to dinner, returned later and still, no keys. We again had to be let in our own room.  The next morning we were assured that the keys would be ready upon our return from the theme park.  When we…

title: 5 STARS! BEAUTIFUL UNIT. CLEAN. FUN. SAFE.
review: Booked this beautiful 3 bedroom unit + LOFT condo through Magical Memories Villas (google them and ask for Building 06- Unit 204)at Runaway Beach Club and it was incredible. The resort was gated, had an incredible pool and simply the best value. The unit had a 61" lcd tv in the game room, a beautiful kitchen, comfortable beds and more!

title: Pleasant experiance.
review: I was actually very surprised When I walked into the villa. It was higher than my expectations. The kitchen was very nice and the bathroom was spacious. Everything seemed to be in great condition. I was a little disappointed however that they didn't provide anything to hand wash dishes with(soap or sponge) We had to wash baby bottles and couldn't wait til the end of the night to run the dish washer. Another disappointing was the carpet. It looked fine however I have a crawler and she was black just after 10 mins of roaming around the villa. Also, the metal stripping on the ground between the rooms (i'm sure it has a name) was kind of coming up and I had to constantly watch my little one so she wouldn't get cut. Overall our experience was positive and we had a great time. My kids…

title: Not Comfotable
review: This was a well situated resort not far from the attractions but it was not great place to stay. The sheets were all torn around the sides but useable. The carpet was unraveling at the doorways and dull. I had a few kids with me accompanied by an adult. They asked at the desk if the shuttle went to Universal and they said yes. Thje shuttle dropped them off at Epcot, Disney World. They only went to Epcot,( not Universal) and would not go back for them. After getting off and realizing where they were, they called us and had to wait until we got there to pick them up which took about 40 minutes, dressing and in traffic. They lost about 3 1/2 or 4 hours in the park, and it was a terrible scary situation waiting in the parking lot ( and scary for me). My daughter slept on the sofa…

title: not so bad
review: I read many of the negative reviews for Mike Ditka's, and was not expecting much when we visited there March 4 & 5, but we were happy with our stay in a one bedroom condo. It is not a deluxe resort, but is definitely nice.  The staff was pleasant, and the Tiki bartender, Eric, was very nice.  Our rooms were clean, and considering there was a kitchen, it was well worth the Socail Living price we paid.  You do have to ask for shuttle tickets to the parks, but they are very accommodating in issuing the tickets. I recently stayed at the Disney Yacht Club right by Epcot, and it was very nice, but not worth $300.00 a night, which was a discount.  I'd stay at Mike Ditka's again, not so with the Yacht Club for the price.

title: What a relief
review: We purchased a 3 night stay in a 2 bedroom suite from a local radio station auction for only $150. We were thrilled... until we read the Tripadvisor reviews. We were so nervous that I had picked several places in the area we could go to if our experience was as bad as some of the previous reviews.Luckily, we did not need to leave Mike Ditka's Runaway Beach club.   We arrived around noon. Check in time is 4pm. To our surprise we we told our room was available. Art, who checked us in did say that "that does not happen too often". Art was very friendly and welcoming. Our package also included an autographed Mike Ditka football but Art could not find one. He said that they would deliver it to our room later that day. Still concerned about previous reviews we did not have great hopes…

title: Bad experience
review: Visited resort with living social deal . . .We did not get the type of room promised and even when they said they would credit us, it has been 3 weeks and no one will return my calls.  If you decide to stay here ask for a second floor room, we stayed on first floor and had to listen to the peple up stairs all night . .I swear a thin peice of plywood was the only thing between the 2.  The rooms were fairly clean but had a terrible musty smell.  Staff is not accomodating, I could not get a towel after 6 because housekeeping left (this was after I had requested them in the morning and did not recieve them)  Cheap is the best part of this deal . .but not worth it for us again.

title: It's in the details
review: We have stayed at RBC for the last five years or so. It is always a pleasant stay. However I do have admonish them for missing some of the details that makes a resort five star, which I fully believe they have the capacity to be! Starting with checkin. The front desk is often unmanned. No one to greet you does not feel welcoming. Top resorts never leave the front desk unattended. The front desk staff are not surly but neither are they overly welcoming. You are left with the impression that they are just doing their job, which they do well. But some personality and joy would start our experience here on the best foot.   Secondly, the list of things that you will be charged for, along with the amount of each, has to go! How unwelcoming to read through the packet of info and see…

title: Do not stay here!
review: I am very disappointed with the entire stay. It was an awful experience. Let be begin by stating that I am almost 8 months pregnant and was traveling with my husband, 2 year old child, in-laws and my parents.  This is why we booked a 3 bedroom 3 bath unit way in advance on January 21.   The day before we arrived I called the 800 at your resort to see if we may have an early check in - this way we may store our bags in the room and get accommodated and then head to the parks [we were celebrating my 2 year old's birthday].  I was told that it would not be possible because you were fully booked and the earliest we can probably check to see was between 2 and 3 PM.  That was not going to work for us so instead of checking in we went straight to the parks since we had no where else to…

title: Da Bears
review: Love staying at Ditka's,  Very Reasonable priced, clean rooms.  Perfect for extended stays.  Minutes from Disney, Seaworld, International Drive, and the convention center.

title: Spacious,pleasant surroundings, and good location make a good weekend
review: We stayed here for two nights and were pleasantly surprised by the resort and our one bedroom villa. Some of the previous reviews were less than complementary,but we found our stay quiet pleasant. The villa was quiet spacious. It was clean with nice furnishings and plenty of towels for our use. The rooms did smell of Chlorox, but some febreeze, the fans, and opening the door for a while took care of the smell. The front desk personnel were very professional and pleasant. They explained what our stay included and answered our questions. We would definitely stay here again on our next visit to the Orlando area.

title: Great Family Stay - Nov 2011
review: Great property, close to Disney, Epcot, Downtown Disney, restaurants.  My wife, 4 year old daugher, and I stayed 2 nights Nov 7-9, 2011 in a one bedroom suite. Suite as basically a 1 bedroom townhouse with full kitchen and living room.  The two sofas in the lviing room pulled out into beds which my four year old loved since she got to watch tv in bed before going to sleep for the night.  Entry was on the ground floor and stairs led up to the suite on the 2nd floor.  The room is stocked with basics - toilet paper, soap, coffee, dishwashing soap for the diswasher.  You have to pay extra if you use up what's stocked, but there was more than enough for our 2 night stay.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  It was too cold to use the pool, but it looked nice.  The property was well…

title: Excellent Value and location
review: We recently stayed at Mike Ditka Resorts before and after a Disney Cruise, and during a 4 day visit to Disney World; 3 adults and 2 children had 2 different 3 bedroom suites.  It is great location, just outside the gates of Disney World, and a short walking distance from a very large Wal-Mart department and grocery store. It is also close to other shopping and chain location dining.   The suite was very spacious and well equipped for multiple generation family groups (4 televisions), with a good kitchen and dining area. Location was gated and very quiet despite its proximity to major highways. As a low rise development, parking is just outside your suite, facilitating delivery of luggage, groceries etc. We would stay there again, and recommend it to others. The pool area and…

title: Completely unaccommodating
review: The room we were given smelled of mildew, bleach, and the bed from the seconds that we sat on it was hard a rock. The Living Social Voucher included a $30 resort credit but there was noting to use it on unless the tiki hut was open. The resort sates that the have security, the only security that they had was a gate that you needed a code for but the gate was wide open. Additionally the resort charged the tax on the room at the time of the reservation, we checked out immediately. We called living Social to get a refund and were told that the resort had us checking out the next day.This was after the nightmare of we had to make the reservation.  They are the biggest bunch of liars on the face of the earth. Mike Ditka Should be ashamed of having his name on this place.

title: A Very Nice Stay
review: The Mike Ditka Resort 2 bedroom condo was a nice retreat. The 2 bedr condo rooms were very clean and nicely decorated. Pool area nice and well kept as well as the grounds. A very nice place to relax after any activities. Thanks! .MDJM

title: Good value for what we paid
review: We had purchased a Living Social voucher and stayed 2 nights. Our unit was clean, comfortable and roomy. I only wish I would have known to bring extra soap and shampoo. I would not have minded bringing my own but this was the first time I actually counted on amenties to be provide but a short walk to a WalMart solved the problem. Pools were clean and warm; hot tub was great. The whole area was quiet and well lit.Front desk staff was friendly and helpful for our needs. We were here in off season----beginning of February. .If another Living Social voucher was offered we would come again.

title: Bring your own..... EVERYTHING!!!
review: I would not stay at this resort EVER again, even if someone PAID me to. I literally can NOT believe this place. And to have Mike Ditka's name on this resort - disgrace. The service to this resort is literally GRADE F. We went trying to check in a little early because we had a day planned to go to Disney.. Although after traveling 8 hours with luggage and a stroller in the trunk with two kids, we needed some where to put our luggage to get the stroller out. First the lady at the front desk said she was going to see what she could do and another lady came over and started whispering to her... Then the lady looked up and said nope. No rooms. There all dirty. So we decided that we were just going to go ahead and go to Disney and worry about checking in later. My son then had to use…

title: Dirty and horrible service!!!
review: I bought a Living Social 2-night stay for this resort. I went on a Saturday late afternoon with my 2 kids hoping to have a nice weekend in Disney. I checked in, not the friendliest staff, went to our room. As I opened the door, first thing I saw was 2 HUGE stains on the carpet, and a horrendous smell of Clorox bleach, which slightly overpowered the smell of mold and mildew. My daughter and I are highly allergic to all the things. I called the front desk to let them know that we couldn't breathe in that villa, she said the entire resort was booked, and she would said someone from housekeeping over with some air fresheners. Well, housekeeping just walked in without knocking, started spraying Febreeze all over the place, which only made it worse. I opened the unscreened windows for…

title: Medicore
review: Tierney from Carle Place, NY said it all. Cold pool, tiki bar never opened.  There was nobody there and we were still denied a late check out.  We were told flat out, no.  I did like the convenience of the kitchen and washer and dryer but I know I can find something much better out there than these units.  Looked good from the outside but it was all smoke and mirrors. A dump.

title: I would probably never stay here again.
review: The room is big and has a full kitchen which is helpful but that's all thats good about it.  The beds were old and springy and one even sunk in from one side.  The sofa bed was so springy, I left with back pain as I was the one staying there.  The carpet is old and dirty, the bathroom counters are pealing and they don't care to change it, it looks ugly.  To top it off customer services is mediocre, the girl at front desk never smiled was straight to the point.   Just so you know they don't provide housekeeping services so as long as your stay is, they will never come and do the bed, change towels nor clean.  They only give you a limited amount of towels and if you want more you will need to pay and those room towels are supposed to be for pool too as they don't provide pool…

title: Spacious condo close to Disney World!
review: This was a nice large place and the price was great as we used a groupon.  Pros: Shuttle to Disney World Nice pool and hot tub Large rooms with full kitchen with dishwasher, stove and granite counter.  Cons: Carpet, blinds and bed were warn  Customer service was mediocre.    Tips:  be sure to get a boarding pass for the Disney shuttle as we were never told to Bring coffee, laundry and dish detergent, and beach towels if you can fit them in.  The other reviews helped so were prepared with these extras.

title: Needs upgrade
review: I've stayed there multiple times over the past 3 yrs. it appears that they do not perform any upgrades to their rooms.  3 years ago the mattress was ok. My last stay 1 week ago, as soon as i get in the bed, the mattress would squeak and sink about 5 in. Where the springs are pooking your back. The bed cover is so old and smells.  Stains on the sheets.  BAsically, they are letting the place go down the drain.  I used to feel as if it was 4.5 stars, now it's barely 3 stars.

title: Our experience really was terrible...
review: I would give this "resort" a rating of zero if I could, our stay at the Runaway Beach Club was nothing short of terrible. Upon arrival to our second floor 2 bedroom suite, it was clear that the toilets (SO GROSS) had not been cleaned, there were food particles on the side and under one of the beds, dirty (mucus stained) sheets. Please, please please do not stay at this resort... we were looking for affordable accommodations near Disney, swiped up a livingsocial deal, and I have to say it was not worth the money at all. Upon checkout we expressed our unsatisfactory experience, and were told that we called housekeeping the day of check in and said that we would clean the toilets ourselves (UH NO WAY!!). And there was nothing could do about the rates. The customer service went…

title: COMFORTABLE. CLEAN.  Wonderful stay!!
review: We stayed at Ditka's for two nights, with a Groupon voucher, and were so pleased that we added three nights onto our stay there.  The two bedroom condo was SO SPACIOUS.  There were enough closets you could lose someone in there. The master bedroom had a DEEP SOAKER tub that was magnificent.  The second bedroom had a double bed AND twin bed!!  Both rooms had a walk in closet.   The facilities were great.  The kids area of the pool was fun and inviting.   The kitchen was adequately equipped.  The refrigerator had a few dents in it, but overall, it's a rental...  Literally 5 minutes from Disney (closer than our other condo the week before) but still not in the middle of the madness of I-Drive. We will DEFINITELY STAY THERE ON OUR NEXT ORLANDO TRIP.

title: Get what you pay for--but no more
review: The good news.  The one bedroom is spacious with a pullout couch accommodating four.   It is a great location: close to Disney and convenient to other parks. There a lot of deals to bring the price down.   The rest.    Room rates. Beware of resort and amenity fees.  The only amenities are a pool (nice), a small fitness room, and an indoor half basketball court.  There are a bunch of other fees that can run up the tab--a lot!  Our suite wreaked of chlorine bleach when checked in.  It lingered for three days.  Living room furniture was soiled and the upholstery was torn. The springs at one end of the couch were broken.  The bed was very spongy and the coverlet was very old.    Housekeeping comes once every four days. BTW bring your own soap, shampoo, towels for the pool.    There…

title: Mike Ditka Resorts is the BEST!
review: We have stayed here several times and it has always been great.  Clean, quite and a home away from home.  Already planning our next trip here! "." MDJM

title: Great location, good value and all round fantastic!
review: We just came back from a 10 day stay at the Mike Ditka resort. We found the resort to be ideal for our family and had a great time there. The facility itself offers everything described e.g two swimming pools (one adult one child), gym, hot tub etc. You will receive a small supply of coffee, sugar and toilet paper on arrival that should last for a number of days but you will need to replenish these within days.   You also get enough drinking glasses and cutlery, a few towels, one saucepan, frying pan, a couple of trays but only one kitchen towel. All these items can be hired but at nearly $5 are far too expensive in my opinion so depending on the numbers in your party you may need to take extra towels and I would also bring an additional kitchen towel.   There is also…

title: Great location, needs some upgrades
review: For the value it was nice BUT they really need some upgrades. The bathtub was in a bad shape, I don't know who designed the shower but if your over 4'5" tall you will have to duck. the couch had what looked like a cigarette burn hole in it plus is was way outdated. both remote controls needed batteries, the inside of the cabinets needed some serious cleaning. the dryer hose on the back was not connected so that whole room was covered in lint. we had to use the heat one night and i noticed the filter looked as if it were never changed. The pool areas was nice, good for kids with zero entry, the outside areas are nice. Staff was good, no real complaints other than it needs a serious upgrade.

title: Great place!
review: Location is excellent. Villa was very roomy and clean. We had a very pleasant stay. Would stay there again.

title: Never been treated so poorly
review: I recently made reservations online for this resort.  When I arrived with my husband, 2 very excited young kids, and a packed car, I was told my reservation was not in their system.  I showed them my confirmation and they said there was nothing they could do.  They said they were at full capacity, however, if they had found our reservation they would have to find us a room.  When I reminded them how impossible it was to find a room in Orlando during a holiday week, they sat stone-faced and shrugged their shoulders.  I have never been treated so poorly in my life.  My 3-yr-old daughter was crying, and we drove around in circles in Orlando trying to find a place to stay.  I will never be returning to this resort, EVER!!!

title: “Paradise Lost... through mismanagement”
review: Really Bad Experiences with this Hotel.  The picture is amazing, but all of the other horrible aspects. The rooms are unkempt, drab, smelly, and generally run-down. The management is rude and uncooperative.  And the cost? It is too expensive for the quality.  Be carefull.  Just don't stay here.

title: Close to Disney
review: We stayed here after our cruise to go to Disney and Universal. So since we had just been on a cruise this place wasn't the same. We had 4 adults and a lot (I mean a lot of luggage). We found our villa and opened the door to see stairs...we had been driving half a day and at Universal the rest of the day, we were pretty tired and not prepared to carry our massive amount of luggage up stairs. But it was our own fault for checking in after hours. Once we got everything up stairs it seemed pretty nice. There were just a few things that needed attention...the carpet needs to be replaced, it was worn out in a few places and it could have used a quick spot cleaning. The bathrooms were nice. The kitchen was beautiful! The livingroom nice and cozy. The bedrooms were spacious, but the…

title: Disneyworld Family Trip
review: I don't like to complain, but.... when we arrived there was no one at the front desk.  They were all int he back eating pizza, and the employee that came out to serve us was chewing her food and wiping her greasy hands on her pants.  Not very professional. The room was large and fairly clean.  There was a light bulb burnt out in the master closet (shouldn't they check these things?), and the T.V in the master bedroom did not work half of the time.  We did call about the tv, someone came, but wasn't successful.  No offer of changing it.  One night upon our return from the parks we came home to a flood.  A massive flood in the kitchen and bedroom.  We called the fron deske who informed us that there was no room to change us to, but he would make a note and let maintenance know. …

title: Great place for a family
review: We were totally pleased with the resort and accomadations. It was nice to have a large space for a long stay. The grounds were well kept and clean, pool and hot tub also. Lots of places to sit and lounge in the sun with a beautiful view. We like the fact that we were just slightly off the beaten track of the major disney area as it was quiet and easy to get around. Walmart and Pulix very close and also the indoor flea markets. Kitchen had just about anything you needed to cook with as far as pans, bowls etc., and there was a full washer and dryer so we were able to pack light. My only wish was for black out curtains in our kingbedroom, but am happy that the outside was so well lit at night. Did I mention the pool was open late so you could soak the ache out after a long day at…

title: We'd come back
review: The location is fantastic for Disney and other major attractions. Even a free shuttle. The resort is attractive and well maintained.  We had a 2 bed unit which was very spacious.   Only a few minor maintenance things like a blown bulb etc. which is no issue.  The servicing of the units between tennants is poor.  The cleaners obviously only do a cursory lipservice clean, so wash your kitchen items and benches etc. before use.    Overall we would stay there again.

title: You just keep coming back.
review: We love Mike Ditka's runway beach resort. As a matter of fact we told our friends of our experiences at Ditka's and said the same thing. Great place to relax and have fun. Location is very convenient. All of what was said at a very reasonable price. You actually get and enjoy more of what you pay.

title: Hazardous!
review: So when we arrived we were pleased to find out they upgraded us to a 3-bedroom suite. Wish they hadn't! Several item were broken and found a cockroach in the living room where our babies were playing. Then, the fan in the babies room broke with blades flying off and hitting the walls all WHILE they were sleeping in the room. Maintenance was very speedy but no call from management for an apology and they wouldn't even come talk to me when I went to the front desk. We checked out a day early and still got the run around...insinuating we actually did something to the fan. TERRIBLE service!

title: Great place horrible service
review: The room was great, getting there was a little but confusing for us but it was very nice, spacy. We got the two room suite and was very pleased. The ONLY downfall was the service. ALL of the girls that worked there were rude, not helpful, and didnt seem interested in workin at all. I did not see one smile from any of the workers and they were just very horrible. I will stay there again because of the price and location but you could stay across the street and at least get friendly service for a steeper price tag.

title: Good room
review: This is the first time my wife and I stayed here.  The room was nice and the location to Disney was great.  The only issue I had was the location of the room to the highway, but that was just specific to my room which bordered that road.  Overall, I would rate this excellent for a small family as it had 2 fold out couches, bath, washer/dryer, and separate bedroom.  These units look like they used to be time share rentals.

title: Do yourself a favor and "Runaway"...
review: We were staying in the Orlando area for two nights, and saw a promotional rate for Mike Ditka Resorts Runaway Beach Club through livingsocial.com and figured we give it a try.  When we arrived for our two night stay, we went in to our unit and were pleased by the fresh bleach scent. The unit appeared to be as shown on the web site (2 Bedroom Luxury Villa) and in good shape.  For the money, there really wasn't a lot to complain about.  A king size bed was in the master, two beds in the second room and a pull out sofa bed.  We unpacked after our long trip and noticed in the second bedroom there was a blade missing from the ceiling fan and the master bedroom had no chain to shut the fan off.  Well, not the end of the world, but come on.  Well, we were tired and just wanted to…

title: Great Rooms, Pool Cold, Service Average
review: Nice big clean rooms. Make sure and bring your own supplies. Pool is average and must not be heated. Tiki Bar very limited items.

title: wd1111
review: I took my wife and 4 children on vacation to Orlando.The resort is in an excellent location and the 3-room suite was very spacious.  The price to stay here is significantly less than if we had to stay in 2 hotel rooms.  The cleanliness is average.  Overall, it is a great deal for large families.  Unfortunately, because of the good value, the resort attracts many undesirable people.  We were unable to ever get a good nights sleep because our neighbors were up partying to 4am every night.

title: Great Stay at Mike Ditkas
review: My husband and I stayed at Mike Ditkas Runaway Beach Club in Kissimmee recently.  We bought a one night stay in a one bedroom Villa thru Groupon.  We did not know what to expect and were pleasantly surprised upon arrival. The front desk staff were very friendly and the grounds were nicely kept.    We had a one bedroom villa with partial kitchen, washer, dryer, large bedroom, ensuite bath and shower, large livingroom. The only drawback is there are many stairs to go up to the second floor where everything is located.  Our unit was very clean and well stocked with everything we would need for a one week stay but we were there for one night.  On the property were two large heated pools and a hot tub that was very hot.    We would recommend this resort for a one night or one week…

title: Can't beat it for the comfort (and price if you get a discounted rate)
review: Keep your eyes peeled for discounted rates at this hotel!  My family and I stayed here last month and we're already booking for another visit in December.  The rooms are wonderfully spacious and a great place to come back and relax after a day at the parks!  AND with all the amenities of home!

title: Perfect trip!!
review: I came to go to Epcot with a couple of my friends and we had an amazing time. The room was very nice and clean, and it was in a great location. Having the shuttle that took us directly to the park made our day! We will definitely be returning soon!

title: Great Location
review: Pros: This resort is really close to the Disney World parks, and offers a free shuttle service to and from the parks. They offer 24 hour check-in, which is great for late arrivals. They also have a really nice work-out facility, pool, and mini basketball court. The place was decent for the price spent. The staff is friendly and answered the phone almost immediately when called.  Cons: The bed had crumbs in it when we got there. There were dirty towels, or well, badly stained towels. A huge roach was in the floor when we arrived as well. The website boast "Starbucks" brand coffee, but it was some cheap hotel grade coffee when we arrived. And was told that the only coffee we would receive was what was in there. I was not expecting to only get 1 decaf and 1 regular coffee pack to…

title: disgusting
review: We had a bachelor party and upon arrival found many long hairs in the showers, pulled the towels out and found that many of them had crusty yellow stains all over them. the beds and pillows appeared to have the same issues as well as the sofas as well. the place was disgusting. By far the worst hotel i have ever been to.

title: Have stayed before but this time I was not satisfied @ all!
review: When called for new towels was told they don't give them out.  That's what the washer and dryer and on the rooms for.. Rude! Ceiling  had brown mold spots.  Wall in front of washer had mold spots.  Towels were dirty Knob on bathroom sink was broken.  So you couldn't tell if you were using hot or cold water. Carpet was torn in some places. Rooms dusty.  I hope the resort can get it together! Until it does so I will not be going back anytime soon : /

title: a long night
review: We were woke up in the middle of the night with what appeared to be fighting. It was alot of loud noice and foul language. I called the front desk at 2:30 and reported this problem. It was not checked out and continued for 2 hours. The next morning I found out that the young men staying next to us had broken a window during the night adventure during which they were playing football inside there room.   The resort offered a 30 percent off on my next visit. You must be kidding me! I am not interested in returning to this resort.  looks are deceiving. The resort is beautiful, but not an ideal place to stay. The customer service could not have been worse!

title: Great Place To Stay ! !
review: I stayed in a one bedroom this weekend. It was Large, Clean and Welcoming. My family and I truly enjoyed it. The staff was great. Thank you for making our trip so pleasant. Now we have a great place to stay when in town. Also Thumbs Up For The Rates ! ! Awesome

title: Excellent Value and Great Service!!
review: We recently came back from a weekend stay here and would highly recommend this resort. We booked a one bedroom through Expedia. Booking was easy and the room was under $80 a night even with the resort fee (which was eleven bucks a night I believe with tax). There were three adults and two kids in our group. The resort was easy to locate off of 192 in Kissimmee and nearby everything, all the Orlando parks are minutes away. Check in was quick and efficient. Half of our party was Universal Studios for the Halloween Horror event, and my husband and I were still out to dinner at 9 pm when my sister showed up with two exhausted teenagers in tow. She was given a key and a parking pass and was in the room when we showed back up, no problems, and was very impressed with the front desk…

title: Large room, good deal, but quirks
review: Our room was great for a large family or group.  Could prob sleep 8+ with 2 BR and 2 sofas, 2 spacious baths, kitchen,dining area, and living room.  Lots of towels, wash cloths. Pool area very pretty. Two pools with fountains plus hot tub. However, we had to wait 20 min to check in. The bathrooms offered USED bottles of lotion and shampoo (noticed in the morning and too late to complain). They give you a list of how many soaps, sugars, creamers, coffees, etc that are a "starter pack" for your room.  After that you pay for extra.  They must get huge groups in each room who ransack this stuff.  Just seemed cheap to me.  Tiki bar was not open the day we arrived and we had a credit for Tiki bar or gift shop.  Gift shop was a joke....candy bars, water, a few overpriced Ditka Resort…

title: I love this place!!!
review: For the past two years when I came to the Kissimmee area I have stayed at the Mike Ditka resort. The first year I stayed with my family after a business trip and the kids loved it! The second year when I came up for a business conference I choose to stay here instead of the hotel where my conference was located. Now I'm planning a separate trip to the area and I will be staying here and also when I plan my business trip as well. MAR.

title: Not a good place for customer service
review: Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments.  I believe you booked your reservations directly with the resort and not a 3rd party and that's a good thing.  I think sometimes people don't realize there IS a difference when you book direct.  Not only do you have access to additional amenities on the property such as access to housekeeping, but you are able to check in at the property and not at a remote location many miles away.  We are looking forward to seeing you on your next trip.

title: It was perfect...for our family
review: My family , my daughter 10, son 2, my mom 56, aunt 50, uncle 58, cousins, 21,20,12 and myself 28. I made the reservations a month before we went and drive 23 hours straight  to get there. When we got there at about 9:45PM and started unloading our cars the lady in the bottom villa came out and told us to shut up and go to bed. We called the office and told them that there was a problem with the people below us and so they said they would take care of it. Everytime we would walk out of our door she would hear us coming down the stairs and be there to yell at us. We called the front desk many times and they did nothing. After 4 days of hell with this lady we went to a dinner and theator. When we got in at 11:00 pm or so I was the last one in b/c I had to get my son who was asleep…

title: Second Time Around - Still A Great Place To Stay
review: Since we experienced a great vacation last June, 2010, our family decided to try Mike Ditka's Runaway Beach Club Resort in Kissimmee, FL again.  Our 6 members thoroughly enjoyed the close proximity to area parks and restaurants, and the security of a gated resort.  We were able to take advantage of outstanding room rates for our 16 day stay. The only negative matter was a problem with the electronic door key reader that was fixed promptly by the resort's staff.  My thanks to the staff at Ditka's for another fine vacation.  See you again, soon.

title: Lack of service ruins potential.
review: Glad to have you return.  And glad you and your family enjoyed the stay.  Runaway Beach Club really is the perfect choice for families and particularly on such a long stay.  The convenience of having a washer/dryer makes these stays even more comfortable.  I'm sorry you had a problem with your electronic key.  These things do sometimes occur for mysterious reasons.  But because you booked directly with the resort we're happy that you had 24 hour access to our maintenance - something you would not have had if you had booked with an outside agency.  We look forward to seeing you again.

title: Wonderful stay at Mike Ditka Resorts
review: Terrible service. From the moment we checked in we encountered lackluster hospitality.  We were told there was 24hr check in. However, upon our arrivalwe were immediately greeted with "check-in isn't until 4."  Which was followed by informing me that I could check-in four hours early but there would be a $40 charge. She presented the charge as if it were a penalty rather than a convenience fee.  She then proceeded to convey a littany of services the resort does NOT offer. I felt like I was back in Catholic high school. Not once did the girl smile, welcome or thank me. The rooms are spacious and a real value, but some knobs were missing, some amenities were missing, and there was no soccer ball for the foosball table.

title: AWESOME!!!
review: I apologize that your check-in experience left something to be desired.  I wish I knew which of my staff you had spoken with so I could discuss how she could improve her customer relations skills.  I will make a point of showing this review to ALL of my staff to underscore what one bad experience such as this looks like in writing.  Ouch!  As for the check-in time issue, when we say that we provide 24-hour check-in we, we mean that there is a manned front desk available for check-in, something you would not have access to if you did not book directly with the resort.  That said, check-in time for our property, like almost all lodging, is at 3 pm, just as check-out is typically at 11 am.  The access to 24-hour check-in does not mean that you can check in at any time any more than it means you can check out at any time.  But, I can see that you might have been confused and apologize.

title: Nothing Great, just decent
review: My family & I enjoyed our stay at Mike Ditka Resorts in Orlando Florida. The resort is in the perfect location to enjou Disney, Universal & Sea World, all within 1/2 hour of less from the resort, and only 1/2 hour away from Orlando International Airport. I really liked that I was able to cook my meals as I have dietary issues that makes it difficult for me to eat out. The bedrooms & bathrooms were great as well as the living area. While no one likes to do laundry on a vacation, I found it to be a plus to not have to do any laundry on my return home (and make it possible to pack less clothes!) I would recommend Mike Ditkas to anyone going to Florida. In fact, that is how I learned about this great resort. I would definetely stay there again!! "." MDCC

title: Huge Rooms, but no housekeeping
review: The rooms at Mike Ditka Resort are more like apartments than rooms. They have a full kitchen w/ granite counter tops, living room, bathroom and bedroom. We have stayed there twice and both units also had a full sized washer and dryer. It is very nice for the price, but there isn't any real housekeeping during your stay. If you want clean towels, you have to bring them to the registration desk, which we would have had to drive to both times we stayed. So we just kept putting our towels in the dryer and re-using them. I guess that's fine, but I don't really want to do laundry while I'm on vacation. They have a nice pool area for the kids. We stayed there for the close proximity to Disney and they do have a shuttle bus, but we didn't use it.

title: Good time
review: I'm glad you took a few minutes to write your comments.  For those that require traditional housekeeping, such as new linens, new towels and room cleaning, these services are available for an additional charge.  For guests staying 7 days or more this service is included.  However, we find that most guests like the fact that a housekeeper won't be entering their Villas while they are away.  As you pointed out, you can always get fresh towel at the front desk, another benefit available exclusively to those guests who book direct with the resort.

title: Can't wait to go back!
review: We just got back had a great time.. Room was clean excellent location and price. Customer service could definately improve .. But besdides that it was great..

title: Cheap prices = Rude Customer Care & Dirty Rooms
review: I wish I knew more about your stay and whether you booked directly with the resort or through an offsite agency.  There are clearly differences, particularly where what you might refer to as "customer service" is concerned.  When you don't book directly with the resort you do not have access to our 24 front desk check-in for instance.  So, when you are requesting assistance our staff is expressly prevented from providing services such as maintenance, housekeeping, etc.  In fact, when it comes to checking in these guests cannot even get keys at the front desk.  Rather, they must drive to a location miles from the resort to pick up keys and this offsite location has limited hours of operation.  So, when staying with us be sure to book directly with the resort.

title: "Truely a home away from home"
review: This resort was great! We stayed in a two bedroom villa and had plenty of room for 4 adults and 2 kids. The kitchen is great, there is no on site resturant so we made sure to have snacks and easy to prepare food, there is a super Wal-Mart right buy the hotel (best time to go is early in the morning). The pools were clean and lot's of fun for both the kids and adults. There is a Tiki bar that servers snacks and drinks which is great when you are relaxing by the pool. The staff were friendly and the grounds of the hotel were kept very clean. I highly recommend this resort for famlies and adults it was awesome all around!

title: Great value for the money
review: We've stayed at Ditka's 4 times now.  Each time, we have been satisfied with the accomodations, and the staff.  If you're staying in Orlando, this is a good place to stay.  This time we went to Disney, which was less than 10 minutes away.

title: Nice place to stay with the family.
review: Thank you!  We are a great value, particularly for families or groups.  I can never understand why someone would pays much higher rates to stay in a large box, er, hotel room when they could stretch out in a comfortable multi-bedroom villa with room for everyone.  Thank you for pointing this out.  Please come back again.

title: Great package deal!
review: If you are looking for a nice place to go with the family then you should go to Mike Ditka's. Very clean and spacious. We have stayed 3 times and enjoyed it each visit. Keep in mind. If you like peace and quiet book on the second floor. If you are on the first floor the door to the second floor is right by the bedroom and its loud when it closes. My only complaint would be that the tiki bar closes way too early. On our last visit it closed at 9pm and 10 pm the next night. Its very quiet at night.  MDCC

title: Ditka's DUMP!!
review: Thank you.  You are right about the quiet.  This is definitely not the Hard Rock so if you are looking for non-stop action and noise, we're probably not your best choice.  But if you're looking for value, quiet, comfort and room to stretch out, we're definitely the right place for guests like you and your family.  We look forward to serving you again soon.

title: Don't waste your money! Very unfriendly staff and problems with the room.
review: We have stayed at MDRBC seveal times in the past and always seem to come back.  We love the washer and dryer and the full kitchen.  Living in FL, we frequent Orlando and have stayed at several other hotels in the area but we keep coming back to MD.  Every now and then, we find something to report to the office but they are always very responsive.  This last week, they had booked us upstairs and I simply asked to move downstairs and they moved us with no problems.  This is a great package for the price! MDJZ

title: What a great condo!
review: We've stayed overnight many times out near Orlando in the last 30 years, but this resort has to have been the best by far.  The condo itself was even better than it looked on the Internet.  It was very spacious, clean, and comfortable.  We loved it and will stay there again.  If you are reading this and thinking about renting one of these condos, remember that it's not a hotel room.  Bring toilet paper, soap, and shampoo and you'll have a perfect place to lodge.

title: This was one of the best vacations i've had!
review: Mike Ditka resorts was phenominal, our room was awesome, huge,  clean, just very pleasant and bright.  The grounds were kept imaculant. The staff was helpful when i had questions.  I'm definelty coming back and i've already recommended other friends and family to also take a vaction at this resort.  Thanks again for the wonderful hospitality! Stephanie

title: Not as expected
review: On behalf of Mike Ditka Resorts- Runaway Beach Club we would like to thank you for your positive feedback regarding your recent.  We pride ourselves on being a family oriented resort and are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay here with us. We look forward to servingyou and  your family again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Katie R  Guest Service Manager.

title: Canceled me at noon on the day I was to check in
review: We have stayed here once before and we were extremely satisfied. This time around, not sure if management has exchanged hands we actually had the same room assigned and we were not satisfied with the quality of the room nor the upkeep of the room itself. We had a broken bathroom mirror (no big deal) a clogged bathtub in the master, no pots and pans which are provided and later where. We were there 4 nights and did not receive new towels until we asked for them which I later found out is what we were supposed to do if we were staying less than 7 nights (who reads the fine print).  I still love this property and sincerely hope that management would take the maintenance to heart so that this property does not fall apart.  I have recommended this place to many of my friends, I just…

title: Horrible!
review: They left a message at noon on the day I was to check in saying they were booked and the room I had reserved was unrentable.  I called the lady back but she was unavailable but I was promised a call within a half hour.  An hour later no call so I called back and this time was promised a call back within 5 minutes.  Half hour later still no call so I called and finally got in touch.  She offered to relocate me with an upgrade but we were staying with several friends so this wasn't an option.  I ended up just asking for a refund since they weren't willing to make up for all the inconvenience.

title: a lovely place, super clean, very well maintained and managed
review: We were here last year and booked again for this year and I was surprised the place is same level of cleanliness is super well maintained same as last year, I was afraid that the level would go down. No it was just perfect. My husband and myself we feel, when we arrive there, we are at home, we feel very comfortable. We tayed 6 nights, then went to Miami for 3 nights and came back for another 5 nights, once we entered the door of our house we felt Back at home :o) Thank you for this, we will definately come back again next yer and will stay longer.

title: Enjoyed our Stay
review: This was the second time we stayed here and we were all  very happy with everything.  We were in town only for one night but still wanted to enjoy 2 bedrooms, a larger space to relax in, close to lots of shopping, restaurants, parks, etc.  and our room definately provided that--it was neat and clean as well.  Check in is 4 and our room was ready by 3:30 - we were able to lounge at the pool and spa and enjoy a relaxing and delicious drink from the tiki bar served by a very friendly bartender.  Check in and out was quick and easy and the staff all very friendly.

title: Huge and convenient, but with a couple of drawbacks
review: We stayed for the second time at this hotel during a drive-in trip to Central FL. The hotel is very well situated, access is easy, and a 24-hour Wal-Mart is conveniently located a few blocks away.  This kind of hotel is the only option for a family with 4 children that values convenience, the rooms are huge, parking is easy, very accessible, there is plenty of space for everyone, having 2 bathrooms is priceless.  The two things that this hotel needs desperately are:  - Updated beds, the current beds feel old and creaky. - Usable Internet.... it wasn't just slow, it was plan useless.

title: This property could be nice, but is simply unkept.
review: The good:   - We rented a two bedroom, two bath unit with a kitchen and w/d.   - It was spacious and conveniently located to the attractions, restaurants, etc.   - The pool area and gym were nice. The bad: - The front desk clerks were not overly friendly or helpful.  - Check-in is at 4 pm, and our unit wasn't available until the last minute.   - It was entirely unkept and filthy. - When we walked in, there were at least 7 spiders in the unit.   - The window sills were covered in dust.   - The carpets clearly weren't vacuumed, although they left a vacuum in the unit in case you want to do so yourself on your vacation.   - The faucet in the kitchen sink was broken.   - The toilet in the master wasn't flushing properly (called twice before they came to fix it).   - The beds are…

title: You ruined my transportation schedule out of pocket expenses.
review: I was very excited to stay at a hotel with a kitchenette great we had a fully equipped room. The thing that gets me a dirty restroom needed to be clean. hidden fees like u wouldn't believe resort fees and taxes. Booked the room through expedia pay taxes & payed taxes again at the resort. You have to pay for room services. One major thing was transportation only 3 pick ups & 3 drop offs only to Epcot. What if I don't want to go to Epcot the first day well u had to get 2 types of transportation to where u want to go waist of time aahhh!!! If u don't make it back 2 your hotel u are screwed TAXI. We waisted a lot of time & energy up paying 2 times parking which is $14 per day just so I wont waist my time waiting for couple of busses. I would kind of recommend but you never with the…

title: My Family Reunion at Mike Ditka Runaway Beach Club
review: We just recently had our family reunion at Mike Ditka Runaway Beach Club and my family had a ball we enjoyed ourselves so much that we wished we could have stayed a little longer but some of my family members are planning to come back in july for another vacation the staff was very friendly and i would like to especially thank Sina - for helping me book our rooms.

title: GREAT PLACE TO STAY WITH SCHOOL GROUPS
review: First of all, I would like to say that this was a beautiful resort. I took a group of Middle School students to the resort for four nights. The staff were so friendly, and helpful also. The evening staff took the time to look up resteraunt deals and phone numbers so that we could get the best value for our money with regard to group meals. There was a walmart within walking distance, and many different eating establishments, as well as shops for different things. The resort was very clean, and really beautiful. There were two pools, a hot tub, and athletic facilities. The gated community ensured safety, and the other patrons and residents fo the resort were very nice. The rooms were apartments, and each was well equiped to make our stay very comfortable. Each apartment had pull…

title: Stay at Your Own Risk
review: I recently stayed here with my wife and two small children. The resort was brought to my attention by my travel agent knowing I wanted a room with a kitchenette and a bit more room than a typical hotel.   The room was clean and modern though the "flat screen" TV that was advertised was a typical tube style TV. Not a big deal, we weren't there to watch TV. The pool area was great and the kids loved the small water park type pool. The Tiki Bar was nice and the bartender was great and very attentive to the guests. The grounds were well  maintained and being a gated resort was a plus. This is pretty much where the positives end.  Even though it was 85 degrees all week and not a cloud in the sky there were no poolside movies as advertised. There was no wine/cheese reception in the…

title: Terrible customer service, bad towels, and dirty sheets.
review: We made reservations for a two bedroom and upon checkin, was told we had to all fit into a one bedroom. They gave us the option for a one bedroom on property or a two bedroom 9 miles away, which would completely defeat the purpose of our entire group staying in the same place.When calling the next day to move to a two bedroom, customer service was terrible, staff had lots of attitude. We requested towels and more shampoo and conditioner since we had numerous people in our one bedroom, and we NEVER received anything! The sheets were very dirty. Staff was extremely unhelpful and we would never come back to 'resort'.

title: Decent place, needs to excel at the basics and fix-up minor issues
review: Recommended by a friend. Place is safe, clean, and conviently located to Orlando attractions.  Could really benefit from providing better basics....missing simple things like paper towels, napkins, trash bags, laundry detergent, etc from the fully furnished rooms.  Lots of little stuff broken or in disrepair...dining room table legs ready to fall off, light bulbs burned out, tv remote missing.  A couple bucks investment, a good handyman, and paying close attention to the basics and they can be excellent.  I'll look for other places to stay next visit to Orlando....nice enough place, but didn't win me as a customer for life.

title: Saved me money which I spent at WDW!
review: For the price, this place is wonderful. 8 of us stayed there and we had plenty of room. We went through vrbo. Com and got everything as promised. Room was clean, staff friendly, pool awesome, nightly movies at the pool. My kids fed the ducks and  played soccer and tennis in the parking lot. Huge fun. Walmart is like 1/4 mile away and yes we shopped there . Our kitchen had everything, so if we needed more stuff, it was only walking distance. My margaritas were awesome. This resort was clean, friendly, and well maintained. Either my standards are low or some of the negative complaints are because people like to complain. WDW got my money as expected, but I saved a bundle by staying at a wonderful resort .

title: Wonderful and serene; a place to escape and enjoy life!
review: We were very pleased with our stay. Our villa was clean and had enough space to relax and spread out. Very quiet, no noise from neighbors. We are looking forward to our next visit!

title: FABULOUS!!!
review: I stayed here with some friends for a week. From the very beginning of our stay to the very last day, we had an amazing time! Everyone, from the front desk to housekeeping, was very accomodating and friendly! The pool and tiki bar was definately a highlight! It was so relaxing with refreshing drinks and a very personable bartender! The location of the resort was ideal, close to attractions, shops and restaurants. I will recommend this resort to anyone needing a place to stay in the area and I will definately be returning!!!

title: We will never stay here again!!!!!!
review: We have.stayed at this resort for the past two years.  Enjoyed it very much.  This year, SOMETHING changed.  Furniture was damaged, burn marks knobs missing from coffee table (screws exposed). Toilet never worked right, hardly any towels.  Had to constantly ask for toilet paper and towels, we were promised housekeeping on 4th day of our 13-day stay, they NEVER came.  No DVD player in room, although listed in amenities.  EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED!!!  I tried to send a comment card to the corporate office to complain, but it was returned to sender...unable to forward! Also noticed that some of the condos were listed in a real estate catalog as being FOR SALE.  Something just does not seem right. Do not under any circumstances stay at this place....we NEVER will again....you have lost…

title: Our new home away from home.
review: It was our first time at your hotel and we truly enjoyed our stay.  We were very impressed and will definetely come back often as we are frenquent visitors of Disney World and now prefer to stay at Runaway Beach.  Our grandson loved the kiddy pool and so did we. The rooms are very spacious and very clean.  Excellent location to our favorite destination.

title: wonderful time, great accomodations
review: My son (10) and I stayed at Runaway Beach for a week in mid-March, and we were very pleasantly surprised. Our condominium was large, very clean, felt new, had lofted ceilings with a game room in a loft area upstairs, two flat screen TV's, and was equipped with a well-designed full kitchen and all necessary cooking equipment. The bed linens and towels were clean, and the bed firm and seemed new. Everything worked well, and we had an easy and relaxing stay in very comfortable surroundings.   At around $100 per day, the cost was less than a standard hotel room  We reserved a month ahead of our trip during Spring break, and when we arrived were told that the resort was completely booked and all condos had been rented, yet we were upgraded for free to a larger one-bedroom unit with…

title: This resort was good value for the money
review: My husband and I needed a place to stay at the last minute and were able to get in at this resort. The grounds were well maintained and clean. The pool area looked so nice but unfortunately we did not have time to use it. Overall the rooms were clean. The staff at the front desk were AMAZING! They were extremely friendly and made us feel welcome. I would stay at this hotel again.

title: Lots of value, modest disrepair, clean.
review: Large and inexpensive for a 2 bedroom with full kitchen.  The rooms were clean but there were a number of items in mild disrepair.  The toilet leaked ( Looked new and incorrectly put together).  One of the TVs had no cable cord and the phone had no cord to the wall.  Was missing a remote for the tv.  The refrigerator wouldn't cool, the freezer wouldn't freeze.  The sofa bed was in disrepair, missing some of the supports.  I put some cups under the leaky toilet, used ice to cool our food and put the sofa bed mattress on the floor, used our cell phone, and all was okay.  A lot of room for a great price, in need of a decent handyman.   Seems to have been maintained by someone who wasn't too proficient.  We got a downstairs unit, but suffered from a kid running back and forth…

title: I would not recommend this to my worst enemy.
review: This is the far worst selection  I have ever made  for a family vacation. First of all housekeeping sucks, I thought there job was to ensure that the room is clean from top to bottom before releasing it for rental. Never enough of toilet paper,garbage bags. They should all ways make sure that the kitchen is fully equip for families  to prepare meals. with a set of pots, dish detergent, papertowels,dish clothes. It makes no since what so ever to constantly call the front desk for every thing. This was a trip to hell and back.

title: Very comfortable stay, enjoyed the large space.  Would definitely stay again.
review: We were down moving our son to Orlando for motorcycle school and found the Mike Ditka Resort on line and decided it looked like a nice place to stay.
