I was also impressed with the washer and dryer in the room.  This was a great touch and I used it daily.  The pool area was very clean and well kept.  I traveled with 2 pre-teenagers and a child and they had a great time at the pool.  Runaway Beach Hotel is home away from home and I highly recommend it especially…

title: Great place for your family!!!  We'll be back
review: I travelled with a large group (family) and the place was a great fit for our needs.  We stayed in a 3br and 1br and both places were very clean.  We had some minor inconveniences that were handled by the staff very promptly.  The staff was very accommodating to any request that we had.   The units were very spacious and had pretty much everything that we needed (dishes, openers, small appliances, etc).  The location is perfect and an easy drive in to any of the parks or attractions.  You can practically walk to the Walmart for groceries and any other sundry you may need.   Pricing is very reasonable, shop rates around Orbitz, Hotwire & Priceline and you'll probably find yourself a very good deal. Overall, I was very impressed with my stay and would whole-heartedly recommend the…

title: Large Clean and plenty of sleeping area
review: The two bedrooms are huge, they sleep nine and I had plenty of space to escape if I needed to. There were two bathrooms so we were running all over each other and it was nice to have some home cooked meals.

title: Great Property, Bad Staffing
review: If you want any type of service this is not the place for you.  The condo is lovely even though the kitchen floor was not clean.  My shoes stuck.  I was in a 2 bedroom - 2 bath and received a wonderful rate from Hotels.com.  The check-in staff were rude.  I think if you are not a condo owner they do not feel as though you deserve any type of consideration.  There were problems at check-in and I had to call their office.  I was transfered three times before getting someone who could help me.  The back office staff said the problem was not theirs but Hotels.com's.  I spoke to Hotels.com and they said the reservation information was complete that they sent.  No one ever apologized for the problems I faced or even wished me an enjoyable stay.      It was too bad about the staff -…

title: Wonderful experience
review: This is a wonderful property and definitely lives upto its 3.5 stars. The rooms are well appointed, staff is friendly, has  easy access to Disney and shopping and the pools are perfect for relaxing. I traveled with my wife and 2.5 yr old and we loved the 1 bdrm apt. We  will stay here again.

title: EXCELLENT apartment-style at nightly rates!
review: This place is AWESOME if you're not staying on-site at Disney or Universal.  We loved it--tucked away from tourism, but still probably a 15 minute drive to Disney, it's really close to a super-walmart for groceries & cheap souvenirs & close to restaurants, too!  We had basically a 1 bedroom apartment with nice pictures on the walls, nice decor, granite countertops washer, dryer, dishwasher, very nice oven/cooktop.  We paid $99 through the booking site, but asked to stay another night & got it for 89.  If you book direct they'll give you 15% off if you ask for it--very cheap, superb value for the $$$.    Pool area is awesome for kids--a mickey-head shaped pool had 1/3 as a splash area, knee deep with kid-style water dumping & sprinkling, 1/3 was 3 feet deep & 1/3 was 4.5 ft…

title: Everything was Perfect!!!!!
review: This has got to be the best deal in the Orlando area!  My family and I were completely satisfied with the total package.  We travel to Disney every year and this is definitely our new favorite place to stay.  The grounds were breathtaking, with gorgeous surroundings down to the smallest detail.  The pool area was a huge hit and the other amenities(indoor basketball court, workout room, shuttle service to all the parks, etc.) only sweetened the deal.  It could not have gotten any better.  Our room was a 2 bedroom HUGE suite with a gameroom in a loft area.  The room was more like a luxurious apartment than a hotel room.  Everything we needed was provided.  The kitchen came with all cooking and eating utensils and there was a washer and dryer right in the room with the detergent…

title: They are right... RUNAWAY from Runaway Beach Club
review: Found this place on the web and decided to book it. It looked nice enough so I felt comfortable booking this place and bringing the whole family there. Well to sum it up, the resort itself is beautiful. The pool is awesome, the room was up-to-date but housekeeping is a major problem here. Hair in the bathroom, blood in the sheets in one bed, it was bad. To top it off, the staff needs some major training on simple customer service. They have no idea what customer service is or how to treat a customer. Try getting one of their employees to make eye contact with you.. a joke. And don't ask for a manager! All you will get is they are off property and will have to call you back. Don't bother waiting for that call. It is clear that the problem starts from the top!  So take some…

title: Great place to stay
review: My husband and I stayed at the Runaway Beach Club for two four night stays in April.  The first stay was great!  We loved the one bedroom condo that we were placed in (towards the back of the complex).  It was clean, well equipped and spacious.  When we returned for our second 4 night stay we were not as pleased.  The complex was very busy and we had to wait for a condo to be cleaned for us even though we had not arrived until quite late in the afternoon.  We were then placed in another one bedroom condo right at the front of the complex.  After our first stay I was really disappointed.  The condo was not clean, there were signs of quick fix maintenance jobs and the AC did not work properly.  So although we would reccommend this complex it does seem to be some inconsistency…

title: Great Place
review: We stayed at the Runaway Beach Club April 23-26. We had a two bedroom two bath condo. Tastefully decorated in a beach theme - not over the top. Everything was very clean! Had plenty of clean towels, dishes, glasses, etc.  You can pay to have daily maid service, though we chose not too.  Each bedroom had it's on tv. The one in the lving room had a DVD player.    There have two pools. One is geared more toward kids. Both are nice with cushioned seating. Well equipped exercise room. as well as an indoor basketball court.  You have to have a code or card for access into the place, especially at night, since they close the gates.    The staff was very friendly and accomodating. We did have a problem with the people above us. They had children that were continuously running and…

title: Great place to stay
review: This exceeded our expectations in almost all ways.  We had a two bedroom, two bath with loft.  Our three year old grandson didn't use the loft but I can see where it would be great for older children.  the place was immaculate and had everything we needed. The unit was spacious and airy and overlooked the lagoon. the staff was very friendly and helpful.  The exercise room was much better than what is usually found.  A good assortment of machines, free weights, bicycles and cross trainer.    Oue only disappointment was that the children's pool was not heated.  The pools had just been opened a day before our rrival so maybe that was a factor.  We were very impressed and would stay there again.

title: Loved Runaway Beach
review: My husband and I and two young sons stayed for one week beginning April 17.  We loved it!  We had a two bedroom/two bath villa with a loft.  It was extremely clean (and I am a clean freak!) and comfortable.  The kitchen was equipped with everything you would expect a kitchen to have to adequately prepare meals.  The bathrooms had the usual 'hotel' travel size shampoos and soaps. Each bathroom had a hair dryer. Each bedroom had a large walk-in closet with extra pillows and blankets and the MBR had a safe.  The king sized bed was quite comfortable.  In the other bedroom there was a twin bed and a full sized bed.  The washer and dryer was a nice perk.....able to go home with clean laundry!  The sitting area was spacious and comfortable with two large couches that opened up to beds.…

title: Very Nice Stay
review: Very clean hotel, only 1 year old.  We loved everything about the stay. Very close to everything, especially Wal Mart which is just outside the gate where you can purchase food/other articles.

title: Very nice place
review: We stayed here for a week. The resort was excellent, the rooms spacious and clean and the kitchen very well equipped. The resort is located only a few miles from all the Disney-Parks. The pool for adults could be larger - the kids pool was nice and big fun.  Our reservation was made by hotels.com. Our voucher was  unfortunately written in german and insufficent. After a short time the management has found a good solution. We can recommend this location!!!

title: Outstanding Property, Location, and Value
review: My husband and I stayed in a 2 bedroom, two bath condo in March. We were impressed by the decor and cleanliness of the property. The kitchen had everything one would need. The bathrooms were spacious and had all the ammenities of a fine hotel. Bedrooms were very large and comfortable. The easy access to Disney properties and the pool and recreation areas make this an ideal place for a family. The washer and dryer in the unit is also a plus. The value is outstanding for all that this property has to offer.

title: Runaway from the Runaway Beach Club
review: We stayed here from Feb 25, 2007 to Mar 3, 2007.  First of all let me say that this is better than a hotel, but hardly a resort!  First the rooms are spacious but very cheaply put together!  We had a 3 bdrm which was nice.  Our first problem was the safe was left locked and needed to be opened by management.  We waited 3 hours and no one showed!  So we gave up and went grocery shopping.  We came back and put everything away and cooked supper.  At about 10pm, we realized the refrigerator and freezer were not getting cold.  So we complained and were told no maintenance would be there until the next day.  Well, we told them we had $200 worth of groceries we didn't want to spoil, and after alot of talking, we were moved to a downstairs room.  Now, we had a noisy child above us who…

title: Going back again next year!
review: Last time we went to Florida (2 years ago), we stayed at the value hotels in Disney. This year we decided to try a condo style, like Runaway Beach. Definitely no regrets! Not only was it cheaper, but the hotel was so much nicer. We absolutely loved our condo style hotel. We had the one bedroom, but it had 2 queen sofas in the living room. Our place felt like home. My 2 sons, husband, and myself enjoyed all the amenities, which included a large heated pool, hot tub, indoor basketball court, exercising equipment, and more! It was super clean. Everyday, during our 7 day stay, our garbage was emptied and our towels were replaced. We also loved the fact that we had our own full size laundry. Our bedroom even had its own tv and dvd player. The King size bed was soooo comfortable. It…

title: Gorgeous Hotel!!!
review: I have stayed in Florida over a dozen times.  Runaway Beach Club was, by far, the best hotel we have ever stayed at.  We got  a 2-bedroom room with a loft.  The kids absolutely loved the loft!  It had a playstation as well as an air hockey/fooseball table.  It came in handy on one day when it rained for a few hours.  The kids had so much fun in there.   In addition, the staff went out of their way several times to make us more comfortable.  That extra mile mattered a great deal to my wife and me. We will be coming here every time from now on!

title: Orlando's Best Kept Secret
review: The Runaway Beach Club exceeded our expectations.  My husband & I stayed in their 2 bedroom / 2 bath & loved everything about it.  The unit was incredibly clean, beautifuly decorated & so very comfortable.  The resort reminded me of a colorful little village, peaceful & quite.      We've stayed at many different resorts in the Orlando area & the Runaway Beach Club has earned its way to #1 on our list. We highly recommend this resort if your looking for all the comforts of home.  Just loved it !!!!

title: Nice place to stay.
review: Great location.  Very new, quiet,  and clean rooms.  Pillow top mattresses, great pillows,  and very soft towels.  No complaints whatsoever.  Never slept so good.  Above our expectations for the price (had a "good buy" price from Travelocity-restricted re cancellations).  Would stay here again and request a room with a patio.

title: beautiful place
review: I just want to start off by saying the staff at this resort were great. Gentlemen named Eric checked us in, and was very pleasant and helpful. He wrote out directions for us so we could find our way to disney in the morning, and also recommended charlies steak house for a nice dinner. Also about 45 minutes after we checked in we got a call asking if our room was satisfactory and if we had any further questions or concerns feel free to call the front desk(that is open 24 hours) and someone will assist us. We found that very pleasant, because i have never stayed in a hotel that has done that. Also in the morning Toccara was very nice, considering it was quit early in the morning and we were inquiring about the pool and why it was closed, she exclaimed to us that they are adding a…

title: Just like home!
review: My family (husband, father-in-law, mother-in-law, sister-in-law and niece) stayed here from Febraury 24th through the 28th.  We couldn't find anything to complain about.  We stayed in a 3 bdrm/3 bath on the second floor.  It was tastefully decorated and the kitchen was fully stocked with all the dishes/utensils you could possibly need.  The lower level units appeared to have a garage and a walkout patio.  Although it is located right off a couple main highways, it was so peaceful and quiet.  Wal-Mart is literally right around the corner along with an Outlet Mall (although the prices weren't quite what we were used to seeing in an Outlet Mall, it was more like an "On Sale" mall).  True, the pool was closed, but after we inquired we were pleased to find that we could use the pool…

title: Great choice near Disney!
review: I stayed at this hotel while at a conference, and also received feedback from many of the others staying at the conference.  This place got a big thumbs up!  The rooms are more like apartments, nicely decorated, and seem well maintained for the most part.  I stayed in a 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit.  The living room and each bedroom had a TV, and the main TV in the living room also had a DVD player.  The master bedroom had a king bed and an ensuite bathroom, while the second bedroom had a full sized bed and a single bed, with bathroom across the hall.  The rooms were a decent size, and had generous closet space, as well as some drawer space.  Beds were reasonably comfortable.  The bathrooms were spacious, with lots of countertop space, and areas for storage.  Upgraded toiletries were…

title: Great value, exceptional stay
review: Located on 535, just about ten minutes drive from all disney park entrances (same amount of time as if staying on a disney property). We stayed for seven nights, in a two bedroom, second level unit. The pool is being completely renovated with a bar and food area being added. Only negative feedback to the management was that we were not informed of this prior to our booking. However, they accomodated guests by contracting with Comfort Suites across the path to use their pool. Once Runaway's pool area is completed it will be gorgeous. We can't wait to come back next year for two weeks this time! The reception area was large and bright , well staffed. The adjoining gym, while small, had all the appropriate strength training equipment, treadmills and cycle machines, along with a tv…

title: Great Hotel!
review: This place is so nice, the rooms are very clean and well appointed.  It is so relaxing having a view of the lake from the bedroom.  This place is going to be packed once people find out about it, it is a great place to stay.  Another great thing is that it is very centrally located, its about 5 minutes from all the major attractions.  I would reccomend Runaway Beach Club to everyone I know!

title: Would Runaway here every chance I get...
review: I surprised my husband with a little getaway for his Birthday to the Runaway, but we both were surprised at the level of service they provided. We stayed in a one bedroom condo with a private patio (by far the cleanest room we have ever stayed in).  With the plush landscaping and beach theme in the room, we really felt like we were on the beach.  They also had great ammenities.  Although we could'nt take advantage of  the new pool and tike bar they were adding at the time of our stay, the exsisting pool was awesome!  The lounge chairs were like mini beds with like a 6 inch  linen mattress and pillow. Needless to say, this was a Birthday my husband will never forget!  Thank you Runaway!

title: Great experience -Runaway Beach
review: The condo was very nice.  Our family had a 2 bedroom 2 bath condo on the upper level.  It was nicely decorated with a south Florida decor.  It was close to the theme parks. Overall, my family and I were quite satisfied.

title: Perfect place to stay
review: We stayed at the Runaway Beach Club for 3 nights, Dec 28 - Dec 31.  We had a 2 bedroom, 2 bath and it was huge!We were three generations on a Disney trip. Check in was smooth and front desk wrote us out driving directions to Disney.  We picked up breakfast items and snacks - made coffee every morning.  Unit was clean and quiet.  Only problem was with wireless internet - couldn't get on- front desk gave us a number to call - yes there was a problem - they fixed it, called us back and said it was ready to use. We used it for about a half an hour and it went down again. We switched to dial-up for rest of stay with no problems.  Didn't use the pool - Disney was main reason to be there and just wanted a quiet place to come home to. Would stay there again in a heartbeat!

title: Loved it
review: We visited the resort in late December after the holiday's and were throughly impressed. We stayed in a 2 bedroom/2 bath suite it was wonderful, our kids enjoyed it as well. I really can honestly say I have no complaints, the service was wonderful any questions I had they answered immediately. Our DVD wasn't working either but maintence came right in and show us what to do. The rooms are so spacious with walkin closets that speak for themselves. Both couches let out into queen size beds which was a welcome surprise for us(we only expected one to pull out) since we had and additional family come with us on our trip at the last minute. The only regrett I have is that I didn't spend alot of time in our suite to get the full experience of the suite, but next time(I plan to book with…

title: It was great
review: This resort had everything that we were looking for. Its amenities were awesome, except for the fact that the area by the pool was under construction and the heater was disconnected, but nonethe less, it was terrific.  The hotel is close to Disney and all other attractions, it holds a wonderful location to area reasturants and other shopping areas.  The staff was more the willing to help me with whatever I needed, whether it be transportation or other room needs.  They were all very helpful.  The rooms are spacious and had all the utensils, appliances and very comfortable beds. Tho there was no daily service to the room, if we requested it, we got it. I was told that this was something that would be changed after the first of the year, as it was a new management company that…

title: Great Rooms, Crappy Service
review: First of all, I want to say that our condo was gorgeous. It was spacious, had surround sound and TV's in the bedroom and living room, the kitchen was great, the bathroom large. However, many of the 'amenities' that were on their website were found to be lacking. The hot tub was blocked off because they are doing construction. The basketball court had a sign on it telling us it was closed, yet we saw several employees using it. There was no shuttle service to Disney, or anywhere for that matter.  When I got to the airport, I called to inquire as to when we could check in. I was told check in was at 3pm. I asked if I could check in early and was told that I might be able to, but the couldn't tell me for sure until I got there. I have no idea why they said this, because we were…

title: Brilliant stay at Runaway Bay
review: We stayed here for 5 nights recently & the apartments were brilliant.  Everything you could need was there including washing machine, dryer & dishwasher.  I loved the New England beach style of the furniture & decoration.  It was in a good position with easy access to Disney, a Wal-Mart very close by to get provisions & Lake Buena Vista Outlet Mall was within 2 miles.  As it was off-season we got a very good rate through hotels.com.  There was a free business centre which we found useful for e-mails.

title: WONDERFUL STAY
review: Stayed at the Runaway Beach Club for 2 nights in late October. Had a wonderful experience.Stayed in a 1 bedroom condo for $89 per night---condo was luxurious and clean. Condo was selling for $299,000! Everything in the condo seemmed brand new---carpeting, appliances, furniture, bedding, etc. ----even had a washer and dryer. Beautiful clubhouse and pool. Pool had the most luxurious padded lounge chairs we have ever seen. Gated community with security officers patrolling the grounds--even though we felt it was in a very safe and quiet area of Kissimmee, close to the outlet mall and Disney. Very friendly workers. They are expanding the pool area--adding a separate children's pool with waterslide, as well as an entertainment gazebo and small restuarant. Large pond in the middle of…

title: Absolutely fabulous!
review: We had the opportunity to spend a week at Runaway Beach Club at the beginning of June, and I have to say that it is the best place I have ever stayed in the Orlando area.    We had a two bedroom villa that easily fit my husband and three kids.  What's more, the villa had a loft area with an air hockey table and a Playstation game system that was great for occupying the kids when we weren't at the parks.   The washer and dryer right in the room came in really handy for washing all the clothes after the full days in the parks.  Also, each room had its own TV and DVD player, so the kids could watch their own movie while my husband and I relaxed. Overall, Runaway Beach Club made our vacation one of the best we've ever taken.  It was clean and up-to-date, the staff was very friendly…
